word.lx: Saying is one thing, and doing is another./r/n 说是一回事，做又是另一回事。/r/n What do you think you are doing?/r/n 你知道你在做什么吗？/r/n

word.name: dole
word.mean: n. 施舍品,失业救剂金
word.lx: After she lost a leg, she went on the dole./r/n 在她失去一条腿后，她开始登记领取救济金。/r/n I doled out the food to all the children./r/n 我把食品发放给所有的孩子们。/r/n

word.name: doll
word.mean:
n. 玩具娃娃
v. 把...打扮得花技招展
word.lx: My daughter has many beautiful dolls./r/n 我女儿有许多漂亮的洋娃娃。/r/n The child cuddled her doll (to her chest)./r/n 那孩子（怀里）抱著玩具娃娃./r/n

word.name: dollar
word.lx: Can you lend me five dollars?/r/n 你能借给我五美元吗？/r/n She gave the boys a dollar apiece./r/n 她给孩子们每人一美元。/r/n

word.name: dolphin
word.lx: We like to see the performance of dolphins./r/n 我们喜欢看海豚的表演。/r/n The dolphin balanced the ball on its nose./r/n 海豚用鼻子顶着球，使其保持平衡。/r/n

word.name: dome
word.lx: The dome of St. Paul Cathedral is well known in the world./r/n 圣保罗教堂的圆顶闻名于世。/r/n Upward pressure from underlying magma domes the surface./r/n 地下岩浆的向上推力使地面成圆顶形。/r/n

word.name: domestic
word.mean:
a. 国内的,家庭的,驯养的
n. 家仆,佣人
word.lx: He has had many domestic troubles./r/n 他有许多家庭纠纷。/r/n The newspaper provides more foreign news than domestic news./r/n 这家报纸刊登的国外消息多于国内消息。/r/n

word.name: dominance
word.mean: n. 支配(控制,统治,权威,优势)

word.name: dominant
word.lx: Peace was the dominant theme of the conference./r/n 和平是大会的首要议题。/r/n The right hand is dominant in most people./r/n 大多数人的右手是优势手。/r/n

word.name: donate
word.lx: I can donate one hundred dollars at best./r/n 我充其量只能捐助100美元。/r/n The government calls on the youth to donate their blood voluntarily./r/n 政府号召青年义务献血。/r/n

word.name: donation
word.lx: A wealthy sponsor came to our rescue with a generous donation./r/n 有个富有的赞助人慷慨捐赠来解救我们./r/n The donation aggregated to$10,000./r/n 捐款合计达一万美元。/r/n

word.name: donkey
word.lx: He is as stubborn as a donkey./r/n 他像驴子一样倔强。/r/n The bray of the donkey absorbed us./r/n 驴叫声吸引了我们。/r/n

word.name: donor
word.mean:
n. 捐赠人
[计算机] 施主

word.name: doom
word.mean:
n. 命运,不幸,宣告 判决
v. 命中注定,宣告
word.lx: People sent the criminal to his doom./r/n 人们将这个罪犯处死。/r/n Everyone is doomed to die./r/n 每个人都是注定要死的。/r/n

word.name: door
word.lx: Open the door, please./r/n 请把门打开。/r/n Diligence is often the door to success./r/n 勤奋常会引向成功。/r/n

word.name: doorway
word.lx: She stood in the doorway, unable to decide whether to go in./r/n 她站在门口，拿不定主意是否进去。/r/n She had to duck her head to get through the low doorway./r/n 她不得不低下头才能穿过低矮的门口。/r/n

word.name: dorm
word.lx: How come everyone at the dorm talk on the phone so long?/r/n 为什么住在宿舍在学生打电话都打那么久？/r/n A coed dorm; a coed pool./r/n 男女合住的宿舍；男女联营/r/n

word.name: dormant
word.mean:
a. 睡眠状态的,静止的
[计算机] 静止的

word.name: dormitory
word.lx: A small sleeping compartment, especially within a dormitory./r/n 小卧室小卧室，尤指宿舍内的小卧室/r/n He hangs out in the school dormitory./r/n 他住在学校的宿舍里。/r/n

word.name: DOS
word.mean:
n.[计算机] 磁盘操作系统
DOS 命令 : 在常规、扩展或保留内存中装入操作系统

word.name: dose
word.mean:
n. 剂量,服用量
v. 配
word.lx: In the accident, the workers received a heavy dose of radiation./r/n 在这次事故中，工人受到大剂量的辐射。/r/n Take one dose of this cough syrup three times a day./r/n 每天服三次这种止咳糖浆，每次服一剂量。/r/n

word.name: double
word.mean:
n. 两倍
a. 两倍的,双重的
v. 加倍的,快步走,加倍努力
word.lx: He is my double, though we are not related./r/n 我们两人虽然没有亲缘关系，他却和我长得一模一样。/r/n Is the material single width or double width?/r/n 这幅料子是单幅的还是双幅的？/r/n

word.name: doubling
word.lx: A fold in cloth made by doubling the material upon itself and then pressing or stitching it into place./r/n 褶皱衣服上的褶，通过将衣服的材料对折叠，然后在衣料上再压紧或缝在一起而制成/r/n

word.name: doubt
word.mean:
n. 怀疑,疑惑
v. 怀疑,不信
word.lx: There is no doubt that we will be successful./r/n 毫无疑问我们会成功的。/r/n I doubt the truth of it./r/n 我怀疑此事的真实程度。/r/n

word.name: doubtful
word.mean: a. 可疑的,疑心的,不确的
word.lx: Because of a long drought, the farmers are doubtful about the prospect of a good yield./r/n 因为长时间的干旱，农民们对于好收成的前景是怀疑的。/r/n It is doubtful whether he can read my fortune or not./r/n 他能否算出我的运气还是个疑问。/r/n

word.name: doubtless
word.mean:
a. 无疑的,确定的
ad. 无疑地,确定地
word.lx: John will doubtless come early as he always does./r/n 约翰无疑会像平时一样很早就来。/r/n I shall doubtless see you tomorrow./r/n 我大概明天会见到你。/r/n

word.name: dough
word.mean: n.生面团(揉好的陶土,捏塑体),浆糊
word.lx: She is kneading dough./r/n 她正在揉面。/r/n The way to make dough is very simple as you need only to mix flour with water./r/n 和面的方法很简单，只要把水和在面粉里就行了。/r/n

word.name: dove
word.lx: The dove is the symbol of peace./r/n 鸽子是和平的象征。/r/n The dove is an emblem of peace./r/n 鸽子是和平的象征。/r/n

word.name: down
word.mean:
a. 向下的
ad. 向下
n. 绒毛,汗毛
prep. 沿着...而下
word.lx: The tears ran down her cheeks./r/n 泪水沿着她的面颊流下。/r/n It gets cold quickly when the sun goes down./r/n 太阳下山后天气很快就会冷下来。/r/n

word.name: downstairs
word.mean:
a. 楼下的
ad. 在楼下
n. 楼下
word.lx: She was ill and stayed in the downstairs bedroom for a whole day./r/n 她病了，在楼下的卧室里呆了一整天。/r/n Is anyone downstairs?/r/n 有人在楼下吗？/r/n

word.name: downstream
word.mean:
ad. 下游地
a. 下游的
word.lx: Downstream the river twists and turns a lot./r/n 这条河的下游弯弯曲曲./r/n The logs are drifted downstream to the mill./r/n 那些原木沿河顺水漂到工厂./r/n

word.name: downtown
word.mean:
n. 市中心区,市中心
a. 市中心的
ad. 往闹区
word.lx: We will go downtown tomorrow./r/n 明天我们去市中心。/r/n The park is only five minutes from downtown./r/n 这个花园离市中心只有五分钟的路程。/r/n

word.name: downward
word.mean:
a. 向下的
ad. 向下
word.lx: The monkey was hanging head downwards from the branch./r/n 猴子头向下倒挂在树枝上。/r/n A downward movement; descent./r/n 向下的运动；下降/r/n

word.name: downwards
word.lx: The monkey was hanging head downwards from the branch./r/n 猴子头向下倒挂在树枝上。/r/n He lay face downwards on his bed./r/n 他脸向下伏在床上。/r/n

word.name: doze
word.lx: I had a quick doze on the train./r/n 我在火车上打了一会儿瞌睡。/r/n He fell into a doze./r/n 他打起盹儿来了。/r/n

word.name: dozen
word.lx: My mother bought a dozen eggs./r/n 我妈妈买了一打鸡蛋。/r/n I had bred a dozen of chickens./r/n 我饲养了12只小鸡。/r/n

word.name: draft
word.mean:
n. 草稿,草图,汇票
v. 起草,征兵
word.lx: He drew a draft of the car./r/n 他画了一张汽车的草图。/r/n John was drafted into the Army last year./r/n 约翰去年被应征入伍。/r/n

word.name: drag
word.mean:
n. 拖,拖累
v. 拖累,拖拉,慢条斯理地走
word.lx: The protesters were dragged away by the police./r/n 抗议者被警察拖走了。/r/n She dragged herself out of bed, still half asleep./r/n 她挣扎著起了床，犹自睡眼惺松。/r/n

word.name: dragon
word.lx: Dragons are described as monsters in most western countries./r/n 在大多数西方国家，龙被认为是怪物。/r/n This jade dragon is a genuine antique./r/n 这件玉龙是真正的古玩。/r/n

word.name: drain
word.mean:
n. 下水道,排水沟,消耗
v. 耗尽,排出沟外
word.lx: This country is being drained of its best talents./r/n 这个国家最优秀的人才在不断外流。/r/n Boil the vegetables for 20 minutes and then drain off the water./r/n 把蔬菜煮上20分钟，然后把水沥掉。/r/n

word.name: drainage
word.mean:
v. 排水
n. 排水系统,污水

word.name: DRAM
word.lx: He is very fond of his dram./r/n 他喜欢喝一点酒。/r/n She has not one dram of learning./r/n 她一点学问也没有。/r/n

word.name: drama
word.mean:
n. 剧本,戏剧
刺激的事情
word.lx: I have no interest in drama./r/n 我对戏剧不感兴趣。/r/n The drama of international politics interested her./r/n 国际政治的戏剧性使她深感兴趣。/r/n

word.name: dramatic
word.mean:
a. 戏剧性的,引人注目的,给人深刻印象的
n. (pl.)戏剧作品,戏曲
word.lx: Her opening words were dramatic./r/n 她的开场白十分动听。/r/n The play is a dramatic representation of a real event./r/n 这出话剧改编出自真人真事。/r/n

word.name: dramatically
word.mean:
ad. 戏剧地,引人注目地
从戏剧角度,显著地

word.name: dramatize
word.mean:
v. 使戏剧化
vt. 把(小说等)改编成戏剧,渲染
word.lx: The affair was dramatized by the press./r/n 新闻界把事情夸大了。/r/n He is dramatizing the story of his life./r/n 他把自己的一生改编成戏剧。/r/n

word.name: drastic
word.lx: Drastic measures will have to be taken to restore order./r/n 为恢复秩序必须采取严厉措施./r/n Our budget needs drastic revision./r/n 我们的预算需作重大修改。/r/n

word.name: draw
word.mean: v. (drew,drawn) 拉,拖,挨近,提取,画,绘制
word.lx: That film was a great draw./r/n 那部影片很叫座。/r/n We have several drawn matches this year./r/n 今年我们打和了几场比赛。/r/n

word.name: drawback
word.lx: Everything has its drawbacks./r/n 凡事都有不足之处。/r/n The great drawback to living near a main road is noise./r/n 住在大街旁最大的缺点是噪音。/r/n

word.name: drawer
word.lx: He locked his diary in the upper drawer./r/n 他把日记锁在上层抽屉里。/r/n Line the drawer with paper, please./r/n 请在抽屉里铺上纸。/r/n

word.name: dread
word.mean:
n. 恐惧,可怕的人,可怕的事
a. 可怕的,可怖的
v. 恐惧,害怕
word.lx: The Jews lived in dread of being caught./r/n 这些犹太人生活在会遭到拘捕的恐惧之中。/r/n I dread to think what will happen if she finds out the truth./r/n 我不敢去想她知道真相后会怎么样。/r/n

word.name: dreaded
word.lx: Something dreaded or despised./r/n 恐惧的事物；讨厌的事物/r/n The Jews lived in dread of being caught./r/n 这些犹太人生活在会遭到拘捕的恐惧之中。/r/n

word.name: dress
word.mean:
n. 女装,服装
v. 穿著
word.lx: She always dresses in black./r/n 她总穿着黑衣服。/r/n She wears a beautiful evening dress./r/n 她穿着一件漂亮的晚礼服。/r/n

word.name: dressing
word.lx: A nurse came to put on a clean dressing for him./r/n 一位护士来给他包上干净的绷带。/r/n Dressing is difficult for her since her accident./r/n 在她出了事故以来，穿衣服一直都很费劲。/r/n

word.name: drift
word.mean:
n. 漂移,漂流物,观望,漂流,吹积物,趋势
v. 漂移,漂流,吹积
word.lx: The road was edged with snow drifts./r/n 路边上有一个个雪堆。/r/n A tiny fishing boat was drifting slowly along./r/n 一只小小的渔船在缓缓地漂去。/r/n

word.name: drilling
word.lx: A hole or passage made by or as if by use of a drill./r/n 钻孔，打洞用或似用钻打孔或通道/r/n Valuable deposits of oil have been found by drilling./r/n 通过钻探发现很有开采价值的油层./r/n

word.name: drip
word.mean:
n. 滴,点滴,乏味的人,水滴
v. 滴下,漏水
word.lx: The rainwater drips from the eaves./r/n 雨水从屋檐滴下。/r/n Moonlight dripped through the leaves./r/n 月光透过树叶洒下来。/r/n

word.name: driver
word.lx: The bus driver asked the passengers to buy tickets./r/n 公共汽车司机要求乘客买票。/r/n The driver braked his car suddenly./r/n 司机突然煞车。/r/n

word.name: driving
word.mean:
n. 赶,操纵,驾驶
a. 推进的,强劲的,精力旺盛的
vbl. 骑
word.lx: Dangerous driving should be severely punished./r/n 危险驾驶应受严惩。/r/n The process of driving or propelling./r/n 推进驱使或推进的过程/r/n

word.name: droop
word.lx: The flowers were drooping for want of water./r/n 这些花因缺水而凋萎。/r/n Her head drooped sadly./r/n 她悲哀地垂着头。/r/n

word.name: drop
word.mean:
n. 滴,微量,落下
v. 放下,掉下
word.lx: He likes to eat chocolate drops./r/n 他喜欢吃巧克力糖球。/r/n The fruit dropped down from the tree./r/n 水果从树上掉下来。/r/n

word.name: dropout
word.lx: My disease is an asthma and a dropout and, what is less curable, seventy- five./r/n 我的病是气喘和水肿，还有无可救药的是七十五（岁）。/r/n

word.name: drought
word.lx: We have not enough food to eat because of the drought./r/n 因为旱灾，我们没有足够的食物可吃。/r/n The crops failed because of the drought./r/n 干旱造成农作物歉收。/r/n

word.name: drown
word.lx: The band drowned our conversation./r/n 乐队的演奏声把我们谈话的声音淹没了。/r/n The little girl drowned in the river./r/n 小女孩在河里淹死了。/r/n

word.name: drowse
word.lx: Oh, no! Looks like they catch me drowse./r/n 喔，糟了。他们好像发觉我在打瞌睡。/r/n

word.name: drudgery
word.lx: Washing machines take the drudgery out of laundry./r/n 洗衣机把洗衣工作带出了洗衣房。/r/n Labor-saving devices have emancipated women from kitchen drudgery./r/n 许多节省劳力的设备于妇女摆脱掉乏味的厨房杂役。/r/n

word.name: drug
word.mean:
n. 药,麻药
v. 下药
word.lx: The man formed a habit of taking harmful drugs./r/n 这人养成了服用有害麻醉品的习惯。/r/n The drug is wanted bitterly./r/n 这药有人急着要用。/r/n

word.name: drugstore
word.lx: A place where drugs are sold; a drugstore./r/n 药房，药店出售药品的地方；药店/r/n Raymond: Yes, I just picked up some drug at the corner drugstore./r/n 雷蒙：有，我刚刚在街角的药房买了一些药品，/r/n

word.name: drum
word.mean:
n. 鼓,鼓声
v. 击鼓,作鼓声
word.lx: He drummed on the table with his fingers./r/n 他用手指咚咚地敲打着桌子。/r/n She drummed it into the children that they must not cross the road alone./r/n 她反复地给孩子们说，他们不可以独自横过马路。/r/n

word.name: drunk
word.mean:
a. 喝醉了的
vbl. 喝,喝酒
word.lx: He is slightly drunk./r/n 他有些醉了。/r/n Several drunks lay on the floor./r/n 好几个醉汉躺在地板上。/r/n

word.name: drunkard
word.lx: She divorced with her husband because she found him a drunkard./r/n 她和丈夫离婚了，因为她发现他是个酒鬼。/r/n A drunkard is like a whisky bottle, all neck and belly and no head./r/n 酒鬼好比威士忌瓶，全是脖子跟肚子而没脑子。/r/n

word.name: dry
word.mean:
a. 干的,枯燥无味的
v. 把...弄干,干掉
word.lx: The book is as dry as dust./r/n 这本书枯燥无味。/r/n The soil is too dry for planting./r/n 土太干了，不能种东西。/r/n

word.name: dryer
word.lx: She put her clothes in the dryer, so she could wear them this afternoon./r/n 她把衣服放在干衣机里，这样她下午就能穿这些衣服了。/r/n He bought an electric hair-dryer for Mary./r/n 他给玛丽买了一个电吹风。/r/n

word.name: dual
word.lx: She has dual nationality./r/n 她有双重国籍。/r/n His dual role as a composer and a conductor made him very busy./r/n 他作曲家和指挥家的双重身份使他非常繁忙。/r/n

word.name: dubious
word.lx: I feel dubious about what to do next./r/n 我不知道下一步该怎么办。/r/n I feel dubious about his honesty./r/n 我对他的诚实表示怀疑。/r/n

word.name: duck
word.mean:
n. 鸭子
v. 没入水中,闪避
word.lx: She had to duck her head to get through the low doorway./r/n 她不得不低下头才能穿过低矮的门口。/r/n The children ducked each other in the swimming pool./r/n 孩子们在游泳池里互相把对方按入水中。/r/n

word.name: due
word.mean:
n. 应得物
a. 预定的,应付的,到期的,应有的
word.lx: Her baby is due next week./r/n 她的宝宝预计在下个月出世。/r/n His success is entirely due to hard work./r/n 他的成功完全是努力工作的结果。/r/n

word.name: duke
word.lx: The duke ordered the servant to send a letter to the king./r/n 公爵命令仆人把一封信送给国王。/r/n The duke wrote a letter with a quill pen./r/n 公爵用一根羽毛笔写信。/r/n

word.name: duly
word.mean: ad. 的确,当然地,适当地
word.lx: Your suggestion has been duly noted./r/n 你的建议已受到注意。/r/n The carriage that he had ordered duly arrived, and we drove off./r/n 他叫的马车按时到，我们就坐上去走了。/r/n

word.name: dumb
word.lx: We were struck dumb with horror and grief./r/n 惊恐和忧伤使我们哑口无言。/r/n The man is as dumb as an oyster./r/n 那人极少说话。/r/n

word.name: dummy
word.mean:
n. 傀儡,假人,哑巴
a. 虚拟
[计算机] 伪的

word.name: dump
word.mean:
n. 垃圾场
v. 倾卸,切断电源,倾倒
word.lx: Just dump everything over there./r/n 先把东西堆在那边。/r/n Some people just dump their rubbish in the river./r/n 有些人径直往河里倒垃圾。/r/n

word.name: dumping
word.lx: A fine for dumping trash on public land; dumped the extra gear overboard./r/n 因在公用土地上倾倒垃圾而受的罚款；把多余的装备丢到船外/r/n An instance or the result of dumping stored data./r/n 转出，转储转出内存数据的例子或结果/r/n

word.name: dung
word.mean:
n. 粪(粘结物)
vt 上粪
word.lx: Animal dung may be used as manure./r/n 动物的粪便可以作为肥料使用。/r/n He dunged his vegetable garden regularly./r/n 他经常给他的菜园施肥。/r/n

word.name: dupe
word.mean:
n. 受骗的人,上当者
vt. 欺骗,愚弄
word.lx: One who is easily swindled; a dupe./r/n 傻瓜容易上当受骗的人；易被愚弄的人/r/n A fool or dupe./r/n 蠢人，容易受骗的人/r/n

word.name: duplicate
word.mean:
n. 副本,复本,复制品
a. 复制的,二重的
v. 复制
[计算机] 复制
word.lx: This research merely duplicates work already done elsewhere./r/n 这项研究仅仅是重复别人已经做过的工作。/r/n He gave me a duplicate key of his house./r/n 他给了我另配了一套他房子的钥匙。/r/n

word.name: duplication
word.lx: We must avoid wasteful duplication of effort./r/n 我们必须避免无谓的重复劳动./r/n A copy made by this method of duplication./r/n 油印品通过这种方法印制的印刷品/r/n

word.name: duplicator
word.lx: In a duplicator, a tank that may or may not be an integral part of the machine, providing a reservoir of fluid for the damping system./r/n 复印机中的一个箱体，它可以是也可以不是复印机整体的组成部分，作为减震系统的液体容器。/r/n

word.name: durability
word.mean: n. 持久性(耐久性,耐用年限,寿命)

word.name: durable
word.mean:
a. 耐久的
n. 耐用品
word.lx: This pair of shoes is durable./r/n 这双鞋很耐磨。/r/n The durable, aromatic wood of any of these plants, especially that of the red cedar, often used to make chests./r/n 雪松木这些植物的耐久的、带香味的木材，尤指红雪松的木材，常用于制作箱子/r/n

word.name: during
word.lx: He swims every day during the summer./r/n 他夏天每天游泳。/r/n The thief broke into the house during the night./r/n 小偷在夜间破门进入住宅。/r/n

word.name: dusk
word.lx: He usually goes out for a walk at dusk./r/n 他通常在黄昏时出去散步。/r/n The lights go on at dusk./r/n 一到黄昏灯就亮了。/r/n

word.name: dust
word.mean:
n. 灰尘,尘埃
v. 拂去灰尘
word.lx: The car raised quite a dust as we drove off./r/n 我们走时车子扬起了一阵尘土。/r/n Please dust all the books on the bottom shelf./r/n 请把底层书架上的书都掸一掸。/r/n

word.name: dustbin
word.lx: Please put all your sweet wrappers in the dustbin./r/n 请把你们的糖纸都放进垃圾箱里去。/r/n The dustbin is chock-full (of rubbish)./r/n 垃圾箱塞满了（垃圾）./r/n

word.name: dusty
word.lx: The dusty road made the travelers dusty too./r/n 满是尘土的路弄得行人也满面尘土了。/r/n My eye alighted on a dusty old book at the back of the shelf./r/n 我偶然发现在书架後面有一本满是灰尘的旧书./r/n

word.name: Dutch
word.mean:
a. 荷兰的
n. 荷兰人
word.lx: Do Dutch people really go Dutch at a restaurant?/r/n 荷兰人在饭馆吃饭时真的各自付帐吗？/r/n The Dutch settled in South Africa./r/n 荷兰人在南非殖民./r/n

word.name: dwarf
word.lx: The kind dwarf asked the little princess to have dinner with him./r/n 善良的小矮人邀请小公主和他一起吃晚饭。/r/n There is a dwarf apple tree in our garden./r/n 在我们的花园里有一棵矮苹果树。/r/n

word.name: dwell
word.lx: He decided to dwell on our island./r/n 他决定到我们的岛上居住。/r/n Stop dwelling on your problems and do something about them!/r/n 别老唠叨你的那些问题，还是做些实际工作解决它们吧！/r/n

word.name: dweller
word.lx: Dwellers here live a happy life now./r/n 现在这里居民的生活很幸福。/r/n The noise of traffic is a constant irritant to city dwellers./r/n 车辆的噪音对城市居民是永无止境的骚扰./r/n

word.name: dwelling
word.lx: He changed his dwelling recently./r/n 他最近搬了家。/r/n A structure serving as a dwelling for one or more persons, especially for a family./r/n 房屋作为一个人或多个人，特别是作为一家人的住处的建筑物/r/n

word.name: dwindle
word.lx: My money had dwindled away./r/n 我的钱渐渐花光了。/r/n Drought has dwindled the crops./r/n 干旱使农作物歉收。/r/n

word.name: dying
word.mean:
a. 垂死的,临终的
n. 死,死亡
word.lx: The little girl cried when she saw her dying cat./r/n 看到快死的小猫，小女孩哭了。/r/n The dying were rushed to the hospital./r/n 垂死的人被急速送往医院。/r/n

word.name: dynamic
word.mean: a. 动态的,有动力的,有力的
word.lx: We are looking for dynamic persons to be salesmen./r/n 我们正在寻找充满活力的销售人员。/r/n He has a dynamic personality./r/n 他是个性活跃的人。/r/n

word.name: dynamical
word.mean: a. 动力的,电动的,有生气的

word.name: dyspepsia
word.lx: Many people think they have religion when they are merely troubled with dyspepsia./r/n 许多人，当他们只是在患消化不良之时，却以为自己有了宗教信仰。/r/n

word.name: each
word.mean:
a. 每个,每,每一
ad. 每个
int. 每个,个人,个自
word.lx: Each man has his own name./r/n 每个人都有自己的名字./r/n We each have our private views about it./r/n 我们每个人对这件事都有自己的看法。/r/n

word.name: eager
word.lx: He is eager for you to meet his friends./r/n 他热切希望你见见他的朋友。/r/n The company is eager to expand into new markets./r/n 那家公司急欲开辟新的市场。/r/n

word.name: eagerness
word.lx: She has a strong eagerness for success./r/n 她热切地渴望成功。/r/n Her eagerness moved all the people./r/n 她的热心感动了所有的人。/r/n

word.name: eagle
word.lx: The eagle is his favorite bird./r/n 鹰是他最喜欢的鸟类。/r/n The eagle dived down on the rabbit./r/n 那只鹰向兔子猛扑下来。/r/n

word.name: earmark
word.mean:
n. 耳上记号,特徵,记号
v. 在耳朵做记号,弄上记号,充作

word.name: earn
word.lx: His skill in negotiating earned him a reputation as a shrewd tactician./r/n 他的谈判技巧使他赢得了精明战略家的名声。/r/n How does she earn her living?/r/n 她靠什么谋生？/r/n

word.name: earth
word.lx: The earth in the garden is good, soft soil./r/n 花园里的泥土松软肥沃。/r/n The moon goes round the earth./r/n 月亮绕着地球转。/r/n

word.name: earthenware
word.lx: His grandfather gave her an earthenware bowl./r/n 他的祖父给了她一个陶碗。/r/n Earthenware has an advantage over wood in being more easily kept clean./r/n 陶器的优点在于比木器更容易保持清洁。/r/n

word.name: earthquake
word.lx: The San Francisco earthquake was one of the worst catastrophes of the century./r/n 旧金山地震是世纪性的灾难之一。/r/n The city was razed by an earthquake./r/n 地震把这个城市夷为平地。/r/n

word.name: easily
word.mean:
a. 容易地,不费力地
ad. 容易地
word.lx: She is easily the best lawyer in the city./r/n 她无疑是本市最好的律师。/r/n I can easily finish this work today./r/n 我今天可以很轻易地把这份工作做完。/r/n

word.name: Easter
word.lx: Each of my cousins received an Easter egg on Easter Day./r/n 我的表兄弟们每人在复活节都得到了一枚复活节彩蛋。/r/n With the coming of Easter, winter ends and spring comes./r/n 随着复活节的来临，冬天结束而春天来了。/r/n

word.name: eastern
word.lx: China is an eastern country./r/n 中国是一个东方国家。/r/n The mountain was sharply defined against the eastern sky./r/n 那座山在东方天空的衬托下显得轮廓分明./r/n

word.name: eastward
word.mean:
a. 向东的
ad. 向东
word.lx: He walked eastward./r/n 他向东走去。/r/n The hospital is on the eastward slope of the hill./r/n 医院在小山的东坡。/r/n

word.name: eastwards
word.mean:
ad.&a. 向东方(的),朝东(的)
n. 向东的方向
word.lx: The hospital is on the eastward slope of the hill./r/n 医院在小山的东坡。/r/n The ship is working eastwards./r/n 轮船在向东行驶。/r/n

word.name: ebb
word.mean:
n. 退潮,衰退
v. 潮退,衰退
word.lx: Painting was then at its lowest ebb./r/n 那时绘画艺术非常不景气。/r/n A crab was left stranded on the beach when the tide ebbed./r/n 退潮时，一只蟹被困留在沙滩上。/r/n

word.name: eccentric
word.mean:
n. 怪人
a. 古怪的,反常的
word.lx: The club seemed full of eccentrics./r/n 这个俱乐部里好象都是怪人。/r/n She is an eccentric old lady./r/n 她是个古怪的老太太。/r/n

word.name: eccentricity
word.mean: n. 古怪,古怪的行为,怪癖
word.lx: One of his eccentricities is sleeping under the bed instead of on it./r/n 他的怪僻之一是睡觉睡在床底下而不睡在床上./r/n His eccentricity had become legendary long before he died./r/n 在他去世之前他的古怪脾气就早已闻名遐尔了。/r/n

word.name: echo
word.mean:
n. 回声,回音,回波
v. 发回声,随声附和,摹仿
n.[计算机] DOS命令 :禁止(或允许)批处理命令行显示屏幕上
word.lx: His voice echoed in the big empty hall./r/n 他的声音在空荡的大厅里发出回声。/r/n The room echoed with their happy laughter./r/n 房间里回荡着他们的欢笑声。/r/n

word.name: eclipse
word.mean:
n. 日蚀,月蚀,衰落
v. 引起日蚀,引起月蚀,使...黯然失色
word.lx: Our happiness was soon eclipsed by the terrible news./r/n 我们的快乐没多久就被可怕的消息蒙上了一层阴影。/r/n It was reported that there would be an annular eclipse tomorrow./r/n 据报道说，明天有日环食。/r/n

word.name: ecology
word.lx: He started to study ecology and decided to devote his whole life to the science./r/n 他开始研究生态学，并决心将他的一生献身于这门科学。/r/n Holistic medicine; holistic ecology./r/n 全身治疗的药物；注重整体的生态学/r/n

word.name: economic
word.mean:
a. 经济的,经济学的
n. [-s]经济学(状况等)
word.lx: Do you know the economic policy of this year?/r/n 你知道今年的经济政策吗？/r/n The economic sanctions could not prevent the development of that country./r/n 经济制裁不能阻碍那个国家的发展。/r/n

word.name: economical
word.mean: a. 节俭的,经济的,合算的
word.lx: She is economical in her use of salt when cooking./r/n 她烹饪时用盐很少。/r/n This is not an economical method of heating./r/n 这不是一种经济的取暖方式。/r/n

word.name: economically
word.lx: Economically, the country is in a very healthy state./r/n 从经济学的观点来说，国家处于很兴旺的状态之中。/r/n I dress very economically because I make all my clothes myself./r/n 我衣着节俭，衣服都是自己做的。/r/n

word.name: economize
word.mean: v. 节约,节省,有效地利用
word.lx: Our electricity bills are higher than we can afford we must start to economize./r/n 我们的电费已经高得付不起了--得节省些了./r/n The need to economize scarce energy resources./r/n 节约使用稀有能源的必要性/r/n

word.name: economy
word.lx: We are trying to make a few economies./r/n 我们正想办法节省一些。/r/n Most of the countries in the region have unstable economies./r/n 这个地区大多数国家的经济都不稳定。/r/n

word.name: ecstasy
word.lx: We were in ecstasy at the thought of going home./r/n 一想到回家，我们就兴奋不已。/r/n He listened to the music with ecstasy./r/n 他听音乐听得入神。/r/n

word.name: eddy
word.mean:
n. 逆流,漩涡
v. 起漩涡
word.lx: The mist eddied round the old castle./r/n 薄雾在那座古老的城堡的周围打转转。/r/n The little paper boat was caught in an eddy and spun round and round in the water./r/n 小纸船卷进了漩涡中，在水中直打转。/r/n

word.name: edge
word.mean:
n. 边,边缘,优势
v. 侧身移动,挤进
word.lx: Please sharpen the edge of this axe./r/n 请把这把斧头的刃磨快。/r/n She lost a handkerchief edged with blue./r/n 她丢了一块镶蓝边的手绢。/r/n

word.name: edible
word.mean:
n. 食品,食物
a. 可食用的
word.lx: These are edible wild berries./r/n 这些野莓可以食用。/r/n This food is scarcely edible./r/n 这种食物真是难以下咽。/r/n

word.name: editing
word.lx: He spent his last years (in) teaching and editing earlier writings./r/n 他把晚年用在教书和编纂以前的著作。/r/n The editing of the manuscript is now in hand./r/n 这部手稿的编辑工作现在已经开始。/r/n

word.name: edition
word.lx: The edition is limited to 500 copies./r/n 该版限出500本。/r/n She is an improved edition of her mother./r/n 她长得像她母亲但胜过她母亲。/r/n

word.name: editor
word.lx: The editor often gives some opinion on topical issues./r/n 这个编辑常对一些时事问题发表意见。/r/n The editor remarked that article was well written./r/n 编者评论说那篇文章写得很好。/r/n

word.name: editorial
word.mean:
n. 社论
a. 编辑的
word.lx: I have made a lot of editorial changes in their book./r/n 我在他们的书上做了许多编辑上的修改。/r/n I work in an editorial office./r/n 我在编辑部工作。/r/n

word.name: educate
word.mean:
v. 教育,培养
vt. 教育
word.lx: He had paid out good money to educate his daughter at a boarding school./r/n 他花了很多钱让他的女儿在寄宿学校受教育。/r/n It is not the way to educate a child by making him do things against his will./r/n 勉强他做事不是教育孩子的办法。/r/n

word.name: educated
word.mean: a. 受过教育的,有教养的
word.lx: Educated people considered as a group; the literati./r/n 文人，学者被作为一个群体看待的受过教育的人；文人/r/n Educated; polished; refined./r/n 有教养的；文雅的；精炼的/r/n

word.name: education
word.lx: No country can afford to neglect education./r/n 任何国家都不容忽视教育。/r/n He was handicapped by lack of education./r/n 他因文化水平低而吃了亏。/r/n

word.name: eel
word.lx: Eels are long and difficult to catch./r/n 鳝鱼很长而且很难抓住。/r/n The taste of eel is delicious./r/n 鳝鱼的味道很好。/r/n

word.name: effectively
word.lx: Effectively, their response was a refusal./r/n 实际上，他们的答复是拒绝。/r/n Chances of a settlement were effectively wrecked by his speech./r/n 和解的机会事实上被他的演讲破坏了。/r/n

word.name: effectiveness
word.lx: Equal in force, power, effectiveness, or significance./r/n 相等的力量、能力、效力、或重要性等相等/r/n Lacking vigor, force, or effectiveness; inadequate./r/n 缺乏活力、力量或效力的；不充足的/r/n

word.name: efficacy
word.mean: n. 功效,效力,（疗法、药物的）疗效
word.lx: The efficacy of the medicine is satisfactory./r/n 这药的药效令人满意。/r/n We are testing the efficacy of a new drug./r/n 我们正在测试新药的功效。/r/n

word.name: efficiency
word.mean:
a. 有效的,生效的
n. 效率
word.lx: We must improve our efficiency as soon as possible./r/n 我们必须尽快地提高工作效率。/r/n Their labor efficiency is very high./r/n 他们的工作效率很高。/r/n

word.name: efficiently
word.lx: It is hard to work efficiently in such a confined space./r/n 在这样狭小的空间里工作很难提高效率。/r/n Washing powders containing enzymes are said to remove stains more efficiently./r/n 据说含有人造酶的洗衣粉去污力强./r/n

word.name: egg
word.lx: This hen lays beautiful brown eggs./r/n 这只母鸡下很漂亮的棕色蛋。/r/n Do you want a boiled egg for breakfast?/r/n 你早饭要吃煮鸡蛋吗？/r/n

word.name: Egypt
word.lx: These travelers came from Egypt./r/n 这些游客来自埃及。/r/n Many Pharaohs in ancient Egypt believe they can live forever./r/n 古埃及的许多法老相信他们可以永生。/r/n

word.name: Egyptian
word.mean:
a. 埃及的
n. 埃及人
word.lx: The ancient Egyptians had advanced civilization./r/n 古埃及人曾经拥有高度文明。/r/n There are many mysterious stories about the Egyptian pyramids./r/n 关于埃及金字塔有许多神秘的故事。/r/n

word.name: eighteen
word.lx: My daughter is eighteen years old and has grown into a beautiful lady./r/n 我的女儿十八岁了，已经长成为美丽的淑女。/r/n She dolled herself up as though she was a girl of eighteen./r/n 她打扮得花枝招展,好像是个十八岁的姑娘似的。/r/n

word.name: eighth
word.mean:
n. 八分之一
num. 第八
word.lx: August is the eighth month in a year./r/n 八月是一年中的第八个月。/r/n One eighth of a circle./r/n 八分圆圆的八分之一/r/n

word.name: either
word.mean:
a. 任一,两方的
prep. 任一,随便任一个
conj. 或,也
word.lx: If you do not go, I shall not go either./r/n 你不去，我也不去。/r/n You may take either of the roads./r/n 两条路你随便走哪一条。/r/n

word.name: eject
word.lx: The noisy youths were ejected from the cinema./r/n 吵闹的年青人都已从影院被逐出去了。/r/n Cartridges are ejected from the gun after firing./r/n 开枪后子弹从枪膛里弹出去。/r/n

word.name: ejection
word.lx: The amount or rate of emission or ejection./r/n 排放量流量、流速，或排出量，排出的速度/r/n

word.name: elaboration
word.mean:
n. 苦心经营,精巧
n. 详细说明
word.lx: The elaborations of the plot made it a difficult book to read./r/n 这本书因内容节外生枝而很难懂./r/n

word.name: elapse
word.lx: Three years have elapsed since we met last time./r/n 我们上次相见至今已经三年了。/r/n Three years have elapsed since we last met./r/n 我们上次相见至今已过了三年./r/n

word.name: elapsed
word.lx: Three years have elapsed since we met last time./r/n 我们上次相见至今已经三年了。/r/n Several decades have elapsed since I graduated from the college./r/n 我大学毕业已数十年了。/r/n

word.name: elastic
word.mean:
a. 有弹性的
n. 橡皮圈
word.lx: Rubber is elastic./r/n 橡皮是有弹性的。/r/n He has an elastic temperament./r/n 他有开朗的性情。/r/n

word.name: elasticity
word.lx: Having or exhibiting no elasticity./r/n 无弹性的无弹性的或显示出没有弹性的/r/n

word.name: elated
word.lx: Highly pleased; elated./r/n 洋洋得意的；兴高采烈的/r/n He was elated at the news./r/n 这个消息使他很兴奋。/r/n

word.name: elbow
word.mean:
n. 手肘,急弯,扶手
v. 用手肘推开,推挤
word.lx: He elbowed his way through the crowd./r/n 他在人群中挤出一条路。/r/n You jogged my elbow and spoiled what I was drawing./r/n 你撞到了我的手肘，弄坏了我正在画的图画。/r/n

word.name: elder
word.mean:
a. 年龄较大的,年长的
n. 长者,长辈
word.lx: He is the elder of the twins./r/n 他是双胞胎中的哥哥。/r/n My elder sister had a baby last month, so I am an aunt now./r/n 我姐姐上个月生了孩子，所以我现在是阿姨了。/r/n

word.name: eldest
word.lx: I am the eldest among my cousins./r/n 我是表兄弟姐妹中年龄最大的。/r/n When the duke dies, his eldest son will succeed to the title./r/n 公爵去世之后，他的长子将继承他的爵位。/r/n

word.name: elect
word.mean:
n. 当选人,被选的人,上帝的选民
a. 被选的,选出的
v. 选举,选择
word.lx: The President elect will be installed next week./r/n 候任总统将在下周正式就任。/r/n They elected him chairman./r/n 他们选他做主席。/r/n

word.name: electric
word.lx: Please turn off the electric power./r/n 请把电源关掉。/r/n The solar cell can convert the energy of sunlight into electric energy./r/n 太阳能电池能把阳光的能量转化为电能。/r/n

word.name: electricity
word.lx: While I was cooking supper the electricity went off./r/n 我正在做晚饭时停电了。/r/n Copper conducts electricity better than other materials./r/n 铜比其他材料导电性能好。/r/n

word.name: electrify
word.lx: The athlete has an electrifying burst of speed./r/n 这个运动员具有惊人的爆发速度。/r/n They are electrifying the battery./r/n 他们正给电池充电。/r/n

word.name: electron
word.lx: An electric current in metal is caused by the movement of electrons./r/n 金属内电流是由电子运动引起的。/r/n The number of electron pairs an atom can share with other atoms./r/n 共用电子对数，共价一个原子与其他原子共用的电子的对数/r/n

word.name: elegance
word.lx: Ten years ago this dress was considered the last word in elegance./r/n 十年前这种连衣裙还算是最高雅的款式呢。/r/n Elegance of style or manner./r/n 优雅风度或举止的优雅/r/n

word.name: elegant
word.mean: a. 优雅的,精美的,俊美的
word.lx: The lady wears an elegant dark suit./r/n 那位女士穿着雅致的深色套装。/r/n I like my clothes to be simple but elegant./r/n 我喜欢朴素但漂亮雅致的衣服。/r/n

word.name: element
word.lx: Honesty, industry and kindness are elements of a good life./r/n 诚实、勤劳和善良是幸福生活的要素。/r/n You must understand the elements of mathematics before we can proceed further./r/n 你必须先弄懂数学基础知识, 我们才能进一步学习./r/n

word.name: elemental
word.lx: The elemental truth was facing us./r/n 基本的事实面对着我们。/r/n The elemental mathematics is very easy./r/n 初等数学很简单。/r/n

word.name: elementary
word.lx: The question is elementary./r/n 这个问题很简单。/r/n My son is studying at an elementary school./r/n 我儿子在一家小学上学。/r/n

word.name: elephant
word.lx: The elephant is the largest four-footed animal in the world./r/n 大象是世界上最大的四足动物。/r/n The elephant lowered its ponderous body into the water./r/n 大象把它那笨重的身躯浸入水里。/r/n

word.name: elevate
word.lx: Reading good books elevates your mind./r/n 阅读好书使人思想高尚。/r/n The attempt to elevate Anderson to the presidency./r/n 企图把安德逊抬上总统宝座。/r/n

word.name: elevation
word.mean:
n. 海拔,提高
[计算机] 标高
word.lx: The house is at an elevation of 1000 meters./r/n 这所房子在海拔1000米处。/r/n We climbed to the top of the small elevation, from which we could look at the town./r/n 我们爬上小丘的顶端，由此可以俯瞰城市。/r/n

word.name: elevator
word.mean: 电梯 或 飞机升降舵
word.lx: I took the elevator to the eighteenth floor./r/n 我坐电梯上了第十八层。/r/n You may push this button to call the elevator./r/n 你可以按这个按钮叫电梯。/r/n

word.name: eleven
word.mean:
num. 十一
pron.&a. 十一(个,只...)
word.lx: The little boy left primary school at eleven./r/n 这个小男孩十一岁时小学毕业。/r/n A cricket team is comprised of eleven players./r/n 一个板球队由11名队员组成。/r/n

word.name: elicit
word.lx: He succeeded in eliciting the information he needed from her./r/n 他从她那里问出了他所需要的信息。/r/n So remarkable as to elicit disbelief; fantastic./r/n 如此特别以至让人难以相信；精彩绝伦的/r/n

word.name: eligible
word.mean:
a. 可以选的,有资格的,合格的
n. 有资格者,合格者,适任者

word.name: eliminate
word.mean:
v. 除去,排除,剔除
[计算机] 消除
word.lx: Their team was eliminated in the first round./r/n 他们队在第一轮就被淘汰了。/r/n This new process has eliminated the need for checking the products by hand./r/n 采用这种新方法无须再用手工检验产品。/r/n

word.name: elite
word.mean: n. 精华,精锐,中坚份子
word.lx: A member of a group of elite, highly loyal supporters./r/n 禁卫军一支精锐的皇家军队中的成员/r/n

word.name: eloquence
word.lx: I admire him for his eloquence./r/n 我佩服他的口才。/r/n His eloquence did not avail against the facts./r/n 他的雄辩在事实面前不起什么作用。/r/n

word.name: eloquent
word.mean: a. 雄辩的,有口才的,动人的
word.lx: These ruins are an eloquent reminder of the horrors of war./r/n 这些废墟形象地提醒人们不要忘记战争的恐怖。/r/n He addressed the audience in an eloquent speech./r/n 他向听众发表了雄辩的演说。/r/n

word.name: elsewhere
word.lx: I shall go elsewhere./r/n 我要到别处去。/r/n Their much reviled system in fact works far better than many highly praised ones elsewhere./r/n 他们那套遭到许多非难的设备操纵起来实际上要比别的地方许多备受赞扬的设备好得多。/r/n

word.name: elucidate
word.lx: Please elucidate the reasons for your decision./r/n 请把你作出决定的理由解释清楚。/r/n The note help to elucidate the most difficult parts of the text./r/n 这些注释有助於弄清文中最难懂的部分。/r/n

word.name: elusive
word.mean: a. 难懂的,易忘的,难捉摸的

word.name: emancipation
word.lx: The emancipation of women depends on themselves./r/n 妇女的解放依靠她们自己。/r/n The Emancipation Proclamation abolished slavery in the United States./r/n 《解放黑人奴隶宣言》废除了美国的奴隶制。/r/n

word.name: embargo
word.lx: The embargo impacted on export revenues./r/n 禁运封出囗总收入有很大的影响。/r/n The minister has lifted the embargo on the export of firearms./r/n 部长已经解除对火器出口的贸易禁令。/r/n

word.name: embark
word.lx: The ship embarked passengers and food at a Spanish port./r/n 这艘船在西班牙的一个港口装载了乘客和食品。/r/n Passengers with cars must embark first./r/n 带汽车的乘客必须先上船./r/n

word.name: embassy
word.lx: He works at the American Embassy in Moscow./r/n 他在莫斯科的美国驻俄大使馆工作。/r/n The embassy is an obvious target for terrorist attacks./r/n 大使馆是恐怖分子攻击的明显目标。/r/n

word.name: embed
word.mean:
v. 使插入,使嵌入,深留
[计算机] 嵌入
word.lx: The harpoon struck but did not embed./r/n 鱼叉击中了但并没有插入/r/n

word.name: embedded
word.mean:
a. 植入的,内含的,深入的
v. 埋入,植入,深入
vbl. 埋入,植入,深入

word.name: embody
word.mean:
v. 具体表达,使具体化
包含
word.lx: She embodies her principles in her behavior./r/n 她把自己的原则体现在行动中。/r/n The new car embodies many improvements./r/n 这辆新车包含了许多改进的项目。/r/n

word.name: embrace
word.mean:
n. 拥抱
v. 拥抱,互相拥抱,包含
word.lx: We embraced each other./r/n 我们互相拥抱。/r/n Vines embraced the hut./r/n 蔓藤环绕着小屋。/r/n

word.name: embroider
word.lx: She embroidered her initials on the handkerchief./r/n 她把她姓名的起首字母绣在手帕上。/r/n She embroiders very well./r/n 她很会刺绣./r/n

word.name: embroidery
word.lx: I am too busy to make any embroidery now./r/n 我现在太忙，没有时间刺绣了。/r/n This kind of floss is used for embroidery./r/n 这种丝线用来刺绣。/r/n

word.name: emerge
word.mean: v. 浮现,(由某种状态)脱出,(事实)显现出来
word.lx: It has emerged that he stole the money./r/n 现在终于发现，是他偷了那笔钱。/r/n The sun emerged from behind the clouds./r/n 太阳从云层后面露出来了。/r/n

word.name: emergency
word.mean:
a. 紧急的
n. 紧急情况,突发事件
word.lx: The rioting grew worse and the government declared a state of emergency./r/n 骚乱恶化，政府只得宣布进入紧急状态。/r/n Ring the bell in an emergency./r/n 情况紧急时请按铃。/r/n

word.name: emigrant
word.mean:
n. 移民,侨民
a. 移民的,移居的
word.lx: Most emigrants among them are patriots./r/n 他们中大多数侨民是爱国主义者。/r/n A ship full of emigrants will soon leave for Canada./r/n 一条载满移居外国者的船很快就要开往加拿大了。/r/n

word.name: emigration
word.lx: The mass emigration of refugees in the war was reported widely by the press./r/n 战争中大规模的逃难移民被新闻界广泛报道。/r/n Emigration have carry to its shore shoal of men and women./r/n 移民使成群结队的男男女女来到了它的海岸。/r/n

word.name: eminent
word.lx: The most eminent doctors treated the king in his illness./r/n 医术最精湛的医生们在国王生病时诊治他。/r/n Characterized by excellence or distinction; eminent./r/n 卓越的，杰出的以卓越或杰出为特点的；卓著的/r/n

word.name: emit
word.mean:
v. 发出,放射,吐露
[计算机] 发射
word.lx: A volcano emits smoke and ashes./r/n 火山散发着烟和灰。/r/n The cheese was emitting a strong smell./r/n 干酪散发出强烈的气味。/r/n

word.name: emotion
word.lx: Love, joy, hate, fear and grief are all emotions./r/n 爱、喜、恨、惧、悲都是情感。/r/n He appealed to our emotions rather than to our reason./r/n 他诉诸我们的情感而非我们的理智。/r/n

word.name: emotional
word.lx: She sang an emotional song about love and death./r/n 她唱了一首关于爱情和死亡的动人的歌曲。/r/n The boy got very emotional when I had to leave, and started to cry./r/n 当我不得不离开时，这个孩子情绪异常激动，忍不住哭了起来。/r/n

word.name: emperor
word.lx: Napoleon called himself Emperor of the French./r/n 拿破仑自称为法国皇帝。/r/n The emperor was a tyrant./r/n 那皇帝是个暴君。/r/n

word.name: emphasis
word.lx: Our English course places great emphasis on conversational skills./r/n 我们的英语课程非常重视会话技能。/r/n Restraint or lack of emphasis in expression, as for rhetorical effect./r/n 轻描淡写的陈述在表达上受限制或缺乏强调，如为了修辞作用/r/n

word.name: emphasize
word.mean:
v. 强调,着重
vt. 强调
word.lx: I would like to emphasize that we are ready to meet the management at any time./r/n 我想着重指出，我们愿意在任何时候与管理部门会谈。/r/n Which word should I emphasize?/r/n 我应该重读哪个词?/r/n

word.name: emphatic
word.mean: a. 语调强的,用力的,强调了的
word.lx: He was most emphatic that I should go./r/n 他极力强调我应该去。/r/n We win the emphatic victory./r/n 我们赢得了那场有目共睹的胜利。/r/n

word.name: empire
word.lx: The British Empire once covered large parts of the world./r/n 大英帝国曾经占有过世界上的大片地方。/r/n I am reading a book about the rise and fall of the Roman Empire./r/n 我正在看一本关于罗马帝国兴衰的书。/r/n

word.name: empirical
word.lx: Inquiry into the nature of things based on logical reasoning rather than empirical methods./r/n 自然科学基于逻辑推理而不是凭经验得来的方法来探究事物的本质/r/n Employment of empirical methods, as in science./r/n 经验方法的运用，例如在科学中/r/n

word.name: employ
word.lx: The police had to employ force to break up the crowd./r/n 警察不得不使用武力驱散人群。/r/n Our company employed about one hundred people./r/n 我们公司雇佣了大约一百人。/r/n

word.name: employee
word.lx: This employee was dismissed for laziness./r/n 这名雇员因为懒惰而被解雇。/r/n The boss struck off 100 dollars from the salary of the employee as fine./r/n 老板从这个雇员的工资里扣除100美元作为罚款。/r/n

word.name: employer
word.lx: The car industry is one of our biggest employers./r/n 汽车工业是我们最大的雇主之一。/r/n His servile expression of praise for his employer was disgusting to me./r/n 他奉承雇主的那副奴颜婢膝的嘴脸令我恶心。/r/n

word.name: employment
word.mean: n. 工作,职业,雇用,使用
word.lx: He is out of employment./r/n 他失业了。/r/n He enrolled with an employment agency for a secretary./r/n 他在职业介绍所登记要当秘书。/r/n

word.name: emptiness
word.lx: I feel I am in emptiness./r/n 我觉得我很空虚。/r/n It is a world of emptiness./r/n 那是一个空虚的世界。/r/n

word.name: empty
word.mean:
n. 空的东西,空物
a. 空的,空虚的,空腹的
v. 倒空,使...空
[计算机] 空的
word.lx: His room is empty./r/n 他的房间是空的。/r/n They emptied the biscuits onto the plate./r/n 他们把饼干倒在盘子里。/r/n

word.name: emulsion
word.lx: I have to buy some white emulsion paint to freshen the walls./r/n 我不得不买些白色的乳状漆来粉刷墙壁。/r/n

word.name: enable
word.mean:
v. 使...能够
[计算机] 使能
word.lx: The collapse of the strike enabled the company to resume normal bus services./r/n 罢工的失败使公司恢复了正常的公共汽车营业。/r/n I gave him full directions to enable him to find the house./r/n 我向他作了详细说明, 好让他能找到那房子./r/n

word.name: enabled
word.lx: The collapse of the strike enabled the company to resume normal bus services./r/n 罢工的失败使公司恢复了正常的公共汽车营业。/r/n Their help enabled me to finish the work with ease./r/n 他们帮助我，使我能够顺利地完成工作。/r/n

word.name: encase
word.mean:
v. 包围,装入箱内
vt. 把...装入箱中,包起
word.lx: His broken leg was encased in plaster./r/n 他折的腿打上了石膏./r/n

word.name: enchant
word.lx: She was enchanted with the flowers you sent her./r/n 她非常喜欢你送的花。/r/n Enchanting as if with a magic spell; fascinating./r/n 令人心醉的使如同有魔咒般迷住的；迷人的/r/n

word.name: encircle
word.mean:
v. 环绕,包围
vt. 包围,环绕
word.lx: Enemy troops had encircled the town./r/n 敌军包围了该城。/r/n The lake is encircled by trees./r/n 湖被树木环绕。/r/n

word.name: enclose
word.mean:
v. 围绕,放入封套,装
[计算机] 括入
word.lx: He enclosed the land with a hedge./r/n 他用篱笆把地圈起来。/r/n I enclose herewith two copies of the contract./r/n 随函寄上合同副本两份。/r/n

word.name: encounter
word.mean:
n. 意外的相见,遭遇
v. 遇到,偶然碰到,遭遇
word.lx: One rainy night the policeman had a chance encounter with a gang of smugglers./r/n 在一个雨夜，那个警察正巧碰上了一伙走私犯。/r/n I encountered an old friend at Rome./r/n 我在罗马邂逅了一个老朋友。/r/n

word.name: encourage
word.mean:
v. 鼓励,激励,支持
vt. 鼓励
word.lx: Her success encouraged me to try the same thing./r/n 她的成功鼓励我试做同样的事。/r/n High prices for farm products encouraged farming./r/n 农产品价格的提高有助于农业。/r/n

word.name: encrypt
word.lx: Pertaining to a signal or area which contains either encrypted classified or unclassified information./r/n 用于修饰或说明包含加密的保密或不保密信息的信号或区域。/r/n

word.name: encyclopedia
word.lx: We bought a multimedia encyclopedia./r/n 我们买了一套多媒体百科全书。/r/n This encyclopedia is truly a compendium of knowledge./r/n 这部百科全书真正是知识宝库./r/n

word.name: end
word.mean:
n. 结束,终点,目标
v. 结束,终结,终止
word.lx: At the end of the film, the hero wept bitterly./r/n 在影片的结尾，主人公伤心地哭了。/r/n They ended the party off with a song./r/n 他们唱支歌结束了晚会。/r/n

word.name: endeavor
word.mean:
n. 努力,尽力
v. 努力,尽力
word.lx: The man endeavored to please his beloved wife./r/n 那人尽量使他深爱的妻子快乐。/r/n Please make every endeavor to be early./r/n 请尽量早点儿。/r/n

word.name: endeavour
word.mean: n. 奋力号(航船的名字)
word.lx: I shall endeavour to accommodate you whenever possible./r/n 只要有可能, 我将尽力帮你./r/n On account of your health, you must endeavour to shift off the care of your children./r/n 由于你身体不好，你必须尽量避免为孩子们操心。/r/n

word.name: ending
word.lx: The story has a happy ending./r/n 这个故事有一个美满的结局。/r/n His ending was peaceful./r/n 他很安详地去世。/r/n

word.name: endless
word.mean: a. 无止境的,没完没了的
word.lx: Her endless patience made her the best nurse in the hospital./r/n 无限的耐心使她成为这个医院最好的护士。/r/n His endless talking hinders me from my study./r/n 他没完没了的谈话妨碍了我的学习。/r/n

word.name: endocrine
word.mean:
a. 内分泌的
n. 内分泌

word.name: endow
word.lx: He endowed the hospital with a large fortune./r/n 他捐赠一笔巨款给这家医院。/r/n She both built and endowed the hospital./r/n 她不仅建了医院还给医院捐赠资金。/r/n

word.name: endurance
word.lx: His treatment of her was beyond endurance./r/n 他这样对待她是无法忍受的。/r/n The soldiers eventually completed the endurance tests./r/n 士兵们最终完成了耐力测验。/r/n

word.name: endure
word.mean: vt. 耐久,忍耐,容忍,持久,持续
word.lx: The secret endured./r/n 秘密一直没有泄漏。/r/n I cannot endure listening to that any longer./r/n 我再也不耐烦听那一套了。/r/n

word.name: enemy
word.mean:
a. 敌人的
n. 敌人
word.lx: The enemy was forced to retreat./r/n 敌人被迫撤退。/r/n This defeat was a powerful blow to the enemy./r/n 这次失败是对敌人的有力的打击。/r/n

word.name: energetic
word.lx: His son is an energetic child./r/n 他的儿子是个精力旺盛的孩子。/r/n I like to take some energetic exercise at weekend./r/n 我喜欢在周末做些剧烈运动。/r/n

word.name: energy
word.mean: n. 活力,精力,能力,能,能量
word.lx: Young people usually have more energy than the old./r/n 青年人通常比老年人精力充沛些。/r/n The solar cell can convert the energy of sunlight into electric energy./r/n 太阳能电池能把阳光的能量转化为电能。/r/n

word.name: enforce
word.lx: Have you any statistics that would enforce your argument?/r/n 你有任何统计资料可以加强你的论点吗？/r/n Policemen and judges enforce the law./r/n 警察与法官执行法律。/r/n

word.name: engage
word.mean: v. 答应,预定,使忙碌,雇佣,订婚
word.lx: I have engaged a room at this hotel./r/n 我已经在这个旅馆里预订了一个房间。/r/n Jack and Anne are engaged./r/n 杰克和安妮订婚了。/r/n

word.name: engaged
word.mean:
a. 忙碌的,使用中的
v. 预订,约定,参与
vbl. 预订,约定,参与
word.lx: I have engaged a room at this hotel./r/n 我已经在这个旅馆里预订了一个房间。/r/n Jack and Anne are engaged./r/n 杰克和安妮订婚了。/r/n

word.name: engagement
word.lx: Their engagement was announced in the papers./r/n 他们订婚的消息登报了。/r/n He had only enough money to meet his engagements./r/n 他的钱仅够付合同款。/r/n

word.name: engine
word.mean: n. 发动机,引擎,机车,火车头
word.lx: There must be something wrong with the engine of my car./r/n 我汽车的引擎一定是出故障了。/r/n He lost one of the pieces of his model engine./r/n 他的火车头模型缺了一个零件./r/n

word.name: engineer
word.mean:
n. 工程师
v. 设计,制造
vt. 操纵,设计,建造
word.lx: His dream is to become an engineer./r/n 他的梦想是将来成为一名工程师。/r/n Although many people opposed his plan, he engineered it through to final approval./r/n 虽然很多人反对他的计划，他仍能巧妙地设法使它最后获得通过。/r/n

word.name: engineering
word.lx: My major is the subject of chemical engineering./r/n 我的专业是化学工程学。/r/n He was trained as an engineer/in engineering./r/n 他受过担任工程师的[工程学方面的]培训./r/n

word.name: England
word.lx: He was born in England./r/n 他出生于英格兰。/r/n In England traffic must keep to the left./r/n 在英国，车辆必须靠左行驶。/r/n

word.name: English
word.mean:
a. 英国的,英国人的
n. 英语
word.lx: Do you speak English?/r/n 你会说英语吗？/r/n Have you brought your English book with you?/r/n 你带英语书了吗？/r/n

word.name: engrave
word.lx: The terrible scene was engraved on his memory./r/n 那可怕的情景铭记在他的记忆里。/r/n His memorial was engraved on the stone./r/n 纪念他的碑文刻在石碑上。/r/n

word.name: engraving
word.lx: The art or process of carving or engraving on precious stones./r/n 宝石雕刻术宝石雕刻术或宝石雕刻制作过程/r/n A painting or an engraving set in an oval or circular frame./r/n 圆形浮雕镶嵌于椭圆形或圆形框架中之绘画或雕刻/r/n

word.name: enhance
word.lx: Those clothes do nothing to enhance her appearance./r/n 她穿那些衣服也并没显得更漂亮。/r/n He made many efforts to enhance his reputation./r/n 他做了许多努力来提高他的声誉。/r/n

word.name: enjoy
word.lx: How did you enjoy the concert?/r/n 你喜欢那场音乐会吗？/r/n Now that I am free, I can enjoy music for a while./r/n 既然有空，我可以享受一下音乐。/r/n

word.name: enlargement
word.lx: Enlargement of the heart./r/n 心肥大心脏的扩大/r/n The enlargement brings out the details in the photograph./r/n 照片放大後细微之处都很清楚./r/n

word.name: enlighten
word.mean: v. 授与...知识,启发,启蒙
word.lx: Can you enlighten me on this subject?/r/n 关于这个问题，你能指点我一下吗？/r/n She was anxious to enlighten me about the events that led up to the dispute./r/n 她急着要使我明白引起这场争执的那些事情。/r/n

word.name: enlightening
word.mean: a. 有启迪作用的,使人感悟的
word.lx: The act or a means of enlightening./r/n 启迪启迪的行为或方式/r/n She was anxious to enlighten me about the events that led up to the dispute./r/n 她急着要使我明白引起这场争执的那些事情。/r/n

word.name: enormous
word.lx: Long ago enormous animals lived on the earth./r/n 很久以前，地球上生活着巨大的动物。/r/n Of enormous size or magnitude; huge./r/n 巨大的，庞大的规模巨大或大得出奇的；巨大的/r/n

word.name: enquire
word.lx: I must enquire further into this matter./r/n 我要进一步调查此事./r/n For sale: small motor scooter. Enquire within./r/n 待售：小型摩托车，请进内询问。/r/n

word.name: enquiry
word.lx: With respect to your enquiry, I enclose an explanatory leaflet./r/n 关於你的询问, 兹附上有关说明资料./r/n I am sorry, I am not able to help you with your enquiry./r/n 对不起，我无法帮助回答您的询问。/r/n

word.name: enrich
word.lx: The expanding economy enriched the peasants./r/n 不断发展的经济使农民们富裕起来。/r/n The library was enriched with new books./r/n 购买新书使图书馆得到了充实。/r/n

word.name: enrol
word.lx: I enrolled at the University of Vienna./r/n 我报名就读于维也纳大学。/r/n He enrolled our names./r/n 他把我们的名字登记下来了。/r/n

word.name: enroll
word.lx: I enrolled at the University of Vienna./r/n 我报名就读于维也纳大学。/r/n He enrolled with an employment agency for a secretary./r/n 他在职业介绍所登记要当秘书。/r/n

word.name: ensemble
word.mean: n. 全体,合唱曲,女人的全套服装
word.lx: The ensemble of central administrative and governmental services in imperial Rome./r/n 中央行政管理部门罗马帝国时期中央行政管理部门/r/n The principal part in a duet or ensemble composition./r/n 第一声部合（重）奏或合（重）唱中最主要的部分/r/n

word.name: ensue
word.lx: Many troubles ensued from this misunderstanding./r/n 由此误会产生了许多麻烦。/r/n The evils ensue from lack of a stable government./r/n 这些弊病是由于缺乏一个稳定的政府而引起的。/r/n

word.name: entail
word.lx: That will entail an early start tomorrow morning./r/n 那就需要明晨很早动身./r/n He would have sold the property long ago had it not been entailed./r/n 这些财产若非限定继承的话, 他早就卖掉了./r/n

word.name: entangle
word.mean: v. 使...纠缠,卷入,使...混乱
word.lx: My fishing line got entangled in some weeds./r/n 我的钓鱼线同杂草纠缠在一起。/r/n How did Mary manage to entangle her hair so badly in the brambles?/r/n 玛丽的头发缠紧在荆棘上了，她是怎么搞的？/r/n

word.name: enterprise
word.lx: He is a man of great enterprise./r/n 他是个事业心很强的人。/r/n He works in a private enterprise./r/n 他在一家私人企业工作。/r/n

word.name: entertain
word.lx: I like to entertain friends with music and refreshments at home./r/n 我喜欢在家里用音乐和茶点招待朋友。/r/n The child entertained himself with his building blocks./r/n 孩子在搭积木玩。/r/n

word.name: entertainment
word.lx: This hotel is famous for its entertainment./r/n 这家旅馆以殷勤待客著称。/r/n He fell into the water, much to the entertainment of the onlookers./r/n 他跌进水中，旁观者大乐。/r/n

word.name: enthusiasm
word.lx: We were received with enthusiasm./r/n 我们受到热烈的欢迎。/r/n He expressed infectious enthusiasm to his voters./r/n 他对他的选民表现出很有感染力的热情。/r/n

word.name: enthusiast
word.lx: A film or movie enthusiast./r/n 影迷热衷于电影的人/r/n A hockey enthusiast./r/n 曲棍球热衷者/r/n

word.name: enthusiastic
word.lx: He is enthusiastic about helping others./r/n 他热心助人。/r/n None of the enthusiastic volunteers realized that they would die like dogs in the trenches of the Somme./r/n 满腔热情的志愿军都没有认识到，他们会在萨默壕沟中悲惨地死去。/r/n

word.name: entire
word.lx: I am in entire agreement with you./r/n 我完全同意你。/r/n The flames devoured the entire building./r/n 火焰吞没了整栋大楼。/r/n

word.name: entrance
word.mean:
n. 入口
v. 使出神,使入迷
vt. 使出神
word.lx: He had passed the entrance examination of the college./r/n 他已经通过了大学的入学考试。/r/n The children watched entranced as the circus animals performed./r/n 马戏团的动物们表演时，孩子们都看得入神。/r/n

word.name: entreat
word.lx: He was accustomed to command, not to entreat./r/n 他习惯于发号施令，而不是恳求他人。/r/n He entreated her not to be angry./r/n 他恳求她不要发怒。/r/n

word.name: entrepreneur
word.lx: One, especially an entrepreneur, that undertakes a task or job./r/n 承担者；企业家承担任务或工作的人，尤指企业家/r/n An unsuccessful entrepreneur./r/n 一个不成功的企业家/r/n

word.name: entry
word.lx: How many entries are there for the high jump?/r/n 报名参加跳高比赛的有多少人？/r/n This dictionary has over 30000 entries./r/n 这本字典有3 万多词条。/r/n

word.name: enumerate
word.mean:
v. 列举,计算,枚举
[计算机] 枚举
word.lx: She enumerated the items we had to buy./r/n 她列出了我们要买的东西。/r/n The teacher enumerated many examples to us for understanding./r/n 为了我们理解，老师列举了很多事例。/r/n

word.name: envelop
word.lx: The papers are falling out of the envelop, push them back./r/n 论文从封袋里掉出来了，把它们放回原处。/r/n The building was soon enveloped in flames./r/n 那幢建筑物很快就陷入了火海之中。/r/n

word.name: envelope
word.lx: He addressed the envelope before mailing the letter./r/n 寄信前，他在信封上写上地址。/r/n The envelope was firmly sealed./r/n 这个信封封得很严实。/r/n

word.name: environ
word.lx: Trees environ the yard./r/n 树木环绕着那个院子。/r/n

word.name: environment
word.lx: Children need a happy home environment./r/n 孩子需要一个幸福的家庭环境。/r/n The convocation about environment will be held on next Monday./r/n 有关环境的会议将在下周一举行。/r/n

word.name: envy
word.mean:
v. 嫉妒,羡慕
n. 妒忌,羡慕
word.lx: I envy you./r/n 我羡慕你。/r/n He was filled with envy at my success./r/n 他对我的成功满怀羡慕。/r/n

word.name: ephemeral
word.mean: a. 朝生暮死的,生命短暂的

word.name: epidemic
word.mean:
n. 传染病,流行病
a. 流行的,传染性的
word.lx: I have an influenza epidemic./r/n 我得了流行性感冒。/r/n There has recently been an epidemic of crime in our major cities./r/n 近来我们一些大城市中罪案频繁。/r/n

word.name: EPROM
word.mean: 可擦可编程只读存储器

word.name: equal
word.mean:
n. 对手,匹敌,同辈
a. 相等的,平等的,胜任的
v. 等于,比得上
[计算机] 相等
word.lx: None of us can equal her, either in beauty or as a dancer./r/n 不管是容貌还是舞艺我们都比不上她。/r/n He feels that they are his equals./r/n 他觉得他们和他地位相等。/r/n

word.name: equally
word.mean: ad. 相等地,同样地,平等地
word.lx: We can both run equally fast./r/n 我们两个跑得一样快。/r/n They shared the work equally between them./r/n 他们把工作平分了。/r/n

word.name: equation
word.lx: The equation of wealth with happiness can be dangerous./r/n 把财富与幸福等同起来是很危险的/r/n What does x represent in this equation?/r/n 这个方程式中的x代表什麽?/r/n

word.name: equilibrium
word.lx: The equilibrium of force must be established in Europe./r/n 必须确立欧洲的均势。/r/n An influence or force tending to produce equilibrium; counterpoise./r/n 平衡力趋向于产生平衡的影响或力量；平衡、均衡/r/n

word.name: equip
word.lx: The room is equipped with air conditioning./r/n 这个房间装有空调设备。/r/n He is equipped with much experience in teaching./r/n 他具有丰富的教学经验。/r/n

word.name: equipment
word.lx: The complete equipment of the new hospital will take a year./r/n 新医院的全部设备需要一年才能装备好。/r/n The equipment must be bought from a supplier approved by the company./r/n 设备必须从公司认可的供应商那里购买。/r/n

word.name: equitable
word.lx: Impartial; just; equitable./r/n 公平的；公正的；无私的/r/n

word.name: equity
word.mean:
n. 权益，产权，股本；证券
n. 公平,公正

word.name: equivalent
word.mean:
a. 等价的,相等的
n. 相等物
word.lx: He changed his pounds for the equivalent amount in dollars./r/n 他把英镑兑换成等值的美元。/r/n Changing his job like that is equivalent to giving him the sack./r/n 那样调换他的工作等于是解雇了他。/r/n

word.name: equivocal
word.mean: a. 意义不明确的,模棱两可的
word.lx: The politician gave an equivocal answer./r/n 那政客的答覆模棱两可./r/n Having a grammatical structure that allows of two interpretations; equivocal./r/n 歧义的，模棱两可的一种语法结构可以有两种解释的；模棱两可的/r/n

word.name: equivocation
word.lx: Equivocation is first cousin to a lie./r/n 含糊其词是谎话的近亲。/r/n An equivocation; a quibble./r/n 遁辞模棱两可的话；遁辞/r/n

word.name: eradicate
word.lx: He eradicated weeds in his garden./r/n 他把花园中的杂草根除了。/r/n Smallpox has almost been eradicated./r/n 天花几乎已经被消灭了。/r/n

word.name: eraser
word.lx: I use an eraser./r/n 我使用橡皮擦。/r/n

word.name: erect
word.mean:
a. 直立的,竖立的,笔直的
v. 竖立,使...直立,建筑
word.lx: She held her head erect and her back straight./r/n 她昂着头，把背挺得笔直。/r/n They erected their tent at the foot of the mountain./r/n 他们在山脚下支起了帐篷。/r/n

word.name: erection
word.lx: The erection of the building took several months./r/n 建造这座建筑物花了好几个月时间。/r/n She calls the new opera house that hideous erection"./r/n 她把新歌剧院叫作 “那讨厌的庞然大物”。/r/n"

word.name: ergonomics
word.mean: 人类工程学,人机工程学

word.name: err
word.lx: To err is human./r/n 犯错人皆难免。/r/n She erred in failing to meet him in person./r/n 她错在没有亲自与他见面。/r/n

word.name: erratic
word.mean:
adj.无确定路线, 不稳定的, 奇怪的, 游走的，移动的；偏离的，偏执的，固执的, 无规律的,
漂泊的, 反复无常的,漂游的
n.古怪的人, 漂泊无定的人
word.lx: The singer gave an erratic performance./r/n 演唱者未唱出水平./r/n Deliveries of goods are erratic./r/n 不按规定送货./r/n

word.name: erroneous
word.lx: The result of your report is an erroneous conclusion./r/n 你的报告结果是错误的结论。/r/n We should not be infected by erroneous ideas./r/n 我们不应该受错误观念的影响。/r/n

word.name: error
word.lx: The accident was caused by human error./r/n 这宗事故是人为过失造成的。/r/n There are several errors in the input./r/n 输入中有好几处错误。/r/n

word.name: erupt
word.lx: Violence has erupted on the streets./r/n 大街上突然发生了暴乱./r/n The demonstration erupted into violence./r/n 示威游行中突然出现了武斗./r/n

word.name: eruption
word.lx: The eruption of volcano makes many people lose their lives./r/n 火山的爆发使许多人丧失了生命。/r/n The hostilities will be on eruption./r/n 战事即将爆发。/r/n

word.name: escalate
word.lx: Even a limited confrontation can escalate into a major war./r/n 即使是局部的对抗也可能扩大成一场大战。/r/n

word.name: escalation
word.lx: As what we have signed is a fix- price contract with escalation, the price can be changed without notice./r/n 由于我们所签的是一份标价伸缩合同，价格可以不经事先通知而变动。/r/n

word.name: escape
word.mean:
n. 逃亡,避难设备
v. 逃脱,避开,溜走
[计算机] 换码
word.lx: The thief jumped into a car and made his escape./r/n 小偷跳上汽车逃走了。/r/n The prisoner has escaped./r/n 犯人逃走了。/r/n

word.name: escort
word.mean:
n. 护送者,护卫者,护航舰
v. 护卫,护送
word.lx: He offered to be her escort, but she declined it./r/n 他提出护送她，但她谢绝了。/r/n The troop ship was escorted by two warships./r/n 运兵船由两艘军舰护航。/r/n

word.name: esoteric
word.lx: Belonging to or reserved for a small, select group; esoteric./r/n 秘密的属于一个挑选出来的小群人的；专为其保留的；秘传的/r/n Some words are really too esoteric for this dictionary./r/n 有些单词实在太生僻了，未收入本词典内。/r/n

word.name: especial
word.lx: This question is of especial importance./r/n 这个问题特别重要。/r/n Give my regards to Mary, John and by especial to Grandpa./r/n 代我向玛丽、约翰，尤其向爷爷问好。/r/n

word.name: especially
word.lx: Noise is unpleasant, especially when you are trying to sleep./r/n 噪音令人讨厌，尤其当你想睡觉的时候。/r/n I love the country, especially in spring./r/n 我喜欢这乡村，尤其是在春天。/r/n

word.name: essay
word.lx: There was a prize for the best essay on Shakespeare in the city./r/n 这个城市设立了关于莎士比亚的优秀论文奖。/r/n She made her first essays at cooking./r/n 她初次尝试做菜。/r/n

word.name: essential
word.mean:
n. 要素,要点
a. 必要的,重要的,本质的
word.lx: Food is essential to life./r/n 食物对生命是必不可少的。/r/n Her most essential quality is kindness./r/n 她最主要的品质是善良。/r/n

word.name: establish
word.lx: Our company was established in 1994./r/n 我们的公司成立于1994年。/r/n His second novel established his fame as a writer./r/n 他的第二部小说确立了他作家之名。/r/n

word.name: establishment
word.lx: He keeps a large establishment./r/n 他拥有巨大家业。/r/n The establishment of that school took five years./r/n 兴建那所学校花了五年的时间。/r/n

word.name: estate
word.lx: The old man left an estate of two million dollars when he died./r/n 那老人去世时留下二百万美元的遗产。/r/n He has a beautiful estate near London./r/n 他在离伦敦不远处有一个美丽的庄园。/r/n

word.name: esteem
word.mean:
n. 尊敬
v. 尊敬,尊重
word.lx: She esteemed that she knew what life was./r/n 她认为自己懂得什么是生活。/r/n We esteem him to be worthy of trust./r/n 我们认为他值得信任。/r/n

word.name: estimate
word.mean:
n. 估计,估价
v. 估计,估价,评价
word.lx: My estimate of the length of the room was 10 feet./r/n 我估计房间的长度为10 英尺。/r/n He is highly estimated among his colleagues./r/n 他在同事中受到的评价很高。/r/n

word.name: eternal
word.lx: The idea that the world is eternal is now seldom advanced./r/n 地球是永恒的这种看法现在很少提出了。/r/n The bad man will suffer eternal damnation./r/n 坏人将会受到永远的惩罚。/r/n

word.name: Ethernet
word.lx: The firewall machine will require two ethernet card, one interface to the outside world and one to the master pop network./r/n 防火墙计算机要求2张以太网卡，一个对外部世界的接口和一个对主POP网络的接口。/r/n

word.name: ethnic
word.mean:
a. 民族的，种族的
某文化群体的（典型的）
word.lx: A member of the predominant ethnic group of Iran./r/n 法尔西人伊朗主要种族的一员/r/n Ethnic enclaves in a large city./r/n 被围于大城市之中的少数民族/r/n

word.name: ethos
word.mean: n. 民族精神,社会思潮,风气

word.name: etiquette
word.lx: The forms of ceremony and etiquette observed by diplomats and heads of state./r/n 外交礼节外交官和国家元首遵守的礼节和礼仪形式/r/n Let us avoid the etiquette./r/n 让我们免除礼节。/r/n

word.name: Europe
word.lx: Is France in Europe?/r/n 法国在欧洲吗？/r/n At its zenith the Roman Empire covered almost the whole of Europe./r/n 罗马帝国在全盛时期几乎占据了整个欧洲。/r/n

word.name: European
word.mean:
a. 欧洲的
n. 欧洲人
word.lx: He looks European./r/n 他看上去像欧洲人。/r/n She is the only European in the class./r/n 她是班上唯一的欧洲人。/r/n

word.name: evacuate
word.lx: The region near the erupting volcano was evacuated rapidly./r/n 火山爆发处附近已迅速撤空./r/n The soldiers evacuated the area as the enemy advanced./r/n 敌军推进时, 士兵都撤出了那地区./r/n

word.name: evade
word.lx: He could not evade the law./r/n 他逃避不了法律。/r/n Genius is the capacity of evade hard work./r/n 天才是避免苦干的能力。/r/n

word.name: evaluation
word.lx: In software product evaluation, the totality of features and characteristics of a product or service that bear on its ability to satisfy stated or implied needs. Note: In a contractual environment, needs are specified, whereas in other environments, impl

word.name: evaporate
word.mean: v. 蒸发,失去水分,消失
word.lx: The water soon evaporated in the sunshine./r/n 水在阳光下不久就蒸发了。/r/n Heat evaporates water into steam./r/n 水受热变成水蒸汽。/r/n

word.name: evasion
word.lx: The senate was censured for income tax evasion./r/n 这名参议员因逃避缴纳所得税而受到指责。/r/n Skill in evasion or deception; guile./r/n 狡诈逃避或欺骗的技巧；诡计/r/n

word.name: evening
word.lx: Could you come back home early this evening?/r/n 今天晚上你能早回家吗？/r/n The evening sky flamed with red and orange./r/n 傍晚天空的颜色是一片火红和橘黄相间。/r/n

word.name: evenly
word.mean: ad. 平衡地,平坦地,平等地

word.name: eventful
word.mean: a. 变故多的,多事的,重要的
word.lx: He has had an eventful life./r/n 他一生有很多大事。/r/n It is an eventful year./r/n 这是一个有很多大事的一年。/r/n

word.name: events
word.lx: These events led to the declaration of war./r/n 这些事件导致了宣战。/r/n History chronicles important events of the past./r/n 历史记载历代重要的事件。/r/n

word.name: eventually
word.lx: It was a long journey, but we eventually arrived./r/n 旅程很长，但我们最后还是到达了。/r/n The road became narrower and rougher and eventually petered out./r/n 这条路越来越窄，越来越难走，最后终于消失了。/r/n

word.name: ever
word.lx: Have you ever been to Paris?/r/n 你去过巴黎吗？/r/n What ever are you doing?/r/n 你究竟在干什么？/r/n

word.name: evergreen
word.mean:
n. 常绿树,常绿植物
a. 常绿的
word.lx: Pines are evergreens./r/n 松树是常青树。/r/n I love these evergreen tunes./r/n 我喜欢这些经久不衰的老曲子。/r/n

word.name: everlasting
word.mean: a. 永恒的,持久的,无止境的
word.lx: He believes in life everlasting after death./r/n 他相信死后永生。/r/n His brave deeds in the battle earned him everlasting glory./r/n 他在那场战斗中的英勇事迹为他赢得了永恒的荣誉。/r/n

word.name: every
word.lx: I enjoyed every minute of the party./r/n 整个晚会我玩得都很愉快。/r/n He has read every book on the shelves./r/n 书架上所有的书他都读过了。/r/n

word.name: everyday
word.mean:
a. 每天的,日常的
b.平常的日子
word.lx: After the explosion it was some time before the town resumed its everyday routines./r/n 爆炸后经过相当一段时间，这个城镇才恢复了正常的生活秩序。/r/n He does twenty push-ups everyday./r/n 他每天做20个伏卧撑。/r/n

word.name: everyone
word.mean:
n. 每个人
pron. 每人,人人
word.lx: In a small village, everyone knows everyone else./r/n 在一个小村庄里，人人皆相识。/r/n Not everyone likes this book./r/n 并不是每个人都喜欢这本书。/r/n

word.name: everywhere
word.lx: The flowers are blooming everywhere./r/n 鲜花到处盛开。/r/n I was looking everywhere for Jenny./r/n 我到处找詹妮。/r/n

word.name: evict
word.lx: The lessor can evict the lessee for failure to pay rent./r/n 出租人可驱逐不付租金的承租人。/r/n The tenant was evicted for non-payment of rent./r/n 这个房客因为没有交房租而被赶出去了。/r/n

word.name: evident
word.lx: It was evident that the policy was a failure./r/n 显然这项政策是失败的。/r/n The purpose may not be immediately evident./r/n 这种目的不一定显而易见。/r/n

word.name: evidently
word.mean: ad. 明显地,显著地,必以为是

word.name: evil
word.mean:
a. 邪恶的,坏的
n. 邪恶,罪恶
word.lx: War, famine and flood are terrible evils./r/n 战争、饥荒和洪水都是可怕的灾祸。/r/n His behavior showed he was an evil person./r/n 他的行为表明他是一个邪恶的人。/r/n

word.name: evoke
word.lx: Tending or having the power to evoke./r/n 唤起…的，引起…的有能力唤起的/r/n Songs that evoke old memories./r/n 唤起往日回忆的歌曲/r/n

word.name: evolution
word.lx: Do you know about the evolution of a seed into a plant?/r/n 你知道从种子发展成为植物的过程吗？/r/n Our political institutions are in continuous evolution./r/n 我们的政治制度正在不断发展中./r/n

word.name: evolutionary
word.mean: a. 发展的(展开的,调优的)

word.name: ex
word.mean: n. 试验过的(过剩,激励器,激磁,排气,膨胀)

word.name: exactly
word.mean:
a. 完全的
ad. 恰好地,正好地,正确地,精确地,正是
word.lx: Tell me exactly where he is./r/n 确切地告诉我他在什么地方。/r/n Their answers are exactly the same./r/n 他们的回答完全一样。/r/n

word.name: exaggerate
word.lx: The seriousness of the situation has been much exaggerated by the press./r/n 形势的严重性被报纸夸大了。/r/n He has an exaggerated idea of his own importance./r/n 他自视过高。/r/n

word.name: exaggerated
word.lx: The seriousness of the situation has been much exaggerated by the press./r/n 形势的严重性被报纸夸大了。/r/n He has an exaggerated idea of his own importance./r/n 他自视过高。/r/n

word.name: exaggeration
word.lx: I can say without exaggeration that she is an angel./r/n 我可以毫不夸张地说她是个天使。/r/n The selected truths, exaggerations, and lies of wartime propaganda./r/n 被选择出来的事实、夸张以及战时宣传的谎言/r/n

word.name: exalted
word.mean: a. 尊贵的,高位的,高尚的
word.lx: Elevated in character; exalted./r/n 品德高尚的；崇高的/r/n He was exalted to the position of general manager./r/n 他被提升到总经理的职位。/r/n

word.name: examination
word.lx: The examination of all the witness lasted two hours./r/n 对全部证人的讯问持续了两个小时。/r/n I will take an examination tomorrow./r/n 明天我将参加一场考试。/r/n

word.name: examine
word.mean:
v. 检查,调查,考试
[计算机] 检测

word.name: example
word.lx: Her diligence has set an example to the others./r/n 她的勤奋为其他人树立了榜样。/r/n This church is a classic example of medieval architecture./r/n 这座教堂是中世纪建筑风格的典型实例。/r/n

word.name: exasperate
word.lx: She was exasperated at his stupidity./r/n 她因为他的愚笨而发怒。/r/n That child exasperates me./r/n 那孩子真让我生气。/r/n

word.name: excavate
word.lx: Excavate an ore-rich hillside./r/n 在富矿山上挖洞穴/r/n

word.name: exceed
word.mean:
v. 超过,胜过,越出
vt. 超过,胜过
word.lx: Demand began to exceed supply./r/n 开始供不应求。/r/n His knowledge of history exceeds mine./r/n 他的历史知识超过我。/r/n

word.name: exceedingly
word.mean: ad. 非常(极其,极度地,很)
word.lx: We found out that he was exceedingly fond of fishing./r/n 我们发现他极其喜欢钓鱼。/r/n My teacher asked me to answer an exceedingly difficult question./r/n 老师让我回答一个非常难的问题。/r/n

word.name: excel
word.mean:
v. 胜过,优于,擅长
[计算机] 软件名称
word.lx: He excels all other composers of his period./r/n 他超过了同时期的所有其他作曲家。/r/n He excels in painting./r/n 他擅长绘画。/r/n

word.name: excellence
word.lx: We all praised the excellence of her cooking./r/n 我们都称赞了她烹饪技术的高超。/r/n The firm is a byword for excellence./r/n 这家商号是优质的保证./r/n

word.name: excellent
word.lx: He worked out an excellent idea./r/n 他想出了一个极好的主意。/r/n Your examination results are excellent./r/n 你的考试成绩优异。/r/n

word.name: except
word.mean:
v. 除,除外,反对
prep. 除了...之外,若不是,除非
word.lx: I excepted James from my invitation./r/n 我没有邀请詹姆斯。/r/n They all went to sleep except me./r/n 除我之外，他们都去睡觉了。/r/n

word.name: exception
word.lx: Most children like sweets, but there are some exceptions./r/n 大多数孩子都喜欢吃糖果，但也有一些例外。/r/n He took great exception to what I said./r/n 他极力反对我的话。/r/n

word.name: excerpt
word.mean:
n. 摘录
v. 摘录,摘要
vt. 摘,引用

word.name: excess
word.mean:
a. 过量的,附加的
n. 超过,超越,过度,过量
word.lx: The fat boy went on a diet to get rid of his excess weight./r/n 这个胖男孩节制饮食以减轻过量的体重。/r/n Usury is interest in excess of a legal rate./r/n 高利贷是指超过法定利率取息。/r/n

word.name: excessive
word.lx: Excessive rainfall had made the harvest impossible./r/n 雨量过多，丰收已经不可能了。/r/n I consider the excessive smoking and drinking tend to cloud the brain./r/n 我认为过多的抽烟和过量的酗酒，会使人的头脑迟钝。/r/n

word.name: exchange
word.mean:
n. 交换,汇兑,交易所
v. 交换,交易,兑换
word.lx: A soldier was wounded in the exchange./r/n 一名士兵在交火中受伤。/r/n We exchanged our opinions about the event at the meeting./r/n 在会上，我们就此事交换了意见。/r/n

word.name: exchangeable
word.mean: a. 可交换的,可兑换的,可替换的

word.name: excise
word.mean:
n. 货物税,国产税
vt. 收税,切除
word.lx: The censor insisted on excising the passage from the film./r/n 电影审查员坚持剪去影片的这一段./r/n The surgeon excised the lump from her breast./r/n 外科医生切除了她乳房的肿块./r/n

word.name: excision
word.mean: n. 切除,删除,切除之物
word.lx: The excision, if not done in time, tends to complications./r/n 如不及时切除，可能导致并发症。/r/n The surgical excision of one or both of the adrenal glands./r/n 肾上腺切除术一个或一对肾上腺的外科切除手术/r/n

word.name: excite
word.lx: The good news excited everybody./r/n 这个好消息使每一个人都很兴奋。/r/n Your remark excited him to jealousy./r/n 你的话引起了他的嫉妒。/r/n

word.name: excited
word.lx: The boys broke into shrill, excited cheering./r/n 男孩子们突然迸发出刺耳的兴奋的欢呼声。/r/n I was so excited to see snow that I was indifferent to the cold./r/n 我看到雪激动得连寒冷都不在乎了。/r/n

word.name: excitement
word.lx: He kept calm amid all these excitements./r/n 他在这些使人激动的事件中保持镇静。/r/n The boys were running in excitement./r/n 男孩们兴奋地跑来跑去。/r/n

word.name: exciting
word.lx: What exciting news this is!/r/n 这是多么令人兴奋的消息！/r/n That is an exciting game./r/n 那是一场令人兴奋的比赛。/r/n

word.name: exclamation
word.lx: Good heavens!" is an exclamation of surprise./r/n “天哪！”是一个表示惊讶的感叹语。/r/n

word.name: exclude
word.mean:
v. 除外,排除,拒绝
[计算机] 排除
word.lx: We cannot exclude the possibility that he killed his wife./r/n 我们不能排除他杀了他妻子的可能性。/r/n No one was excluded from sentry duty./r/n 人人都得站岗放哨。/r/n

word.name: exclusion
word.lx: The exclusion of women from the temple made them feel sad./r/n 妇女被排斥于寺院之外使得她们很难过。/r/n He spends his spare time gardening, to the exclusion of all other interests./r/n 他把空余时间都用在园艺上了，没有任何其他爱好。/r/n

word.name: exclusive
word.mean:
a. 独占的,唯一的,排外的
[计算机] 互斥的
word.lx: This company has exclusive rights for the sale of Ford cars in the city./r/n 这家公司享有福特汽车在本市的独家经销权。/r/n Dictionary-making has not been his exclusive employment./r/n 编字典一直都不是他唯一的工作。/r/n

word.name: exclusively
word.mean: ad. 排他地(独占地,专门地,仅仅,只)
word.lx: He writes exclusively for China Daily./r/n 他专给《中国日报》写稿。/r/n This room is exclusively for women./r/n 这个房间是供妇女专用的。/r/n

word.name: excrete
word.lx: Dogs are not permitted to foul (ie excrete on) the pavement./r/n 禁止狗在人行道上便溺./r/n

word.name: excursion
word.lx: We shall make an excursion to Hangzhou this weekend./r/n 这个周末我们将去杭州旅行。/r/n The excursion was the high spot of our holiday./r/n 我们那个假日的最大乐趣是远足。/r/n

word.name: excuse
word.mean:
n. 借口,理由；低劣的样品
v. 原谅
word.lx: Please excuse my bad handwriting./r/n 请原谅我的字写得不好。/r/n His excuse for being late was that he had missed the train./r/n 他迟到的理由是没有赶上火车。/r/n

word.name: executable
word.lx: A program that translates a source program into an executable program(an object program)./r/n 一种把源程序翻译成可执行程序（即目标程序）的程序。/r/n

word.name: execution
word.lx: There used to be public executions./r/n 处决囚犯过去都是公开执行的。/r/n The artillery did great execution./r/n 这种大炮的威力很大。/r/n

word.name: executive
word.mean:
a. 行政的
n. 执行者,主管
word.lx: The President of the United States is the chief executive./r/n 美国总统是行政首脑。/r/n He is a man of great executive ability./r/n 他是个具有极高管理才能的人。/r/n

word.name: executor
word.lx: He was appointed to act as the executor./r/n 他被指定为遗嘱执行人。/r/n The executor shared out the estate./r/n 遗嘱执行人把遗产分给各人。/r/n

word.name: exempt
word.mean:
n. 免税者,被免除义务者
a. 免除的
v. 使免除
word.lx: Poor eyesight will exempt you from military service./r/n 视力不佳将使你免服兵役。/r/n These houses are exempt from paying rates./r/n 这些房子是免付捐税的。/r/n

word.name: exert
word.mean: v. 发挥,运用,施以影响
word.lx: Her husband exerted a lot of pressure on her to succeed./r/n 她丈夫殷切地希望她能成功，给了她很大的压力。/r/n He exerted all his influence to make them accept his plan./r/n 他用尽一切影响力使他们接受他的计划。/r/n

word.name: exhale
word.lx: She exhaled slowly to show her annoyance./r/n 她长叹以示厌烦。/r/n He lit his cigar and exhaled smoke./r/n 他点燃雪茄，然后吐出烟雾。/r/n

word.name: exhaust
word.mean:
n. 排气,排气装置
v. 用尽,耗尽,使...精疲力尽
[计算机] 排除
word.lx: She did not cry out; her tears were exhausted./r/n 她哭不出来了，因为眼泪都已哭干了。/r/n The exhaust pipe shot sparks./r/n 排气管中射出了火星。/r/n

word.name: exhausted
word.mean:
v. 取尽(排出,详细讨论,包括)
a. 用完的
word.lx: The exhausted troops surrendered./r/n 部队人困马乏结果投降了。/r/n The tail exhaust pipe of the motor vehicle emitted poisonous smoke./r/n 机动车的尾部排气管排出有毒的浓烟。/r/n

word.name: exhaustion
word.mean: n. 疲惫,筋疲力尽,竭尽
word.lx: The mine was closed owing to exhaustion./r/n 这个煤矿因矿源枯竭而被关闭。/r/n He is in a state of exhaustion./r/n 他在疲惫状态中。/r/n

word.name: exhaustive
word.mean: a. 无遗漏的,彻底的,详尽的
word.lx: An exhaustive study./r/n 一项彻底的研究/r/n

word.name: exhibit
word.mean:
n. 展览品,陈列品,展览
v. 展现,陈列,展览
[计算机] 呈现
word.lx: Many unearthed cultural relics were exhibited at the museum./r/n 博物馆展出了许多出土文物。/r/n She exhibited great powers of endurance during the climb./r/n 她在攀登过程中表现出极大的耐力。/r/n

word.name: exhibition
word.lx: Did you see the art exhibition downtown?/r/n 你看了闹市区的美术展览吗？/r/n People at the party were embarrassed when Frank got drunk and made an exhibition of himself./r/n 弗兰克喝醉了，出尽洋相，使参加聚会的人很难为情。/r/n

word.name: exhilarate
word.mean: v. 使高兴的,使愉快的

word.name: exhort
word.lx: The chairman exhorted the party workers to take action./r/n 主席敦促党的工作人员采取行动。/r/n He often exhorts Mary to work harder./r/n 他经常勉励玛丽要更加努力工作。/r/n

word.name: exile
word.mean:
n. 放逐,流放,被放逐者
v. 放逐,流放
word.lx: He was exiled from the country for one year./r/n 他被放逐一年。/r/n The king was sent into exile./r/n 国王遭到放逐。/r/n

word.name: exist
word.lx: The Roman Empire existed for several centuries./r/n 罗马帝国存在了几百年。/r/n Man cannot exist without air./r/n 没有空气人就不能生存。/r/n

word.name: existence
word.lx: The newspaper ceased to appear after an existence of three months./r/n 该报发行3 个月后停刊了。/r/n The family lived a precarious existence./r/n 这家人过着朝不保夕的生活。/r/n

word.name: exit
word.mean:
n. 出口,退场,离去
v. 退出,脱离
word.lx: At the end of the third scene the actress exits./r/n 该女演员于第三场结束时退场。/r/n There are four emergency exits in the department store./r/n 这家百货公司有四个紧急出口。/r/n

word.name: exonerate
word.mean:
v. 免除责任,确定无罪
vt. 使免罪

word.name: exorbitant
word.lx: The practice of lending money and charging the borrower interest, especially at an exorbitant or illegally high rate./r/n 高利贷借给他人钱并要求贷者付很高的利息的做法，尤其利息异常地或非法地高/r/n

word.name: expand
word.mean:
v. 使...膨胀,详述,扩张
[计算机] 扩充
word.lx: The petals of many flowers expand in the sunshine./r/n 许多花的花瓣在阳光中绽放。/r/n Our foreign trade has expanded during recent years./r/n 近年来我们的对外贸易有所扩大。/r/n

word.name: expanding
word.lx: The expanding economy enriched the peasants./r/n 不断发展的经济使农民们富裕起来。/r/n The project was predicated on the assumption that the economy was expanding./r/n 这一计划是以经济发展的设想为依据的./r/n

word.name: expansion
word.lx: Metals undergo expansion when heated./r/n 金属加热时会膨胀。/r/n This book is an expansion of the play he wrote before./r/n 这本书是他以前写的剧本的扩充。/r/n

word.name: expect
word.lx: The journey was not as nice as we had expected./r/n 旅途不象我们预想的那样好。/r/n I will do what is expected of me./r/n 我会尽本分的。/r/n

word.name: expectancy
word.lx: Women have a higher life expectancy than men./r/n 女人比男人的预期寿命长./r/n A quiver of expectancy ran through the audience./r/n 全场引颈以待, 群情鼎沸./r/n

word.name: expectation
word.mean:
n. 期待,期望
v. 期待,前程
word.lx: He has great expectations from his uncle./r/n 他渴望从叔叔那继承大笔遗产。/r/n She ate a light lunch in expectation of a good dinner./r/n 她午饭吃得很少，期待晚饭时饱餐一顿。/r/n

word.name: expedience
word.lx: He acted from expediency, not from principle./r/n 他为求达到目的, 丧失了原则./r/n

word.name: expedient
word.mean:
n. 权宜之计,临时手段
a. 权宜的,方便的,有用的

word.name: expedite
word.lx: Expedite offer afraid buyer ready withdraw as others contact him./r/n 糨公司正与之接触，请速予报价，否则买主准备撤走。/r/n Shipment is ready, expedite credit./r/n 船已装完，请速开信用证。/r/n

word.name: expedition
word.lx: The mail is conveyed with expedition./r/n 那封信被迅速地传递出去。/r/n They planned to organize a scientific expedition./r/n 他们计划组织一次科学考察。/r/n

word.name: expel
word.lx: He was expelled from the school./r/n 他被学校开除了。/r/n The bullet was expelled from the gun./r/n 子弹从枪中射出。/r/n

word.name: expenditure
word.mean: n. (时间、劳力、金钱等)支出,使用,消耗
word.lx: The expenditure of money on weapons is very large./r/n 购置武器的开支很大。/r/n Limit your expenditure to what is essential./r/n 你要把开销限制在必要的范围内。/r/n

word.name: expenses
word.lx: The incidental expenses of cars in this city are expensive./r/n 这个城市汽车的附加费用很昂贵。/r/n Could you detail all your expenses on this form?/r/n 请把你的各项开支列在这张表格上，好吗？/r/n

word.name: expensive
word.lx: The dress is too expensive for me to buy./r/n 那衣服太昂贵，我买不起。/r/n The manufacture of these small components is expensive./r/n 制造这些小部件是非常昂贵的。/r/n

word.name: experience
word.mean:
n. 经历,经验
v. 经历,体验

word.name: experienced
word.lx: I want some persons more experienced than Tom./r/n 我要一些比汤姆更有经验的人。/r/n Only experienced pilots fly large passenger aircraft./r/n 只有有经验的飞行员才能驾驶大型客机。/r/n

word.name: experiment
word.mean:
n. 实验,试验,尝试
v. 实验,尝试
word.lx: Some scientists experiment on animals./r/n 有些科学家用动物做试验。/r/n Small businesses are anxious to experiment with computers./r/n 小型企业都急于试用计算机。/r/n

word.name: experimental
word.mean: a. 实验(性)的,试验(性)的
word.lx: The technique is still at the experimental stage./r/n 这项技术正处于实验阶段。/r/n In experimental plots the yield has been doubled./r/n 在试验田里，产量已（被）提高了一倍。/r/n

word.name: experimentation
word.lx: The process of conducting such a test; experimentation./r/n 实验过程做这种试验的过程；实验/r/n A room or building equipped for scientific experimentation or research./r/n 实验室用于科学实验或研究的房屋或建筑/r/n

word.name: expert
word.mean:
a. 熟练的,内行的
n. 专家,能手
word.lx: According to expert opinions, they gave up the experiment immediately./r/n 根据专家们的意见，他们马上放弃了这项试验。/r/n He is an well-known expert in finance./r/n 他是知名的金融专家。/r/n

word.name: expertise
word.mean: n. 专家的意见,专门技术

word.name: expiration
word.lx: The expiration of contract is coming./r/n 合同快到期了。/r/n When is the expiration of your driving license?/r/n 你的驾驶执照何时到期？/r/n

word.name: explain
word.lx: That explains why she is not here./r/n 那就说明了她不在这里的原因。/r/n The lawyer explained the new law to us./r/n 律师向我们解释了新法律。/r/n

word.name: explanation
word.lx: Did he provide a satisfactory explanation?/r/n 他是否给出了令人满意的解释？/r/n What did he say in explanation of his stupid behavior?/r/n 他说了什么来解释他那愚蠢的行为？/r/n

word.name: explanatory
word.lx: An explanatory table or list of the symbols appearing on a map or chart./r/n 图例对出现在地图上或图表中的有关符号进行解释的一览表或清单/r/n Serving to explain; explanatory./r/n 作解释用的；说明的/r/n

word.name: explicit
word.mean: a. 明确的,详述的，明晰的,外在的
word.lx: He gave me explicit directions on how to get there./r/n 他清清楚楚地告诉我怎样到达那里./r/n She was quite explicit about why she left./r/n 她对自己离去的原因直言不讳./r/n

word.name: explicitly
word.mean: ad. 明白地, 明确地
word.lx: The definition of a global symbol that is not explicitly available for reference by modules linked with the module in which the definition occurs./r/n 一种全局符号定义，它不能被与定义该全局符号的模块相链接的其它模块直接引用。/r/n

word.name: explode
word.mean:
v. 爆炸,爆发,激发
[计算机] 爆炸
word.lx: He exploded with rage./r/n 他勃然大怒，暴跳如雷。/r/n The firework exploded in his hand./r/n 那个爆竹在他手里响了。/r/n

word.name: exploit
word.mean:
n. 功绩,勋绩
v. 开发,利用,开拓
word.lx: People should read the related regulations before they exploit natural resources./r/n 在开发自然资源前，人们应该先了解相关的规定。/r/n Television advertisers can exploit a captive audience./r/n 电视广告商能利用被动观众./r/n

word.name: exploitation
word.mean: n. 开发,开采,自私的利用
word.lx: Generally speaking, mineral exploitation is a feast-or-famine industry./r/n 一般来说，开矿这种事业不是大大成功便是彻底失败。/r/n Exploitation of unwary consumers./r/n 对粗心消费者的不当利用/r/n

word.name: explore
word.mean:
v. 探险,探测,探究
[计算机] 探讨
word.lx: The experts are exploring every part of the island./r/n 专家们正在勘查这个岛的各个部分。/r/n He had an itch to get away and explore./r/n 他等不及要动身去探险。/r/n

word.name: explorer
word.lx: This famous explorer finally died in loneliness./r/n 这位著名的探险家最后在孤寂中死去。/r/n Christopher Columbus was one of the great explorers./r/n 克里斯托弗·哥伦布是伟大的探险家。/r/n

word.name: explosion
word.lx: The explosion of oil prices caused an economical crisis./r/n 石油价格的急剧上涨引起了经济危机。/r/n The explosion was heard a mile away./r/n 那爆炸声一英里外也可以听到。/r/n

word.name: explosive
word.mean:
a. 爆炸(性)的
n. 炸药
word.lx: Hydrogen is highly explosive./r/n 氢极易爆炸。/r/n Politics can be an explosive subject./r/n 政治问题容易引起争论。/r/n

word.name: exponent
word.mean:
n. 说明者,说明物
a. 说明的
n. 指数

word.name: export
word.lx: What are the chief exports of your country?/r/n 你们国家有哪些主要的出口物品？/r/n Africa is exporting beef to Europe./r/n 非洲向欧洲出口牛肉。/r/n

word.name: exporter
word.lx: Argentina is a big exporter of beef products./r/n 阿根廷是牛肉制品的一大出口国。/r/n Our exporters proudly kept the flag flying at the international trade exhibition./r/n 在国际贸易展览会上，我国的出口商为国争光。/r/n

word.name: exposition
word.mean: n. 博览会,展览会,说明
word.lx: The industrial exposition will be held on September./r/n 工业博览会将于九月召开。/r/n He made an exposition of the advantages of nuclear power./r/n 他对核动力的优越性做了阐述。/r/n

word.name: exposure
word.lx: Exposure of the body to strong sunlight can be harmful./r/n 身体受烈日暴晒会造成伤害。/r/n How many exposures have you left?/r/n 还剩多少底片没有照？/r/n

word.name: expression
word.mean: n. 表达,表示,表现,表情,措辞,词句
word.lx: The scenery was beautiful beyond expression./r/n 那风景美丽得无法形容。/r/n There was an expression of discontent on her face./r/n 她脸上有不满的表情。/r/n

word.name: expressway
word.lx: A toll is charged for the use of the expressway./r/n 在那条高速公路上行驶需付通行费。/r/n The expressway mars the beauty of the countryside./r/n 这条高速公路破坏了农村的田园美景。/r/n

word.name: expunge
word.lx: Her name was expunged from the list./r/n 她的名字已从名册上除掉./r/n

word.name: exquisite
word.mean: a. 精致的,细腻的,敏锐的
word.lx: Her skirt has very exquisite lace./r/n 她的裙子有非常精致的花边。/r/n The girl came up with a set of exquisite stamps./r/n 那姑娘拿出一套精美的邮票。/r/n

word.name: extend
word.mean: v. 扩充,延伸,伸展,扩展
word.lx: The hot weather extended into October./r/n 炎热天气一直持续到十月。/r/n My garden extends as far as the river./r/n 我的花园一直伸展到河边。/r/n

word.name: extension
word.lx: He built an extension onto his house./r/n 他给自己的住宅扩建了一部分。/r/n She has an extension in the kitchen and in the bedroom./r/n 她的厨房和卧室都有电话分机。/r/n

word.name: extensive
word.lx: He selected an extensive reading course this term./r/n 这个学期他选修了泛读课程。/r/n The teacher had both extensive knowledge and profound scholarship./r/n 先生的学问博大精深。/r/n

word.name: extensively
word.lx: He has read extensively./r/n 他阅读广泛。/r/n Around here apple trees began to be planted extensively in1953./r/n 1953年这一带开始大规模种植苹果树。/r/n

word.name: extent
word.mean:
n. 广度,宽度,长度,大小,范围,范围,程度
n. [律]<英>扣押, <美>临时所有权令
word.lx: I was amazed at the extent of his knowledge./r/n 我对他知识的渊博感到惊奇。/r/n From the roof we were able to see the full extent of the park./r/n 从屋顶上我们能看到公园的全景。/r/n

word.name: exterior
word.mean:
n. 外部,表面,外型
a. 外部的,外在的,表面的
[计算机] 外部的
word.lx: She maintained a calm exterior, though really she was furious./r/n 在外表上她保持着平静，但实际上她生气极了。/r/n Some artists only paint exteriors./r/n 有些画家只画户外景象。/r/n

word.name: external
word.mean:
n. 外部
a. 外部的,外用的,客观的,表面的
word.lx: This news program only covers external events./r/n 这一新闻节目只报道国外消息。/r/n All his injuries are external./r/n 他受的伤都是外伤。/r/n

word.name: extinct
word.mean:
a. 灭绝的,熄灭的
n. 消灭,熄灭
word.lx: Dinosaurs have been extinct for millions of years./r/n 恐龙已绝种几百万年了。/r/n An extinct volcano./r/n 一座死火山/r/n

word.name: extinction
word.lx: Is the human race threatened with complete extinction?/r/n 人类是否会受到完全灭绝的威胁呢？/r/n The race was threatened with extinction./r/n 这个种族这时眼看要灭绝了。/r/n

word.name: extinguish
word.lx: Smoking is forbidden. Please extinguish your cigarettes./r/n 吸烟是禁止的，请你把烟熄掉。/r/n Nothing could extinguish his faith in human nature./r/n 没有什么能使他丧失对人性的信心。/r/n

word.name: extort
word.lx: Something of value extorted in this manner./r/n 勒索之物通过此种手段强取的有价值之物/r/n An unwarranted fee, such as one extorted from a new prisoner by a jailer./r/n 勒索的金钱一笔不正当的费用，如看守向新囚犯勒索/r/n

word.name: extra
word.mean:
a. 额外的
ad. 特别地
n. 额外的事物
word.lx: There were so many people that the company put on extra buses./r/n 人数太多，公司加开了公共汽车。/r/n This dress is of extra fine quality./r/n 这件衣服的质地特别好。/r/n

word.name: extract
word.mean:
n. 榨出物,精汁,选粹
v. 摘录,提取,吸取
[计算机] 提取
