word.lx: That publican of the bar is a woman./r/n 那家酒馆的老板是个女的。/r/n

word.name: publication
word.mean: n. 出版,发行,出版物,公布,发表
word.lx: The book is ready for publication./r/n 这本书已准备好随时出版。/r/n The library gets the usual monthly publications./r/n 这家图书馆订的是那些常见的月刊。/r/n

word.name: publicist
word.mean: n. 国际法学家,政治评论家,政治记者
word.lx: He was a distinguished publicist./r/n 他是一位卓越的宣传家。/r/n

word.name: publicity
word.mean: n. 公众的注意,宣传,宣扬,宣传品,广告
word.lx: The matter received wide publicity./r/n 这件事已是众所周知。/r/n The newspaper gave much publicity to the concert./r/n 报纸对这次音乐会进行了充分报道。/r/n

word.name: publicize
word.lx: A large, usually printed placard, bill, or announcement, often illustrated, that is posted to advertise or publicize something./r/n 海报通常印刷而成的大布告、招贴或公告，常附有插图，张贴以用来宣传或公布某事/r/n

word.name: publicly
word.lx: She rapped the Minister publicly for his indiscreet remarks./r/n 她公开斥责那位大臣言论失当./r/n After the defeat two generals were publicly disgraced./r/n 那两位将军吃了败仗之後, 在公众心目中威望扫地./r/n

word.name: publish
word.mean:
v. 出版
vt. 出版,发行
word.lx: He has published quite a lot of articles./r/n 他发表了不少文章。/r/n Her book was published last year./r/n 她的书去年发表了。/r/n

word.name: publisher
word.lx: The writer refused to make further negotiations with their publisher./r/n 那位作家拒绝和他们的出版社进一步商讨。/r/n Several publishers are competing in the same market./r/n 几家出版公司正在同一市场上进行竞争。/r/n

word.name: publishing
word.lx: The publishing house infringed his copyright./r/n 出版社侵犯了他的版权。/r/n The government has sought an injunction preventing the paper from publishing the story./r/n 政府已经申请禁令，禁止该报发表此事。/r/n

word.name: puckish
word.mean: a. 爱恶作剧的,精灵似的,淘气的,顽皮的

word.name: puddle
word.mean:
n. 水池,地上积水,胶泥
v. 搅浊,在泥污中打滚,排尿
word.lx: The puddle is full of water./r/n 水坑里充满了水。/r/n He stepped lightly over the puddle./r/n 他敏捷地跨过泥水坑。/r/n

word.name: pueblo
word.mean: 普韦布洛(美国科罗拉多州中部一城市)

word.name: puerile
word.mean: a. 孩子气的,天真的,未成熟的
word.lx: John made mincemeat of all her arguments, and said that he had never heard anything so puerile before./r/n 约翰把她的论点驳得体无完肤，并说他从来没有听过这样幼稚可笑的道理。/r/n

word.name: Puerto Rico
word.lx: An island of the West Indies east of Puerto Rico. It is the largest of the British Virgin Islands./r/n 托托拉岛西印度群岛中一岛屿，位于波多黎各以东，它是英属维尔金群岛中最大的一个岛屿/r/n

word.name: puff
word.mean:
n. 一阵喷烟,粉扑,泡夫
v. 喷出,张开,夸张
word.lx: He blew out the candles with a single puff./r/n 他一口气吹灭了蜡烛。/r/n His speech was just puff./r/n 他的发言尽是吹捧而已。/r/n

word.name: puffs
word.mean: n. 被动的水下发射控制的现实性研究
word.lx: He blew out the candles with a single puff./r/n 他一口气吹灭了蜡烛。/r/n There was a puff of steam from the engine before it stopped./r/n 机车喷出一股蒸气後就停了下来./r/n

word.name: pugnacious
word.lx: A pugnacious, unyielding, or determined person./r/n 好斗者好斗的、不屈服的或有毅力的人/r/n

word.name: puissant
word.mean: a. 强力的,强盛的,有权力的

word.name: puke
word.lx: The baby puked (up) all over me./r/n 这小孩儿吐了我一身./r/n It makes me want to puke (ie It disgusts me)!/r/n 这真让人恶心（使我感到厌恶）!/r/n

word.name: pullover
word.lx: The hot water shrank my pullover./r/n 我的套头毛衣遇热水後收缩了./r/n The pullover stretched (ie out of shape) after I had worn it a few times./r/n 这件套头毛衣我穿了几次之後就撑大了（变形了）./r/n

word.name: pulpit
word.lx: The policy was condemned (ie by clergymen) from the pulpit./r/n 该项政策受到神职人员的谴责./r/n

word.name: pulsate
word.mean: v. 搏动,悸动,有规律的鼓动
word.lx: The air seemed to pulsate with the bright light./r/n 空气似乎随着亮光而颤动。/r/n

word.name: pulse
word.mean:
n. 脉冲,脉波,脉搏
v. 跳动,脉跳
word.lx: He knew the pulse of the people./r/n 他了解人民的意向。/r/n The excitement quickened my pulse./r/n 激动使我的心跳加快。/r/n

word.name: pulverize
word.lx: He pulverized the opposition with the force of his oratory./r/n 他能言善辩把对方驳得体无完肤./r/n

word.name: pummel
word.lx: The child pummelled his mother angrily as she carried him home./r/n 那孩子因其母带他回家而生气地捶打著母亲./r/n The child pummels his mother angrily as she carries him home./r/n 那孩子因其母带他回家而生气地捶打著母亲。/r/n

word.name: pumpkin
word.lx: His wife made some pumpkin pies for supper./r/n 他妻子做了一些南瓜馅饼作晚餐。/r/n A lantern made from a hollowed pumpkin with a carved face, usually displayed on Halloween./r/n 杰克灯，南瓜灯把南瓜挖空并雕成人面形状，通常在万圣节出现/r/n

word.name: punch
word.mean:
n. 打洞器,钻孔机,殴打
v. 以拳重击,开洞,剪票
n. 酒、水、糖等制成的鸡尾酒
word.lx: They cut holes on the sheet of metal with a punch press./r/n 他们用冲床在金属板上打孔。/r/n The conductor punched his bus ticket./r/n 售票员用剪票夹在他的汽车票上打孔。/r/n

word.name: punching
word.mean: n. 拳打(动名词作名词用,不可数)
word.lx: Small pieces of paper or cardboard generated by punching holes in paper tape or data cards./r/n 孔屑在纸带或数据卡片上打孔所产生的小纸屑或硬纸片/r/n They cut holes on the sheet of metal with a punch press./r/n 他们用冲床在金属板上打孔。/r/n

word.name: punctilious
word.mean: a. 精密细心的,一丝苟的,拘泥形式的

word.name: punctual
word.mean: a. 严守时刻的,准时的,正点的
word.lx: My cat makes a punctual appearance at mealtimes./r/n 我的猫一到用餐时间就会准时出现。/r/n We cannot guarantee the punctual arrival of trains in fogy weather./r/n 雾天我们不能保证火车准时到达。/r/n

word.name: punctually
word.lx: Please make every endeavour to arrive punctually./r/n 请尽量准时到达./r/n Thank heavens the ship was late leaving! Had it left punctually, we should have missed it./r/n 谢天谢地，船开晚了！要是准时开，我们就搭不上了。/r/n

word.name: punctuate
word.mean: vt. 强调(加标点于,不时打断发言等)
word.lx: He punctuatedhis remarks with thumps on the table./r/n 他讲话时不时地捶著桌子./r/n The announcement was punctuated by cheers from the crowd./r/n 在宣布过程中, 群众的欢呼声此起彼伏./r/n

word.name: punctuation
word.lx: Our teacher has a bee in his bonnet about punctuation./r/n 我们的老师没完没了地琢磨著标点符号./r/n Our teacher is very fussy about punctuation./r/n 我们的老师对标点符号非常重视./r/n

word.name: punctuation mark
word.lx: A written or printed symbol used for punctuation; a punctuation mark./r/n 标点符号书写或打印的用作标点的符号；标点符号/r/n

word.name: pundit
word.mean: n. 学者,梵学者,博学的人
word.lx: The pundits disagree on the best way of dealing with the problem./r/n 如何妥善处理这一问题, 专家众说纷纭./r/n A political pundit./r/n 政治评论家/r/n

word.name: pungent
word.mean: a. 苦痛的,刺激性的,严厉的
word.lx: He exhaled the pungent odor of garlic./r/n 他散发出刺鼻的大蒜味。/r/n Sharp or pungent to the smell./r/n 浓烈的气味辛辣或浓烈的/r/n

word.name: punish
word.lx: Dangerous driving should be severely punished./r/n 危险驾驶应受严惩。/r/n Their teacher punished them for their rudeness./r/n 老师因为他们态度粗鲁而责罚他们。/r/n

word.name: punishment
word.lx: The engine can withstand a great deal of punishment./r/n 这台发动机坚固耐用。/r/n The punishment inflicted on them was too mild./r/n 他们受的惩罚太轻。/r/n

word.name: punitive
word.lx: Effective, punitive, or destructive action./r/n 有效的行为有效的、惩罚的或破坏性的行为/r/n Exacting retribution; punitive./r/n 复仇性的；制裁性的/r/n

word.name: punk
word.mean:
a. 颓废派的
n. (俚)阿飞,朋克

word.name: punt
word.lx: She soon learned to punt./r/n 她很快就学会了撑方头平底船./r/n They punted along the river./r/n 他们撑著方头平底船沿河航行./r/n

word.name: puny
word.lx: What a puny creature!/r/n 多瘦小啊！/r/n They laughed at my puny efforts at rock-climbing./r/n 他们取笑我在攀岩活动中的那可怜劲儿。/r/n

word.name: pupa
word.lx: The children tore the cocoon open to see if there was a pupa./r/n 孩子们撕开蚕茧看看里面有没有蛹。/r/n Enclosed in an oval, horny case. Used of an insect pupa./r/n 壳内的封闭在椭圆形角质壳内的。用于一虫蛹/r/n

word.name: pupil
word.lx: How many pupils are there in your class?/r/n 你的班里有多少名小学生？/r/n The painting is the work of a pupil of Rembrandt./r/n 这幅画是伦勃朗的一位弟子的作品。/r/n

word.name: puppet
word.lx: Are we the puppets of fate?/r/n 我们是听任命运摆布的傀儡吗？/r/n The revolutionist planned to overturn this puppet regime./r/n 革命者计划推翻傀儡政府。/r/n

word.name: puppetry
word.mean: n. (总称)木偶,木偶制作(或演出)

word.name: puppy
word.lx: My father bought me a puppy as a birthday gift./r/n 父亲给我买了一只小狗作为生日礼物。/r/n The puppy was fawning on its master./r/n 小狗朝着主人摇尾乞怜。/r/n

word.name: purblind
word.mean: a. 半盲的,惺松眼的,愚钝的

word.name: purchasable
word.lx: A purchasable senator./r/n 腐化堕落的参议员/r/n Steel plate purchasable if so purchase price and delivery time expect?/r/n 能否购得钢板？若可能，约何时发货，价格如何？/r/n

word.name: purchase
word.mean:
n. 购买,购买的物品
v. 购买
word.lx: He managed to secure a loan to purchase a house./r/n 他设法弄到一笔贷款买了一栋房子。/r/n She made several purchases in the dress shop./r/n 她在服装店里买了几样东西。/r/n

word.name: purchaser
word.lx: The purchaser of the house will pay the deposit next week./r/n 买房者下星期付定金。/r/n The shares of the firm will be owned by many purchasers./r/n 那家公司的股票由购买者所有。/r/n

word.name: pure
word.mean: a. 纯的,纯洁的,纯理论的,抽象的,完全的
word.lx: Is this garment made of pure wool, or of wool mixed with nylon?/r/n 这件衣服是纯羊毛的，还是羊毛与尼龙混纺的 ？/r/n She is a pure girl./r/n 她是一个纯洁的女孩。/r/n

word.name: puree
word.lx: Make a puree of the vegetables./r/n 做蔬菜泥吧./r/n She fed the baby on pureed carrots./r/n 她用胡萝卜泥喂养那婴儿./r/n

word.name: purely
word.mean: ad. 纯粹地,清洁地,贞淑地
word.lx: The question is purely academic./r/n 这是一个纯学术性的问题。/r/n His conclusions are purely speculative./r/n 他的结论完全是推测而来的。/r/n

word.name: purgative
word.lx: Take some purgative and it will help you purge your bowels of bad matter./r/n 吃点泻药有助于你将肠胃中的有害物质除去。/r/n Causing evacuation, especially of the bowels; purgative./r/n 排泄的，排除的引起腹泻，尤指肠泻的；净肠的/r/n

word.name: purgatory
word.mean:
n. 灵魂的净化,涤罪,炼狱
a. 涤罪的

word.name: purge
word.mean:
n. 整肃,清除,泻药
v. 清除,泻,整肃
word.lx: We may purge water by distillation./r/n 我们可以用蒸馏法使水净化。/r/n A dose of this stuff will purge you!/r/n 这种药只须一剂就能让你通便!/r/n

word.name: purification
word.lx: Purification of water may be achieved by distillation./r/n 水的净化可由蒸馏获得。/r/n Reading a good book may bring purification to souls./r/n 读一本好书可以带来心灵的净化。/r/n

word.name: purify
word.lx: You can purify the water by distilling./r/n 你可以通过蒸馏来净化水。/r/n The act or an instance of cleansing or purifying./r/n 净化洗涤或净化的行为或情况/r/n

word.name: Puritan
word.lx: He is too much of a puritan to enjoy dancing./r/n 他在生活上过于奉行清教徒式的原则，所以不能领略跳舞的乐趣。/r/n As a Puritan, he is strict in moral and religion./r/n 作为清教徒，他的道德和宗教观念都很严格。/r/n

word.name: purlieu
word.mean: n. 森林边缘地,常去的地方,范围,界限

word.name: purple
word.mean:
a. 紫色的
n. 紫色
word.lx: That girl likes to wear purple dresses./r/n 那个女孩喜欢穿紫色的衣服。/r/n He was born to the purple./r/n 他出身皇族。/r/n

word.name: purport
word.mean:
n. 意义,要旨,大要
v. 意味著,做为...要旨,要领是...
word.lx: The purport of the statement is that the firm is bankrupt./r/n 该项声明大意是说该商行已经破产。/r/n The purport of what he said is that he is right./r/n 他说话的涵义是说他是对的。/r/n

word.name: purpose
word.lx: Did you come to London for the purpose of seeing your family, or for business purposes?/r/n 你到伦敦来的目的是为了要看望家人还是为了公事？/r/n She seems to do these things on purpose./r/n 她似乎是有意地做这些事。/r/n

word.name: purposeful
word.lx: They dealt with the problem in a purposeful way./r/n 他们处理这问题很果断./r/n Purposeful or industrious activity; enterprise./r/n 企图，进取心有目的的、勤勉刻苦的行动；进取心/r/n

word.name: purr
word.mean:
v. 姑噜姑噜叫,发出喉音
n. 姑噜姑噜声
word.lx: The cat purred loudly./r/n 那只猫大声地发出呼噜呼噜声。/r/n I heard a car engine purring smoothly./r/n 我听到一辆汽车发动机发出平稳的轰隆声。/r/n

word.name: purse
word.mean:
n. 钱包, 资金,金钱,财富
v. 皱起，使缩拢
word.lx: Her purse was stolen when she was on the bus./r/n 她的手袋在公共汽车上被偷了。/r/n The loss of her purse caused her much inconvenience./r/n 丢失钱包给她带来了诸多不便。/r/n

word.name: pursuant
word.mean:
adjective [after verb] FORMAL OR LEGAL
according to 按照(根据,与...致,合乎,和-一致)
word.lx: A decision of the local authority pursuant to the power and duties impose upon it by the statutory code./r/n 地方政府根据成文法（典）所给予的权力和义务所作出的决定。/r/n

word.name: pursue
word.mean: v. 追捕,追求,继续从事
word.lx: The police are pursuing an escaped prisoner./r/n 警方正在追捕一名越狱的逃犯。/r/n The government is pursuing a policy of non-intervention./r/n 政府正奉行不干预政策。/r/n

word.name: pursuer
word.mean: n. 从事者,追赶者,追求者
word.lx: He managed to avoid his pursuers./r/n 他设法甩掉了那些追捕者。/r/n I know she has many pursuers./r/n 我知道她的追求者很多。/r/n

word.name: purveyor
word.lx: Mozart was, after all, not a mere purveyor of music but one of the supreme dramatic geniuses of all time./r/n 莫扎特毕竟不仅是作曲家，而且是空前的最大戏剧天才之一。/r/n A purveyor of lies./r/n 谎言的传播者/r/n

word.name: purview
word.lx: These are questions that lie outside/that do not come within the purview of our inquiry./r/n 这些问题不在我们的调查范围之内./r/n

word.name: pus
word.lx: The tip of an abscess, a boil, or a pimple, in which pus forms./r/n 脓头中间有脓液的脓疮、疖或丘疹的顶端/r/n Discharge or waste, such as pus or feces, from a living organism./r/n 排出物从生命体排生物或废物，如脓、屎、尿等/r/n

word.name: push
word.mean:
n. 推,奋力,决心
v. 推,挤,逼迫
word.lx: He pushed her into making a decision./r/n 他催促她做出决定。/r/n You may stop the machine by pushing this button./r/n 你按下这个按钮就可以关机。/r/n

word.name: push-button
word.mean:
按钮
a. 用按钮操纵的

word.name: pushcart
word.lx: He has come up in the world since he peddled his own baked goods from a pushcart./r/n 他是靠用手推车兜售自己烤制的食品而得以发迹的。/r/n

word.name: pusher
word.lx: The neighbourhood pusher got Joe a fix./r/n 邻里的不法商贩给乔打了一针毒品。/r/n

word.name: pushover
word.mean: n. (俚)易于征服或控制的人
word.lx: The examination was a pushover; I knew all the answers./r/n 那次考试很容易，题目的答案我全都知道。/r/n

word.name: pushup
word.mean: n. 上推(垮砂,砂眼);俯卧撑

word.name: pushy
word.lx: He made himself unpopular by being so pushy./r/n 他特别喜欢出风头, 所以人缘不好./r/n

word.name: pussy
word.mean:
n. 小猫,少女,女性的阴部
a. 多脓的
word.lx: The baby was playing with his pussy./r/n 孩子正和他的猫嬉戏。/r/n

word.name: put
word.lx: I want to know how to put this in French./r/n 我想知道如何用法语来表达这件事。/r/n He put some more wood on the fire./r/n 他在火里加了一些柴。/r/n

word.name: putt
word.lx: John tried to help the putt fall by using body English./r/n 约翰尽量把身体扭向洞口方向以期高尔夫球能落进洞内。/r/n I am merely putt forward toe opinion(that) we shall dine out to save time./r/n 我刚才只是主张应该外出就餐，以节省时间。/r/n

word.name: puzzle
word.mean:
n. 难题,迷惑
v. 使...困惑,为难
word.lx: The question puzzled me./r/n 这个问题把我难住了。/r/n He stood there watching with puzzled despair./r/n 他束手无策地站在那儿看着。/r/n

word.name: puzzled
word.mean:
v. 困惑
vbl. 困惑
word.lx: His deliverance from the prison puzzled us./r/n 他被从监狱释放使我们困惑不已。/r/n She listened with a puzzled expression on her face./r/n 她脸上带著困惑的表情在倾听著。/r/n

word.name: puzzlement
word.lx: He stared at the words in complete puzzlement./r/n 他注视著那些语句, 茫然不解./r/n Suggesting puzzlement; questioning./r/n 疑惑的表示困惑的；有疑问的/r/n

word.name: pyjamas
word.lx: No rational person would go to work in his pyjamas./r/n 任何神智正常的人都不会穿着睡衣去上班。/r/n Pyjamas made from flammable material have been removed from most shop./r/n 大部分商店都不再出售用易燃材料做的睡衣了。/r/n

word.name: pylon
word.lx: The helicopter lifted up the steel pylon, transported it to the site, and dropped it gently into place./r/n 直升飞机把高压电缆铁塔吊起，运至工地，然后轻轻放下使之就位。/r/n

word.name: pyramid
word.lx: Egypt is famous for its grand pyramids./r/n 埃及以巨大的金字塔闻名。/r/n A pyramid of stones marked the spot./r/n 那地点用一堆堆成金字塔形状的石头作了标记。/r/n

word.name: pyromaniac
word.mean:
n. 放火狂
a. 放火狂的

word.name: pyrrhic
word.mean: a. 付出极大代价而获得的

word.name: quack
word.mean:
n. 庸医，(指鸭)呷呷地叫, 大声闲聊, 吹嘘
n. (鸭子)呷呷叫声, 庸医, 骗子
adj. 骗人
word.lx: He is a quack doctor./r/n 他是个庸医。/r/n A quack cure./r/n 庸医般的治疗/r/n

word.name: quad
word.mean:
n. 四边形(象限,四倍,四心线组,嵌块)
vt 用空铅填

word.name: quadruple
word.mean:
ad.&a. 四倍的(地)
n. (使)乘四倍
v. (使)成四倍
word.lx: Their profits have quadrupled/They have quadrupled their profits in ten years./r/n 他们的利润十年中增长至四倍[他们使利润在十年中增长至四倍]./r/n

word.name: quaff
word.mean:
v. 一口气喝干,大口地喝
n. 一饮而尽,痛饮
word.lx: We quaffed wine last night./r/n 我们昨晚畅饮了一次酒。/r/n He is quaffing his beer by the pint./r/n 他论品脱地大喝啤酒。/r/n

word.name: quail
word.lx: I quailed with fear at the thought of telling her the bad news./r/n 想到要告诉她这个坏消息，我就害怕得发抖。/r/n A group of animals or birds, especially larks or quail./r/n 一群动物，一群鸟一群动物或鸟，尤指云雀或鹌鹑/r/n

word.name: quaint
word.mean: a. 古雅的,离奇有趣的,奇怪的
word.lx: What a quaint little building!/r/n 多么古雅的一座小房子啊！/r/n Quaint dialect words./r/n 古怪的方言单词/r/n

word.name: quaintly
word.mean: ad. 古雅别致,离奇有趣地, 优雅地

word.name: quake
word.lx: I stood there quaking with fear./r/n 我站在那里，害怕得直发抖。/r/n The ground quaked under his feet./r/n 大地在他的脚下震动。/r/n

word.name: qualified
word.mean:
a. 有资格的
vbl. 取得资格

word.name: qualifier
word.mean: n. 给与资格的人,限定物,限定句
word.lx: The final brings together four qualifiers from each heat./r/n 有四名初赛获胜者进入决赛./r/n

word.name: qualify
word.lx: Eighteen-year-olds qualify to vote./r/n 年满十八岁者有选举权./r/n Your passport qualifies you to receive free medical treatment./r/n 你所持的护照可使你享有免费医疗./r/n

word.name: qualitative
word.mean: a. 性质上的,质的,定性的

word.name: quality
word.lx: He shows quality of leadership./r/n 他显示出领导才能。/r/n The quality of service in this restaurant has improved a lot./r/n 这个饭店的服务质量已经有了很大改善。/r/n

word.name: quality control
word.mean: n. 质量管理, 质量控制

word.name: quandary
word.lx: I am in a quandary, for this situation is totally unforeseen./r/n 我陷入困惑，因为这个局面完全没有被预料到。/r/n I was put in a great quandary./r/n 我陷于进退两难的窘境。/r/n

word.name: quantify
word.mean: v. 定量，表示份量，称量，量化
word.lx: The cost of the flood damage is impossible to quantify./r/n 这次水灾的损失是无可估量的./r/n

word.name: quantity
word.lx: It was a bad year for films, in terms of both quantity and quality./r/n 今年的电影无论从数量上还是质量上都说不上好。/r/n This company is more concerned with quality than with quantity./r/n 这家公司对质量比对产量更重视./r/n

word.name: quarantine
word.mean:
n. 隔离,封锁交通,检疫期间
v. 检疫,停止交涉
word.lx: He had been kept in quarantine for a week./r/n 他接受了一星期的检疫隔离。/r/n Quarantine restriction have been lifted on import animal from that country./r/n 对来自那个国家的进口动物的检疫限制已被解除。/r/n

word.name: quarrelsome
word.lx: He is a quarrelsome person./r/n 他是个爱争论的人。/r/n The diary portrays his family as quarrelsome and malicious./r/n 日记中描述了他家反宅乱的事./r/n

word.name: quarry
word.mean:
n. 采石场,猎获物,出处
v. 挖出,苦心找出
word.lx: They are quarrying in old manuscripts./r/n 他们正在旧手稿中寻找资料。/r/n Detectives kept the quarry under surveillance for weeks./r/n 侦探们监测那个目标已有好几个星期了。/r/n

word.name: quart
word.lx: He still takes his quarts./r/n 他现在还是照常喝大满杯的啤酒。/r/n One fifth of a gallon or four fifths of a quart of liquor./r/n 五分之一加仑或一夸脱酒的五分之四/r/n

word.name: quarterly
word.mean:
a. 季度的
ad. 每季一次
n. 季刊

word.name: quarters
word.lx: Married quarters are houses where soldiers live with their families./r/n 已婚人员营房是军人与其眷属所住的宿舍。/r/n The soldiers grappled with the enemy at close quarters./r/n 士兵短兵相接地同敌人格斗。/r/n

word.name: quartet
word.lx: This quartet represents a major new trend in modern music./r/n 这首四重奏的曲子反映了现代音乐中一种主要的新趋向./r/n The string quartet is a kind of delicate chamber music./r/n 弦乐四重奏是一种优雅的室内乐。/r/n

word.name: quasar
word.mean: n. 恒星状球体,半星球体,类星球体
word.lx: A lunar occultation of a quasar./r/n 类星体的月星掩测定/r/n

word.name: quash
word.lx: The applicant seek judicial review to quash the bind-over order./r/n 申请人请求司法检查以便废除责令某人守法的命令。/r/n The appeal court quash the care order make by the juvenile court./r/n 上诉法院宣布少年法院发出的照看命令无效。/r/n

word.name: quaver
word.mean:
n. 颤音
vi. 用颤声说(唱),震动,颤抖
word.lx: The children quavered out their little song./r/n 孩子们颤悠悠地唱出了一支歌./r/n You could hear the quaver in her voice./r/n 她的声音中能听出有些颤抖./r/n

word.name: quay
word.lx: We tied (the boat) up alongside the quay./r/n 我们把船停泊在码头处./r/n We moored alongside the quay./r/n 我们靠码头停泊./r/n

word.name: queasy
word.mean: a. 催吐的,使人呕吐的,反胃的;不稳定的、不确定的.
word.lx: I feel sort of queasy./r/n 我有些恶心./r/n Dizzy or queasy./r/n 迷惑的或令人作呕的/r/n

word.name: Quebec
word.mean: n. 魁北克(加拿大港市省名)

word.name: queen
word.lx: Queen Marie Antoinette of France was the wife of Louis the 16th./r/n 法国玛丽安东妮皇后是路易十六的妻子。/r/n Since her promotion she queens it over everyone else in the office./r/n 她获提升後对办事处所有的人都发号施令。/r/n

word.name: queer
word.mean:
n. 同性恋者
a. 奇怪的,不舒服的,可疑的
word.lx: Her queer way of dressing attracted the attention of the passerby./r/n 她古怪的着装方式引起了过路人的注意。/r/n There is something queer about him./r/n 他有些古怪。/r/n

word.name: quench
word.mean: v. 熄减,结束,冷浸,解渴
word.lx: Hot steel is quenched to harden it./r/n 烧热的钢淬火使它坚硬。/r/n Water will quench a fire./r/n 水可以灭火。/r/n

word.name: querulous
word.mean: a. 鸣不平的,发牢骚的,易怒的

word.name: query
word.mean:
n. 疑问,疑问号,质问
v. 问
word.lx: The minister was queried about his plans for the industry./r/n 有人向部长提出了工业计划问题。/r/n Your interesting report raises several important queries./r/n 你的精彩报告引出了几个重要问题。/r/n

word.name: quest
word.mean:
n. 探索,寻求
v. 寻找,找,追寻猎物
word.lx: The quest for gold was difficult./r/n 寻找金矿是很困难的。/r/n The lawyer was on a quest for further evidence./r/n 律师正在到处找寻更多的证据。/r/n

word.name: question
word.mean:
n. 问题,疑问,疑问句
v. 询问,审问,怀疑
word.lx: May I ask a question?/r/n 我可以问一个问题吗？/r/n I would never question his honesty./r/n 我对他的诚实绝不怀疑。/r/n

word.name: questionable
word.lx: Such a questionable assertion is sure to provoke criticism./r/n 这种有问题的主张肯定会招致非议。/r/n The man looks questionable./r/n 这个男人看上去很可疑。/r/n

word.name: questioning
word.lx: By clever questioning they trapped him into making a confession./r/n 他们用巧妙的提问诱使他招认了。/r/n The police detained him for questioning./r/n 警方对他进行拘留审问./r/n

word.name: questionnaire
word.lx: Please complete and return the enclosed questionnaire./r/n 所附问卷请填妥交回。/r/n We gave them some questionnaires for collecting data./r/n 为了收集数据我们发给他们一些调查表。/r/n

word.name: queue
word.mean:
n. 行列,长队
v. 排队
vi. 排长队
word.lx: We queued up for the bus./r/n 我们排队等公共汽车。/r/n People are queuing to buy tickets./r/n 人们正排队买票。/r/n

word.name: quibble
word.mean:
n. 遁辞,谬论,双关话
v. 推托,说模棱两可的话,说俏皮话
word.lx: A petty distinction or objection; a quibble./r/n 遁辞微不足道的区别或反对；遁辞/r/n An equivocation; a quibble./r/n 遁辞模棱两可的话；遁辞/r/n

word.name: quicken
word.mean: v. 加快,使...有生气,鼓舞
word.lx: Your heart beat will quicken when you run up the stairs./r/n 跑上楼梯时，心跳会加速。/r/n We quickened our pace./r/n 我们加快了步速。/r/n

word.name: quickly
word.lx: He adjusted himself very quickly to the heat of the country./r/n 他很快使自己适应了这个国家炎热的天气。/r/n The news of her death circulated quickly./r/n 她死去的消息迅速传开。/r/n

word.name: quicksand
word.lx: A place filled with mud or quicksand that is a hazard to cattle./r/n 沼穴充满泥浆或流沙的地方，可对牛群构成威胁/r/n

word.name: quid
word.mean:
n. 咀嚼物,烟草块
n.（英国口语）一英镑（单复同型）

word.name: quiescent
word.mean: a. 静止的,不活动的,寂静的
word.lx: It is unlikely that such an extremist organization will remain quiescent for long./r/n 这种过激的组织是不太可能长期沉默的./r/n Quiescent. Used especially of a disease./r/n 静止的静止的。尤指一种疾病/r/n

word.name: quiet
word.mean:
n. 安静,闲适,平静
a. 安静的,静止的,宁静的
v. 静止,使...减少,使...安心
word.lx: When he quieted down, I began to tell him the truth./r/n 当他平静下来时，我开始告诉他实情。/r/n Ask him to keep quiet./r/n 让汤姆保持安静。/r/n

word.name: quieten
word.lx: Quieten down and get on with your work./r/n 静下心来继续工作吧./r/n

word.name: quietly
word.mean:
a. 寂静地,静止地
ad. 安静地,平静地
word.lx: She sang so quietly that I could hardly hear her./r/n 她唱的声音很小, 我几乎听不见./r/n The children seem to be totally incapable of working quietly by themselves./r/n 这些孩子似乎完全不能安静地自己做功课。/r/n

word.name: quietness
word.lx: We enjoyed the quietness of the country./r/n 我们喜欢乡村的平静。/r/n After the quietness of home and school, university has been almost frightening./r/n 过惯了家庭和中学的平静生活之後，大学简直有些可怕了。/r/n

word.name: quietude
word.lx: Quietude is the crown of life./r/n 人生何为先，宁静为桂冠。/r/n

word.name: quill
word.mean: n. 羽茎,大翎毛,鹅毛笔
word.lx: The duke wrote a letter with a quill pen./r/n 公爵用一根羽毛笔写信。/r/n

word.name: quilt
word.lx: He bought a heavy quilt for the winter./r/n 他买了一床厚被子过冬。/r/n Quilt a skirt./r/n 缝制裙子/r/n

word.name: quinine
word.lx: Quinine is used as medicine against malaria./r/n 奎宁是用来治疗疟疾的药物。/r/n Quinine is a specific for malaria./r/n 奎宁是治疗疟疾的特效药./r/n

word.name: quintessence
word.mean: n. 精粹,(物体)最纯粹的形体,典型
word.lx: He is the quintessence oftact and politeness./r/n 他处世谦恭得体./r/n Her book captures the quintessence of Renaissance humanism./r/n 她的书抓住了文艺复兴时期人文主义的精髓./r/n

word.name: quintet
word.lx: The first item on the program is woodwind quintet./r/n 节目单上的第一个节目是木管五重奏。/r/n

word.name: quirk
word.lx: He have a strange quirk of addressing his wife as Mrs Smith./r/n 他很怪，把自己的妻子称作史密斯夫人。/r/n By a quirk of fate they have booked into the same hotel./r/n 由於命运的捉弄，他们住进同一家旅馆。/r/n

word.name: quite
word.lx: The boy has quite recovered./r/n 这男孩已彻底恢复健康。/r/n He was quite young./r/n 他相当年轻。/r/n

word.name: quiver
word.mean:
n. 震动,颤抖,箭袋
v. 颤抖,振动
word.lx: The old man quivered with rage./r/n 这位老人气得发抖。/r/n He felt a quiver of excitement./r/n 他感到激动得发抖。/r/n

word.name: quixotic
word.mean: a. 唐吉诃德式的, 狂想家的

word.name: quiz
word.mean:
n. 小考,随堂测验,恶作剧
v. 简单测验,恶作剧
word.lx: We will have a quiz tomorrow morning./r/n 我们明天早晨进行一个小测验。/r/n Match your skill against the experts in this quiz./r/n 在这一测验中你与专家较量一下技巧吧。/r/n

word.name: quizzical
word.mean: a. 可笑的(嘲弄的,好奇的)

word.name: quorum
word.lx: Do we have a quorum?/r/n 我们有法定人数吗？/r/n How many members make a quorum?/r/n 起码的法定人数是多少？/r/n

word.name: quota
word.lx: The quota on import cars has been lifted./r/n 对汽车的进口配额已被取消。/r/n A share or quota, as of troops, contributed to a general effort./r/n 分遣队为全体之努力而作出贡献的部分或配额，如部队的分遣队/r/n

word.name: quotation
word.mean:
n. 1．引语,语录
2．报价单
3．行情表
word.lx: I found a mistake in this quotation./r/n 我在这段引文中发现了一个错误。/r/n They gave me a quotation for mending the roof./r/n 他们给了我修理屋顶的报价单。/r/n

word.name: quote
word.mean:
n. 引用
v. 引述,举证,报价
word.lx: The price they quoted was very low./r/n 他们报的价很低。/r/n He quotes the Bible to support his beliefs./r/n 他引用《圣经》来支持他的信仰。/r/n

word.name: rabbi
word.mean: n. 犹太的法学博士,法师,先生
word.lx: The rabbi makes pastoral visits every Tuesday./r/n 犹太教教士每星期二对教友进行访问。/r/n The office or function of a rabbi./r/n 犹太法学博士的身份或职位/r/n

word.name: rabble
word.mean: n. 乌合之众,暴民,下等人
word.lx: The rabbles met on the square to oppose their new mayor./r/n 平民们在广场上集会反对他们的新市长。/r/n The rabble soon grew violent and unmanageable./r/n 暴民们很快地变得狂暴和无法控制。/r/n

word.name: rabid
word.mean: a. 猛烈的,热烈的,急进的
word.lx: A rabid football fan./r/n 狂热的足球迷/r/n

word.name: race
word.mean:
n. 种族,赛跑
v. 赛跑,竞赛
word.lx: He is against race prejudice./r/n 他反对种族歧视。/r/n She came second in the race./r/n 她在比赛中得了第二名。/r/n

word.name: racehorse
word.lx: A fine racehorse./r/n 经过极强训练的赛马/r/n

word.name: racer
word.mean: n. 赛马者,比赛者,比赛用汽车
word.lx: The racer meant to win the500-mile race at all hazards./r/n 这位竞赛者决心不顾一切危险，赢得这场500英里的车赛。/r/n The racer meant to win the500-meter race at all risks./r/n 这个参赛者下定决心无论如何要赢得500公尺赛跑的胜利。/r/n

word.name: racetrack
word.mean: n. 跑道(共振加速器中粒子轨道)

word.name: racism
word.mean: n. 民族的差别主义,人种偏见
word.lx: Racism remains a touchy issue./r/n 种族主义可是个要小心处理的问题./r/n Their comments smack of racism./r/n 他们的评论有点种族偏见的味道./r/n

word.name: racket
word.lx: The students kicked up no end of a racket (ie were very noisy and boisterous) in the street./r/n 这些学生在街上大吵大闹./r/n How did she get into the modelling racket?/r/n 她是怎样当上模特儿的?/r/n

word.name: racketeer
word.mean:
n. 敲诈者,获取不正当钱财的人
v. 诈取钱财
word.lx: Bribes paid to officials by racketeers for immunity from prosecution./r/n 保护费诈骗勒索者为免于被起诉而向官员提供的贿赂/r/n

word.name: racy
word.mean: a. 保持原味的,活泼的,生动的
word.lx: The script was a bit racy until the producer wielded his blue pencil./r/n 在制片人挥动他那蓝色铅笔删改前，剧本有一些逃逗性。/r/n Racy or scandalous gossip./r/n 流言粗鄙下流或造谣中伤的流言/r/n

word.name: radar
word.lx: The watchtower followed the aircraft by radar./r/n 了望塔通过雷达追踪这架飞机的飞行。/r/n The radar scanned the sky for enemy planes./r/n 雷达密切监视天空，搜索敌机。/r/n

word.name: radial
word.mean: a. 光线的,光线状的,放射状的

word.name: radiance
word.lx: Her face with radiance absorbed me./r/n 她那容光焕发的脸庞吸引了我。/r/n The radiance of the sunset died away./r/n 夕阳的余辉渐渐地消失了。/r/n

word.name: radiant
word.mean: a. 发光的,明亮的,辐射的
word.lx: Everything looked radiant in the morning sun./r/n 在朝阳之下，万物焕然一新。/r/n The sun is a radiant body./r/n 太阳是一个发光体。/r/n

word.name: radiate
word.lx: Five roads radiate from this roundabout./r/n 有五条道路以这个环状交叉路为中心向各方伸展开。/r/n Eight roads radiate from the square./r/n 八条大道从广场呈辐射形伸展出去。/r/n

word.name: radiation
word.lx: The news of the radiation leak caused widespread public alarm./r/n 辐射泄露的消息引起了公众的普遍恐慌。/r/n The most terrifying aspect of nuclear bombing is radiation./r/n 核弹轰炸最可怕的一面是辐射。/r/n

word.name: radiator
word.lx: This car has a fan-cooled radiator./r/n 这部汽车有一个由风扇散热的冷却器。/r/n The dog nestled up against the warm radiator./r/n 狗倚著暖烘烘的散热器./r/n

word.name: radical
word.mean:
n. 激进份子,原子团,激进派
a. 急进的,根本的,激进的,基本的,彻底的
word.lx: The talks are aimed at radical reductions in the level of weapons./r/n 那些会谈都以大幅度裁减军备为目标。/r/n They called for a radical reform of our tax system./r/n 他们要求对税收制度进行根本改革。/r/n

word.name: radio
word.mean:
n. 收音机
v. 用无线电通讯
word.lx: I heard the news on the radio./r/n 我从广播中听到了这件事。/r/n He asked me to turn on the radio for him./r/n 他让我替他打开收音机。/r/n

word.name: radiotherapy
word.lx: A radioactive compound used in radiotherapy or diagnosis./r/n 放射性药剂一种用于放射性治疗或诊断的放射性化合物/r/n

word.name: radish
word.lx: I bought a large bunch of radishes./r/n 我买了一大捆萝卜。/r/n

word.name: radium
word.lx: Radium and uranium are radioactive elements./r/n 镭和铀是放射性元素./r/n Tell me when radium was found./r/n 告诉我镭是什么时候被发现的。/r/n

word.name: radius
word.lx: The police searched all the woods within a six-mile radius./r/n 警察搜索了在周围六英里以内的树林各处。/r/n We can compute the circular area with radius./r/n 我们能用半径计算出圆的面积。/r/n

word.name: raffish
word.mean: a. 名誉不好的,无赖的,卑鄙的
word.lx: He was drinking cheap champagne with a raffish air./r/n 他喝著廉价的香槟酒, 样子十分放荡./r/n

word.name: raft
word.mean:
n. 筏,救生艇,大量
v. 乘筏,制成筏
word.lx: We found the shipwrecked sailors on a raft./r/n 我们在一个木筏子上找到了失事船只的船员。/r/n The raft was floating gently down the river./r/n 筏子顺河水缓缓漂流./r/n

word.name: rafter
word.mean:
n. 椽,椽架屋顶
v. 装椽
word.lx: The big rafter is visible in this room./r/n 这间屋子粗大的椽子可以看得见。/r/n

word.name: rag
word.mean:
n. 破布,碎布
鲁尔煤矿(财富500强公司之一，总部所在地德国,主要经营采矿)
word.lx: He cleaned the car with an oily rag./r/n 他用一块沾油的抹布擦干净汽车。/r/n I read it in the local rag./r/n 我从本地的报纸上看到了这条消息。/r/n

word.name: rage
word.mean:
n. 愤怒,情绪激动
v. 发怒,震怒,风行
word.lx: He was mad with rage./r/n 他快要气疯了。/r/n The young girl has a rage for pop music./r/n 这个年轻的女孩对流行音乐有狂热爱好。/r/n

word.name: raging
word.lx: A pestilence was raging in that area./r/n 瘟疫正在那个地方流行。/r/n The place was a blazing, raging, roaring, etc inferno./r/n 那地方是一片熊熊的、 滚滚的、 咆哮的...火海./r/n

word.name: ragtime
word.mean: n. 拉格泰姆音乐(期间在美国流行的一种音乐)

word.name: raid
word.mean:
n. 突然袭击,搜捕
v. 劫掠,攫取,突击搜捕,袭击
vt. ／
word.lx: A security guard was killed in the bank raid./r/n 这次银行抢劫案中有一名保安遇害。/r/n The police will carry out a dawn raid./r/n 警方将在拂晓展开突然搜查。/r/n

word.name: railhead
word.mean: n. 铁路端点(轨头,垂直刀架)

word.name: railroad
word.mean:
n. 铁路
v. 由铁道运输
vi. 由铁路运输
word.lx: The workers were railroaded into signing the agreement./r/n 工人们被逼着匆忙地签订了这个协议。/r/n We will send the goods by railroad./r/n 我们将用铁路运输。/r/n

word.name: railway
word.mean:
n. 铁路
v. 由铁道运输
word.lx: A new railway is being built./r/n 一条新铁路正在建造之中。/r/n The goods were consigned to you by railway./r/n 货物已由铁路托运到你处。/r/n

word.name: raiment
word.lx: The girl always complains about lacking suitable raiment./r/n 这个女孩总是抱怨没有合适的衣服。/r/n

word.name: rainbow
word.lx: A rainbow is usually seen after a heavy rain./r/n 大雨之后常有彩虹。/r/n Round about, piles of lime- stone glistened in all the colours of the rainbow./r/n 周围一堆堆的石灰石，在彩虹一样的斑斓色彩中闪闪发光。/r/n

word.name: raindrop
word.lx: Raindrops fell on my head./r/n 雨滴落在我的头上。/r/n Raindrop fall at a speed of about500 to1, 000 feet a minute./r/n 雨点以每分钟大约五百到一千英尺的速度下降。/r/n

word.name: rained
word.lx: For ten hours it rained incessantly./r/n 雨不停地下了10个钟头。/r/n We had a moldy holiday - it rained every day./r/n 我们的假日过得好无聊，每天都下雨。/r/n

word.name: rainfall
word.lx: This area has very low rainfall./r/n 这个地区雨量稀少。/r/n The rainfall averages 36 inches a year./r/n 年降雨量平均为36英寸./r/n

word.name: rainstorm
word.lx: The sky clouded over; we could see there was going to be rainstorm./r/n ＂天空乌云密布，我们看得出快来暴风雨了。＂/r/n After the rainstorm, there were pools on the roads./r/n 暴雨过後路上有许多水洼儿./r/n

word.name: raise
word.mean:
n. 上升,高地,增高
v. 升起,举起,饲养
word.lx: She raised her finger to her lips as a sign for silence./r/n 她举起一根手指放在唇边，示意肃静。/r/n His long absence raised fears about his safety./r/n 他长期不在引起了大家对他的安全的担心。/r/n

word.name: raised
word.mean: a. 凸起的, 浮雕的, 有凸起花纹的, 发酵的

word.name: raiser
word.mean: n. 提高者,饲养者,栽培者
word.lx: He is a cattle-raiser./r/n 他是一个牛羊饲养者。/r/n

word.name: raisin
word.lx: I asked him to bring me some raisins when he returns from Xinjiang./r/n 我请求他从新疆回来时给我带些葡萄干。/r/n Sour grapes are made into raisins or wine./r/n 酸葡萄就做成葡萄干或葡萄酒。/r/n

word.name: rakish
word.mean: a. 轻快的, 俏皮的, 潇洒的, 放荡的
word.lx: She wore her hat at a rakish angle./r/n 她把帽子戴得吊儿郎当的。/r/n

word.name: RAM
word.lx: He rammed the tobacco into his pipe./r/n 他把烟丝塞进烟斗。/r/n The farmer keeps one ram and five ewes on his farm./r/n 农夫在农场里养了一只公羊，五只母羊。/r/n

word.name: Ramadan
word.lx: Muslims fast during Ramadan./r/n 穆斯林在赖买丹月斋戒./r/n

word.name: ramble
word.mean:
n. 漫步,闲谈
v. 漫步,漫谈,漫游
word.lx: I like rambling around in the country./r/n 我喜欢在乡间漫步。/r/n The old man rambled about the past./r/n 老者在聊过去的事情。/r/n

word.name: rambler
word.mean: n. 漫步者,无目的地移动之物,攀缘蔷薇

word.name: rambling
word.lx: Covering a wide field of subjects; rambling./r/n 主题不明的，东拉西扯的包含很大范围的主题；杂乱无章的/r/n I like rambling around in the country./r/n 我喜欢在乡间漫步。/r/n

word.name: ramification
word.mean: n. 分枝, 分叉, 衍生物, 支流

word.name: ramify
word.mean: v. (使)分枝, (使)分叉, (使)成网状

word.name: ramp
word.mean:
n. 斜坡,坡道,诈欺
v. 狂跳乱撞,乱冲,造倾斜路面
word.lx: Drive the car up the ramp./r/n 把汽车开到斜坡。/r/n See the children ramping about in the playground./r/n 你看孩子们在运动场上乱冲乱跳。/r/n

word.name: rampage
word.mean:
n. 暴怒
v. 狂暴地乱冲
word.lx: The mob rampaged through the village./r/n 这夥暴徒在村中横冲直撞./r/n

word.name: rampant
word.mean: a. 猖獗的,蔓延的,奔放的
word.lx: Sickness was rampant in the country./r/n 疾病在这个国家猖獗。/r/n Deplored the rampant consumerism of contemporary society./r/n 对当代社会中狂热的拜金思想深感遗憾/r/n

word.name: rampart
word.mean:
n. 垒,壁垒,城墙
v. 用壁垒围绕,防卫,守卫
word.lx: The rampart was destroyed totally./r/n 壁垒被彻底摧毁了。/r/n Surrounded with or as if with a rampart./r/n 用城墙围绕的用城墙围绕的或类似于为城墙围绕的/r/n

word.name: ramshackle
word.lx: A ramshackle cabin in the woods./r/n 林中一间要倒塌的棚屋/r/n

word.name: ran
word.lx: He ran fast enough to catch the thief./r/n 他跑得飞快，足以抓住那小偷。/r/n The little boy ran off to get his brother./r/n 这个小男孩跑去找他的哥哥。/r/n

word.name: ranch
word.lx: He is dreaming of owning a ranch in North America./r/n 他正梦想着在北美洲拥有一片大牧场。/r/n The owner or manager of a ranch; a rancher./r/n 牧场主牧场的主人或经营人；牧场主/r/n

word.name: rancher
word.mean: n. 大牧场工人,大牧场主
word.lx: The owner or manager of a ranch; a rancher./r/n 牧场主牧场的主人或经营人；牧场主/r/n

word.name: rancid
word.lx: The butter has gone/turned rancid./r/n 这黄油已经哈喇了./r/n The grocer took back the rancid butter./r/n 杂货店老板让把变了味的黄油退给了他。/r/n

word.name: rancor
word.lx: Bitterness of feeling; rancor./r/n 深仇积怨感情上的怨恨；敌意/r/n I have no rancor against him./r/n 我对他无怨无仇。/r/n

word.name: random
word.mean:
n. 随意,任意
a. 任意的,随便的,胡乱的
word.lx: The librarian took a book at random from the shelf./r/n 图书管理员从书架上随便拿了一本书。/r/n Marked by a lack of care, accuracy, or organization; random./r/n 漫无目的的缺乏谨慎、精确或组织性的；随意的/r/n

word.name: randomly
word.mean: ad. 任意地,随便地,胡乱地

word.name: randy
word.mean:
a. 喧闹的,有劲的大声的,乱闹的
n. 挑剔的女人
word.lx: Let go, you randy old goat!/r/n 放开我, 你这老色鬼!/r/n Hey, Randy, have you had your lunch yet?/r/n 嘿，蓝迪，你吃午饭了吗？/r/n

word.name: rang
word.lx: I was cooking in the kitchen when the telephone rang./r/n 电话铃响的时候我正在厨房里做饭。/r/n Their refusal rang the knell of our hopes./r/n 他们的拒绝是我们希望破灭的凶兆。/r/n

word.name: ranger
word.mean: n. 守林人，骑警，突击队员
word.lx: Ranger must be ready to deal with emergencies of all kinds./r/n 国家公园管理员必须随时准备好处理各种紧急情况。/r/n

word.name: rank
word.mean:
n. 排名,等级,军衔,阶级
a. 繁茂的,恶臭的,讨厌的
v. 排列,归类于,列于
word.lx: He is above me in rank./r/n 他的级别比我高。/r/n This tennis player ranked third in the world./r/n 这位网球运动员排名世界第三。/r/n

word.name: ranking
word.mean:
a. 最高级的,一流的
n. 分等级,名次,队
word.lx: He ranks with the best English authors./r/n 他名列英国第一流的作家之中。/r/n The riot police quickly fell into rank for action./r/n 防暴警察迅速列队准备行动。/r/n

word.name: rankle
word.lx: The insult still rankles in his mind./r/n 他对那次受辱仍然耿耿于怀。/r/n The insult still rankled in his mind./r/n 他对那次受辱仍耿耿於怀./r/n

word.name: ransack
word.mean:
v. 彻底搜索,洗劫
vt. 彻底搜索

word.name: rap
word.mean:
n. 轻敲,拍击,责骂
v. 轻敲,厉声说出,叱责
word.lx: The chairman rapped on the table for order./r/n 主席敲击桌子以维持秩序。/r/n There is a light rap at the door./r/n 有轻轻的敲门声。/r/n

word.name: rapacious
word.mean: a. 强夺的,贪欲的,贪婪的
word.lx: A greedy, rapacious person./r/n 贪心的或贪婪的人/r/n A person of a rapacious, predatory, or profiteering nature./r/n 贪婪的人具有贪婪、凶残或逐利性格的人/r/n

word.name: rape
word.mean:
n. 抢夺,掠夺,强奸
v. 掠夺,抢夺,强奸
word.lx: The enemy raped the country and killed many villagers./r/n 敌人掠夺了这个地区，并且杀害了许多村民。/r/n The rape of the countryside had a profound ravage on them./r/n 对乡村的掠夺给他们造成严重创伤。/r/n

word.name: rapid
word.mean: a. 迅速的,飞快的,急促的
word.lx: He made rapid progress in his studies./r/n 他学习上进步很快。/r/n The intercession has made a rapid progress./r/n 调解已经取得了很大的进展。/r/n

word.name: rapidity
word.lx: We are surprised by the rapidity of her recovery./r/n 她恢复得那么快，我们都有些惊讶。/r/n Rapidity or speed of motion; swiftness./r/n 迅速，快速运动的快速或速度；迅速/r/n

word.name: rapidly
word.lx: He was rapidly leaving the others behind./r/n 他迅速地把其他人甩在后面。/r/n The company developed rapidly under his administration./r/n 在他的管理下，公司发展得很快。/r/n

word.name: rapids
word.lx: They fell into the seething waters of the rapids./r/n 他们跌进了汹涌的急流中。/r/n The boat shot the rapids./r/n 那条船穿过急流。/r/n

word.name: rapist
word.lx: I think that all rapists should be strung up./r/n 我认为所有的强奸犯都应该被绞死。/r/n

word.name: rapport
word.lx: Father and son have a great rapport./r/n 父子情深./r/n The actor developed a close rapport with his audience./r/n 该演员与观众建立了密切的关系./r/n

word.name: rapprochement
word.mean: n. 友好关系的建立(恢复友好关系)

word.name: rapt
word.mean: a. 全神贯注的,入迷的,出神的
word.lx: We listened to her amazing story with rapt attention./r/n 我们全神贯注地倾听她讲的惊人故事。/r/n

word.name: rapture
word.mean:
n. 狂喜
v. 使狂喜
word.lx: The mother gazed with rapture at her new born baby./r/n 母亲着迷地凝视着她刚出生的婴儿。/r/n He fall into rapture over classic music./r/n 他对古典音乐喜爱若狂。/r/n

word.name: rapturous
word.lx: Her new novel was greeted by reviewers with rapturous applause./r/n 她的新小说备受书评家推崇./r/n

word.name: rarely
word.lx: I rarely meet him./r/n 我很少见到他。/r/n Rarely did he fail to keep his promise./r/n 他真的很难得失信。/r/n

word.name: rarity
word.lx: I have ancient scrolls and other rarities./r/n 我有古书卷等珍品。/r/n These stamps have great value because of their rarity./r/n 这些罕见的邮票非常珍贵。/r/n

word.name: rascal
word.lx: You lucky rascal!/r/n 你这个幸运的家伙！/r/n The boy is nothing but a rascal./r/n 这个男孩是个小淘气。/r/n

word.name: rashly
word.lx: He spent money rashly [lavishly]./r/n 他花钱很随便[大手大脚]。/r/n Some people jump rashly to the conclusion that something must be wrong./r/n 有些人轻率地得出结论说一定是出了什麽问题。/r/n

word.name: rashness
word.mean: n. 疹：皮肤上短暂出现的疹子，如荨麻疹、药疹和病毒疹,轻率,鲁莽
word.lx: That valour which is not found on prudence call rashness./r/n 未经深思熟虑的勇武只能称作轻率。/r/n Rashness is the result of ignorance, hesitation of think./r/n 轻率是无知的结果，犹豫是思考的产物。/r/n

word.name: raspberry
word.mean: n. 覆盆子,舌头放在唇间发出的声音
word.lx: The teacher get a raspberry as she turn her back./r/n 该教师转过身去时有人用舌与唇发出嘲笑她的声音。/r/n The boss and his secretary bell gave Jack the raspberry today./r/n 今天老板和他的秘书两人对杰克咂舌砸唇的。/r/n

word.name: raspy
word.mean: a. 刺耳的,粗糙的,易怒的

word.name: rat race
word.mean: n. 商业上竞争,事业上竞争

word.name: rate
word.mean:
n. 比率,等级,价格
v. 估价,认为,检定等级
word.lx: He is generally rated as one of the best modern writers./r/n 他被公认为现代最杰出的作家之一。/r/n They drove at a steady rate./r/n 他们以平稳的速度开车。/r/n

word.name: rated
word.lx: His house was rated at$300 a year./r/n 他的房子估计每年应交300美元的税。/r/n He is generally rated as one of the best modern writers./r/n 他被公认为现代最杰出的作家之一。/r/n

word.name: rather
word.mean: ad. 宁可,宁愿,有些,相当
word.lx: These shoes are rather too big./r/n 这双鞋有点太大了。/r/n I would rather stay at home./r/n 我宁可呆在家里。/r/n

word.name: ratify
word.lx: These files have been ratified./r/n 这些文件已经批准生效。/r/n The government has ratified the project./r/n 政府已经批准了这个项目。/r/n

word.name: rating
word.lx: The rating system is undergoing some/a complete restructuring./r/n 房地产税制正在进行某些[全面的]调整./r/n Having an acceptable credit rating./r/n 信用好的有令人满意的信用等级的/r/n

word.name: ratio
word.lx: The ratio of schoolboys to schoolgirls is 2 to 1./r/n 男学生和女学生的比例是2比1。/r/n Men outnumber women here in the ratio of three to one./r/n 此地男子数量以三比一超过女子。/r/n

word.name: ration
word.lx: We were rationed to two eggs a week./r/n 每周配给我们两个鸡蛋。/r/n The soldiers were given their rations of food./r/n 士兵们分得了他们的给养口粮。/r/n

word.name: rational
word.mean:
a. 合理的,理性的
n. 有理数
word.lx: Man is a rational being./r/n 人是有理性的生物。/r/n The quality or condition of being rational./r/n 合理性合乎理性的性质或状态/r/n

word.name: rationale
word.mean: n. 基本原理(理论基础的说明,原理的阐述)
word.lx: I do not understand the rationale behind the decision to sell the warehouse./r/n 我不明白在出售仓库的决定后面有什么原由。/r/n

word.name: rationally
word.lx: My parents say I talked rationally enough but for me the time after the accident was total blank./r/n 父母说，我说话倒相当清醒，可是对我来说，在事故发生后的那段时间，我头脑中完全是一片空白。/r/n

word.name: rationing
word.lx: Rationing water during the drought./r/n 在干旱时期定量供应水/r/n The Government may have to introduce petrol rationing./r/n 政府可能不得不实行汽油限量供应。/r/n

word.name: rattle
word.mean:
v. 使...嘎嘎响,喋喋不休地说,急促地谈
vt 使...慌乱, 激动
word.lx: The child rattled away merrily./r/n 那孩子快活地喋喋不休地说着。/r/n The boy put some stones in a tin box and made them rattle./r/n 男孩把一些石子放在铁盒子里，然后摇得哗啦哗啦地响。/r/n

word.name: rattlesnake
word.lx: A rattlesnake is a really mean creature./r/n 响尾蛇是很凶的动物./r/n We saw a real live rattlesnake!/r/n 我们看到一条真的响尾蛇!/r/n

word.name: raucous
word.mean: a. 沙声的,粗声的,刺耳的

word.name: ravage
word.mean:
n. 破坏,蹂躏
v. 毁坏,破坏,掠夺
word.lx: The forests were ravaged by fire./r/n 森林毁于火灾。/r/n Bands of soldiers ravaged the village./r/n 成群的士兵洗劫了村庄。/r/n

word.name: raven
word.mean:
n. 大乌鸦
a. 乌黑的
v. 掠夺
word.lx: The lion was ravening the prey./r/n 那只狮子在贪婪地吞食着捕获的猎物。/r/n

word.name: ravening
word.lx: The lion was ravening the prey./r/n 那只狮子在贪婪地吞食着捕获的猎物。/r/n The raven cawed on the tree./r/n 乌鸦在树上呱呱叫着。/r/n

word.name: ravine
word.lx: The river had worn a ravine between the hills./r/n 那条河在两山之间已造成一个深谷。/r/n My horse jump across the deep ravine, but all the others balk./r/n 我的马跃过深谷，但其余的马都突然停止不动。/r/n

word.name: ravish
word.lx: He was ravished by her beauty./r/n 她的美貌使他倾倒。/r/n I was ravished by her beauty./r/n 我被她的美貌迷住了./r/n

word.name: ravishing
word.lx: He was ravished by her beauty./r/n 她的美貌使他倾倒。/r/n I was ravished by her beauty./r/n 我被她的美貌迷住了./r/n

word.name: raw
word.lx: We imported raw rubber from Malaysia./r/n 我们从马来西亚进口生胶。/r/n She makes use of people she meets as raw material for her fiction./r/n 她把她所遇见的人们作为她创作小说的素材。/r/n

word.name: raw material
word.lx: She makes use of people she meets as raw material for her fiction./r/n 她把她所遇见的人们作为她创作小说的素材。/r/n The problem is how we are to get the raw material./r/n 问题是我们怎样得到原材料。/r/n

word.name: Raymond
word.lx: I am also permitted to refer to Professor Raymond Powell of the Education Department at the Normal college./r/n 敝人也提请师范学院教育系鲍尔教授作证明人，已得到他的同意。/r/n

word.name: raze
word.lx: The city was razed by an earthquake./r/n 地震把这个城市夷为平地。/r/n The bombs razed the building to the ground./r/n 炸弹把那座建筑夷为平地。/r/n

word.name: razor
word.lx: I shave with an electric razor./r/n 我用电动剃须刀刮胡子。/r/n The razor has a very keen edge./r/n 这把剃刀有锋利的口。/r/n

word.name: re
word.lx: I want to speak to you re your behaviour./r/n [口]关于你的行为，我想跟你谈一谈。/r/n Do you re member how we pushed the boat out the night that we won back the championship?/r/n 你可记得我们夺回冠军那天晚上，我们是如何欢宴作乐的吗？/r/n

word.name: reach
word.mean:
n. 延伸,范围,河段
v. 到达,伸出,延伸
word.lx: The garden reaches down to the lake./r/n 花园一直延伸到湖边。/r/n They reached London on Friday./r/n 他们星期五到达伦敦。/r/n

word.name: react
word.lx: An acid can react with a base to form a salt./r/n 酸可以和碱起反应而生成盐。/r/n How did they react to your suggestion?/r/n 他们对你的建议有什么反应？/r/n

word.name: reaction
word.lx: His reaction on this matter is unexpected./r/n 没料到，他对这件事的反应是这样的。/r/n What was his reaction to the news?/r/n 他对这消息的反应如何？/r/n

word.name: reactivate
word.mean: v. 使恢复现役,再开工

word.name: reactive
word.mean: a. 反动的,反应性的,反冲的
word.lx: Not readily reactive with other elements; forming few or no chemical compounds./r/n 惰性的与其它元素反应不活泼的；不能形成或很少能形成化合物的/r/n

word.name: reactor
word.lx: A reactor is a container for chemical reaction./r/n 反应器是进行化学反应的容器。/r/n An undamaged nuclear reactor; undamaged feelings./r/n 未毁坏的核反应堆；未受伤害的感情/r/n

word.name: readable
word.mean: a. 值得一读的,易读的,读起来津津有味的
word.lx: It is the combination of wit and political analysis that makes his articles so readable./r/n 他的生花妙笔与政治分析相得益彰, 使他的文章脍炙人口./r/n A readable story./r/n 一个可读性强的故事/r/n

word.name: reader
word.lx: Open your German readers at page 28./r/n 把德语课本翻到第28页。/r/n We have received many letters on this subject from our readers./r/n 关于这个题目我们收到了很多读者的来信。/r/n

word.name: readership
word.mean: n. (某一报刊杂志等的)读者们
word.lx: The Daily Echo has a readership of over ten million./r/n 《每日回声报》拥有读者逾一千万人。/r/n The paper has a wide readership./r/n 该报拥有广泛的读者。/r/n

word.name: readily
word.mean: ad. 不迟疑地,迅速地,轻易地
word.lx: He readily promised to help./r/n 他欣然答应帮忙。/r/n They can readily be brought anywhere./r/n 它们易于携带。/r/n

word.name: readiness
word.lx: The defences are kept in readiness for any enemy attack./r/n 防御工事已筑好，准备对付敌人进攻。/r/n She shows great readiness to learn./r/n 她表现出强烈的学习愿望。/r/n

word.name: reading
word.mean:
a. 阅读的
n. 阅读
word.lx: He is a man of wide reading./r/n 他是一个博览群书的人。/r/n Reading occupies most of my free time./r/n 阅读占去了我大部分的闲暇时间。/r/n

word.name: ready
word.mean: a. 准备好的,乐意的,情愿的
word.lx: The letter is ready for the post./r/n 信已准备好，可以寄出了。/r/n She is always ready to help others./r/n 她总是乐于助人。/r/n

word.name: ready-made
word.mean: a. 现成的, 做好的, 平凡的, 陈旧的

word.name: reagent
word.lx: He mixed the two reagents, though I had told him not to./r/n 他把这两种试剂混起来了，虽然我曾告诉他不要混起来。/r/n

word.name: real
word.mean: a. 实际的,现实的,真的,真实的
word.lx: What was the real reason for your absence?/r/n 你缺席的真正原因是什么？/r/n Bottled lemon juice is no good you must use the real thing./r/n 瓶装柠檬汁可不行－－你得用真货。/r/n

word.name: real estate
word.mean:
不动产,房地产
n. 房地产,不动产
word.lx: Lost money in the real estate bubble./r/n 在做房地产投机买卖中亏了本/r/n She is advised to invest in real estate./r/n 有人建议他投资于房地产。/r/n

word.name: realist
word.mean:
a. 现实主义的(作家)
n. 现实主义者

word.name: realistic
word.mean: a. 现实的,现实主义的
word.lx: What a realistic looking apple in the picture!/r/n 画中的苹果显得多逼真啊！/r/n His realistic novel was criticized by some people./r/n 他的现实主义小说遭到了一些人的批判。/r/n

word.name: reality
word.lx: This is not imagination but reality./r/n 这不是想象，是事实。/r/n We must face reality./r/n 我们必须面对现实。/r/n

word.name: realization
word.lx: I was struck by the sudden realization that I would probably never see her again./r/n 我突然意识到可能再也见不着她了。/r/n The realization of his ambition makes him very happy./r/n 他很高兴他的理想实现了。/r/n

word.name: realize
word.mean:
v. 了解,实现,净得
察觉;领悟
word.lx: My wishes have been realized./r/n 我的愿望实现了。/r/n The furniture realized 900 at the sale./r/n 拍卖这家具获900英镑./r/n

word.name: realm
word.lx: The spy was expelled from the realm./r/n 这名间谍被驱逐出境。/r/n A region, realm, or dwelling place conceived to be below the surface of the earth./r/n 下层社会设想在地球表面下面的区域、王国和居住场所/r/n

word.name: realty
word.lx: A chattel bound to realty./r/n 不动产附在不动产上的动产/r/n

word.name: ream
word.mean:
n. 令,连,大量的纸
v. 扩展,扩大,削掉
word.lx: He writes reams of verse./r/n 他写很多的诗。/r/n

word.name: reap
word.lx: The peasants are reaping a field of barley./r/n 农民们正在收割大麦。/r/n It is a season that peasants reap the corn from what they planted in spring./r/n 农民们春季播种玉米，现在是他们收获的季节。/r/n

word.name: reaper
word.lx: My father taught me how to operate a reaper./r/n 我父亲教我怎样使用收割机。/r/n A rabbit get catch in the blade of the reaper./r/n 一只兔子被卷到收割机的刀刃中去了。/r/n

word.name: reappear
word.lx: Her smile reappears in his mind./r/n 她的笑容再一次浮现在他脑海中。/r/n It reappeared long/soon after./r/n 过後很久[不久]又出现了./r/n

word.name: rear
word.mean:
n. 后面,背后
a. 后面的,背面的,后方的
v. 养育,饲养,举起
word.lx: The engine of this bus is in the rear./r/n 这辆公共汽车的发动机在后面。/r/n I got a flat tire of the rear wheel of my bicycle./r/n 我自行车的后轮车胎没气了。/r/n

word.name: rearrange
word.lx: I take the trouble to rearrange my schedule, but he do not even want to go another round./r/n 我费力重新安排时间，他却连想都不想去（喝）另一家。/r/n Can you rearrange our schedule?/r/n 你能重新安排一下我们的日程吗？/r/n

word.name: rearrest
word.mean:
n. 重新扣留(拘捕)
v. 重新拘捕(逮捕)

word.name: reason
word.mean:
n. 理由,原因,理智,理性
v. 说服,推论,下判断
word.lx: She can reason very clearly./r/n 她能很清晰地思考。/r/n Copernicus reasoned that the earth revolved around the sun./r/n 哥白尼论证了地球绕着太阳转。/r/n

word.name: reasonable
word.mean:
a. 合理的,有道理的,适度,通情达理的
ad. 合理地
word.lx: My mother was always reasonable./r/n 我母亲一向通情达理。/r/n You are fortunate to have such a reasonable father./r/n 你有这样一位通情达理的父亲，真是幸运。/r/n

word.name: reassurance
word.lx: A good doctor combines reassurance with fellow feelings for his or her patients./r/n 好医生善于把对他（或她）的病人的同情与消除疑虑结合起来。/r/n

word.name: reassuring
word.mean: a. 安心的,可靠的,坚强的

word.name: rebarbative
word.mean: a. 厌烦的,令人讨厌的,难看的

word.name: rebate
word.mean:
n. 减少
vt 减少(使...变钝)
word.lx: It made my day when I received a￡500 tax rebate./r/n 我收到500英镑税款折扣时乐不可支。/r/n He get a tax rebate at the end of the year./r/n 他在年底得到了一笔退回的税款。/r/n

word.name: Rebecca
word.lx: We named the lake Rebecca in memory of her./r/n 为了纪念她, 我们把这个湖命名为丽贝卡"。/r/n

word.name: rebel
word.mean:
n. 叛徒,反叛者
v. 反抗,谋反,抵抗
word.lx: The stomach rebels against too much food./r/n 胃不能接受过多的食物。/r/n The rebels made regular attacks on the railways./r/n 叛军不时地袭击铁路。/r/n

word.name: rebellion
word.lx: He faces a growing rebellion from the left wing of his party./r/n 他面对着党内左翼日益增强的反对势力。/r/n The people would rise in open rebellion if oppressed by a monarchy./r/n 如果遭到君主制的压迫，人民就会起来反抗。/r/n

word.name: rebellious
word.mean: a. 造反的,反抗的,难控制的
word.lx: Those rebellious teenagers are hard to control./r/n 那些反叛的青少年很难管教。/r/n Rising in revolt against civil authority or a government in power; rebellious./r/n 起义的，造反的起来反抗当局或当权的政府的；反叛的/r/n

word.name: rebinding
word.lx: She quarrelled with Paul and then married Peter on the rebound./r/n 她和保罗争吵後愤而嫁给了彼得./r/n His courageous words took his depressed supporters on the rebound./r/n 他的言词颇有胆量，鼓舞了那些本已垂头丧气的支持者。/r/n

word.name: reborn
word.lx: The old man felt reborn in his children./r/n 这个老人觉得在他的孩子们身上获得了新生./r/n

word.name: rebound
word.mean:
v. 弹回
vi.&n. 弹回,跳回
word.lx: She quarrelled with Paul and then married Peter on the rebound./r/n 她和保罗争吵後愤而嫁给了彼得./r/n The scheme rebounded on her in a way she had not expected./r/n 她未曾想到这计谋反倒使她自食其果./r/n

word.name: rebuff
word.mean:
n. 断然拒绝,严厉拒绝,漠不关心
v. 严厉拒绝
word.lx: He rebuffed all my offers of friendship./r/n 他拒绝了我的一切友好表示。/r/n Her kindness to him was met with a cruel rebuff./r/n 她一片好心却遭到他冷酷的拒绝。/r/n

word.name: rebuild
word.lx: The house was rebuilt after the fire./r/n 这所房子是在大火后重建的。/r/n Plans have been put forward to pull down and rebuild the area./r/n 已提出计划，要把这个地区的房屋推掉重建。/r/n

word.name: rebuke
word.mean:
n. 指责,谴责,非难
v. 斥责,指责,非难
word.lx: He received a stern rebuke from his superior./r/n 他受到上司的严厉斥责。/r/n You will hear about this (ie will receive a formal rebuke about it) later./r/n 这件事你就等瞧吧（要受到严厉斥责）./r/n

word.name: recalcitrant
word.mean:
a. 反抗的,反对的,顽强的
n. 反抗的人,顽强者
word.lx: Stubborn and intractable; recalcitrant./r/n 执拗的顽固和不受影响的；执拗的/r/n Resistant to authority or discipline; recalcitrant./r/n 难驯服的不屈服于权力或权威的；暴烈的/r/n

word.name: recant
word.mean: vt. 放弃主张(撤销,改变,公开认错)

word.name: recede
word.lx: As the tide receded we were able to look for shells./r/n 潮水退去，我们就能寻找贝壳了。/r/n The prospect of bankruptcy has now receded./r/n 破产的危险已经减少了。/r/n

word.name: receipt
word.lx: Please send me a receipt for the money./r/n 请寄给我一张收到此款的收据。/r/n We only take goods back if customers can produce the receipt./r/n 顾客如能出示收据, 我们才能予以退货./r/n

word.name: receivable
word.mean:
a. 可接受的,可信的
n. 应收帐款

word.name: receive
word.lx: His speech was favorably received./r/n 他的演讲很受欢迎。/r/n The boat received a heavy load./r/n 这船负有重载。/r/n

word.name: received
word.lx: We received 400 applications for the job./r/n 对这份工作, 我们接到400人的申请./r/n When her husband died, she received 50000 in insurance./r/n 她丈夫去世後, 她得到50000英镑的保险金./r/n

word.name: receiver
word.mean: n. 接收器,收款员,接待者
word.lx: Their business has failed and is in the hands of the receiver./r/n 他们的公司垮了，现在由破产管理人管理。/r/n Please put the receiver back after calling./r/n 打完电话后，请把听筒放回原位。/r/n

word.name: receiving
word.lx: You should fix the television antenna before receiving programs./r/n 接收节目前，你应该先装天线。/r/n Upon receiving your letter, I was as happy as could be./r/n 一收到你的信，我非常高兴。/r/n

word.name: receptacle
word.lx: Please find me a receptacle for sugar./r/n 请给我找一个放糖的容器。/r/n

word.name: reception
word.mean: n. 接待,招待会,接收,欢迎,接受
word.lx: The book met with a favorable reception./r/n 此书受到好评。/r/n Reception of TV programmes is unsatisfactory here./r/n 这里电视节目的接收情况不佳。/r/n

word.name: receptive
word.mean: a. 善于接纳的,感受性敏锐的

word.name: receptor
word.mean: n. 受容器,感觉器官,摄取体
word.lx: A sensory receptor that detects warmth./r/n 热探测器测量热量的敏感接受器/r/n

word.name: recess
word.mean:
n. 休息,休会,放假
v. 作凹处,休息
word.lx: The committee is going into recess for a couple of weeks./r/n 委员会打算休会几个星期。/r/n An open recess for holding a fire at the base of a chimney; a hearth./r/n 壁炉用于在烟囱底部燃火的敞口的凹窝；炉床/r/n

word.name: recession
word.mean: n. 后退,凹入的地方,不景气
word.lx: If we can pull through this recession, we will be in good shape./r/n 如果我们能渡过这段经济不景气的时间，我们就会好多了。/r/n The recession have cause thousands of bankruptcy./r/n 经济不景气造成数千万的破产。/r/n

word.name: recessive
word.mean: a. 退行的,逆行的,劣性的
word.lx: Brown eyes are dominant and blue eyes are recessive./r/n 棕色眼睛是显性的，蓝色眼睛是隐性的。/r/n

word.name: recipient
word.lx: One who is a recipient of hospitality at the home or table of another./r/n 客人在别人的家中或餐会上受到友好接待的人/r/n The recipient of an honor./r/n 受誉者接受荣誉的人/r/n

word.name: reciprocal
word.mean:
a. 相互的,互惠的
[数］n. 倒数
word.lx: They show reciprocal affection to each other./r/n 他们表达了彼此之间的爱慕。/r/n They have a reciprocal agreement to combat terrorism./r/n 他们有相互配合的协定，共同与恐怖主义作斗争。/r/n

word.name: reciprocate
word.lx: He reciprocated by wishing her good luck./r/n 他也祝她交好运./r/n I reciprocate your good wishes./r/n 我也同样祝福你./r/n

word.name: reciprocation
word.mean: n. 报答,互换,往复运动

word.name: reciprocity
word.mean: n. 相互性,相互作用,互惠主义

word.name: recitation
word.lx: Ritual recitation of verbal charms or spells to produce a magic effect./r/n 念咒口头咒语或符咒的仪式性的吟诵以产生魔力的效果/r/n He often cut recitation during his college days./r/n 他上大学时经常无故旷课，逃避背诵练习。/r/n

word.name: recklessness
word.lx: Recklessness invites disaster./r/n 轻率鲁莽会招致灾难。/r/n His recklessness brought down disaster on the whole family./r/n 他草率行事，使整个家庭遭到了灾难。/r/n

word.name: reckon
word.lx: I reckon this will be a hot summer./r/n 我估计这将是一个炎热的夏天。/r/n They reckon the book as one of his best works./r/n 他们认为这本书是他的优秀作品之一。/r/n

word.name: reckoning
word.lx: A day of reckoning./r/n 算帐的日子/r/n The business is washed up; a loan will do no more than delay the day of reckoning./r/n 生意已维持不下去了，贷款只能推迟（倒闭）清算的日子罢了。/r/n

word.name: reclaim
word.lx: Her mission was to reclaim former criminals./r/n 她的任务是感化过去的罪犯。/r/n You may be entitled to reclaim some of the tax you paid last year./r/n 你或许有权要求退回去年你交付的部分税金。/r/n

word.name: recline
word.lx: She reclined lazily on the cushions./r/n 她懒洋洋地靠在靠垫上。/r/n She reclined her head against my shoulder./r/n 她把头倚在我的肩上。/r/n

word.name: recliner
word.mean: n. 装有软垫的躺椅(=reclining chair)

word.name: recluse
word.mean:
a. 隐居的
n. 隐士
word.lx: This recluse shunned all company./r/n 这位隐士不与任何人来往。/r/n The condition of being a recluse./r/n 隐居处于做隐士的状况/r/n

word.name: recognition
word.lx: He has won wide recognition in the field of tropical medicine./r/n 他在热带医学这一领域里广获赞扬。/r/n The town has altered out of all recognition since I was last there./r/n 自从我上次离开这里以来，这小城已经变得认不出来了。/r/n

word.name: recoil
word.mean:
n. 畏缩,弹回,后座力
v. 退却,畏缩,弹回
word.lx: He tends to recoil from making difficult decisions./r/n 他在难以作出决定时往往踌躇不前。/r/n She recoiled at the sight of the snake./r/n 她一见到蛇就往后缩。/r/n

word.name: recollect
word.lx: Do you recollect her name?/r/n 你记得她的名字吗？/r/n I recollect that she had red hair./r/n 我记得她长着红头发。/r/n

word.name: recollection
word.lx: I have no recollection of meeting him./r/n 我不记得见过他。/r/n That evening together is one of my happiest recollections./r/n 我们一起欢度的那个晚上是我最快乐的事情之一。/r/n

word.name: recommend
word.mean: v. 建议,推荐,劝告,介绍
word.lx: The doctor strongly recommended that he take a holiday./r/n 医生竭力劝他去休假。/r/n Can you recommend to me a good dictionary?/r/n 你能为我推荐一本好字典吗？/r/n

word.name: recommendation
word.lx: Is a sweet disposition a recommendation in a wife?/r/n 温和的性情是做妻子的可取之处吗？/r/n The judge made recommendations to the court./r/n 法官向审判人员提出建议。/r/n

word.name: recommended
word.lx: The doctor recommended that the patient be fed liquid food./r/n 医生建议病人应吃流质食物。/r/n The doctor strongly recommended that he take a holiday./r/n 医生竭力劝他去休假。/r/n

word.name: recompense
word.mean:
n. 报偿,回礼,赔偿
v. 报偿,赔偿,报酬
word.lx: The insurance company will recompense his loss./r/n 保险公司将赔偿他的损失。/r/n

word.name: reconcile
word.lx: How can he reconcile it to his conscience?/r/n 他怎能问心无愧呢？/r/n We tried to reconcile her with her family./r/n 我们试图让她和她的家庭和好。/r/n

word.name: recondite
word.mean: a. 深奥的,难解的,隐藏的

word.name: reconfiguration
word.lx: Copy this information into the space provided below as a backup reference for service or reconfiguration./r/n 将此信息复制到下列空格内，作为工作或重新设置时的参考备份。/r/n

word.name: reconnaissance
word.lx: The squadron flew a reconnaissance mission./r/n 该空军中队执行一侦察任务./r/n Photographic aerial reconnaissance especially of military targets./r/n 空中照相侦察空中照相侦察，尤指军事目的的/r/n

word.name: reconnoiter
word.mean: v. 观察,探究,侦察,勘查,勘测

word.name: reconsider
word.lx: I conjure you most earnestly to reconsider your position./r/n 我最诚恳地请求你重新考虑一下你的立场./r/n We regret that we are unable to reconsider your case./r/n 我们很遗憾无法再考虑你的情况。/r/n

word.name: reconstitute
word.mean: vt. 重新构成(重新制定,复制)

word.name: reconstruct
word.lx: We reconstructed what the dinosaur looked like from a few of its bones./r/n 我们根据恐龙的一些骨头重组恐龙的原貌./r/n

word.name: reconstructed
word.mean: a. 重建的, 改造的
word.lx: We reconstructed what the dinosaur looked like from a few of its bones./r/n 我们根据恐龙的一些骨头重组恐龙的原貌./r/n The act or result of reconstructing./r/n 重建重新建造的行为或结果/r/n

word.name: reconstruction
word.lx: Reconstruction of that building is impossible./r/n 再重建这座建筑物是不可能的。/r/n I have a plan for the reconstruction of the city centre./r/n 我有一个重建城市中心的计划。/r/n

word.name: record
word.mean:
记录,唱片,履历
v. 记录,将(声音等)录下
word.lx: He has a long criminal record./r/n 他有长期犯罪记录。/r/n The broadcast was recorded, not live./r/n 这次广播是事先录音的，不是现场直播。/r/n

word.name: recorded
word.lx: The thermometer recorded 40C./r/n 温度计上显示出40C./r/n Ten bankruptcies were recorded in this town last year./r/n 去年这个镇已有十起破产事件。/r/n

word.name: recorder
word.mean: n. 录音机; 直笛，又称木笛、竖笛或牧童笛
word.lx: He bought a new cassette recorder./r/n 他买了一台新的盒式录音机。/r/n We needed someone to fix the tape recorder./r/n 我们需要有人来修理录音机。/r/n

word.name: recording
word.mean:
a. 记录的,记录用的
n. 录音
word.lx: The recording was spoiled by scratches./r/n 录音被沙沙声破坏了。/r/n On dictation equipment, the process of removing the recording from a recording medium./r/n 在口述记录设备上，从记录媒体上擦除记录的处理过程。/r/n

word.name: recount
word.mean: v. 详述,叙述,重新计算
word.lx: They had to recount the vote./r/n 他们不得不重新计算选票。/r/n The defeated candidate demanded a recount./r/n 落选的候选人要求重新计算选票。/r/n

word.name: recover
word.lx: The police recovered the stolen jewellery./r/n 警察找回了被盗的珠宝。/r/n He is very ill and unlikely to recover./r/n 他病得非常厉害，不大可能恢复健康了。/r/n

word.name: recoverable
word.lx: An artificial, recoverable satellite that is designed to carry and support humans, animals, or other living organisms./r/n 生物卫星设计用于运送和搭载人、动物或其他生物的、人造可返回式卫星/r/n

word.name: recovery
word.lx: Th woman was delighted at the recovery of her stolen jewels./r/n 那位妇人对找回被盗的珠宝感到非常高兴。/r/n He is well on his way to recovery./r/n 他正在顺利恢复。/r/n

word.name: recreant
word.mean:
a. 胆小的,怯懦的,不义的
n. 胆怯者,不义的人,叛徒
word.lx: You recreant knave!/r/n 你这个不义之徒!/r/n

word.name: recreate
word.lx: I charge you not to hunt or recreate your selves on that sacred day./r/n 我可告诉你，在那个神圣的日子里不许打猎或搞娱乐活动消遣。/r/n

word.name: recreation
word.lx: His only recreations are drinking beer and working in the garden./r/n 他仅有的消遣是喝啤酒和在花园里种花草。/r/n In other words, we had better take sufficient recreation to relax after work./r/n 换句话说，我们最好工作后，消遣消遣来轻松一下。/r/n

word.name: recruit
word.mean:
n. 招聘,新兵,新份子,新会员
v. 恢复,补充,徵募
word.lx: We are having difficulties in recruiting well-qualified staff./r/n 我们难以招募到素质好的职员。/r/n New recruits to our music club are always welcome./r/n 我们的音乐俱乐部随时欢迎新会员参加。/r/n

word.name: rectangle
word.lx: This room is a rectangle./r/n 这间屋子是长方形的。/r/n Having the shape of a rectangle./r/n 矩形的具有矩形形状的/r/n

word.name: rectification
word.lx: Rectification means the whole Party studying Marxism through criticism and self-criticism./r/n 整风就是全党通过批评和自我批评来学习马克思主义。/r/n

word.name: rectifier
word.lx: A diode is used as a rectifier./r/n 二极管用作整流器。/r/n A rectifier of many wrongs./r/n 一个纠正了许多错误的人/r/n

word.name: rectify
word.lx: I made a mistake that can not be rectified./r/n 我犯了一个无法改正的错误。/r/n He cleaned the bottle with rectified spirit./r/n 他用精馏酒精清洗瓶子。/r/n

word.name: rector
word.mean: n. 教区牧师,校长,院长

word.name: recuperate
word.mean: v. 恢复,使恢复健康,使恢复精神
word.lx: He is still recuperating from his operation./r/n 他动手术後仍在恢复中./r/n

word.name: recuperation
word.mean: n. 复原，恢复：恢复健康和力气.
word.lx: The old undue grip relaxes and the process of recuperation and repair begins./r/n 你原先不适当的紧张得以放松，开始了恢复和修整的过程。/r/n

word.name: recur
word.lx: My first meeting with her often recurs to my memory./r/n 我与她的第一次会面的情景经常出现在我的记忆中。/r/n The recurring decimal 3.999... is also described as 3.9 recurring./r/n 循环小数｀3.999...＇亦作｀3.9循环＇./r/n

word.name: recurrence
word.lx: A sudden attack, recurrence, or intensification of a disease./r/n 发作突然的发作、复发或疾病的加剧/r/n The quality or state of being periodic; recurrence at regular intervals./r/n 周期性周期出现的性质或状态；以固定的间隔而发生/r/n

word.name: recurrent
word.mean: a. 再发生的,定期重覆的,循环的

word.name: recusant
word.mean:
a. 不服从规章的
n. 拒绝服从的人

word.name: recycle
word.mean: v. 使再循环,再利用,再制

word.name: recycling
word.lx: Recycling is the only proper way./r/n 循环再生是惟一的好办法。/r/n Recycled materials are mostly of limited use./r/n 再生材料大多用途有限./r/n

word.name: red
word.mean:
a. 红色的
n. 红色
word.lx: I received a bunch of red roses on my birthday./r/n 生日那天，我收到一束红玫瑰。/r/n The sky slowly changed from blue to red./r/n 天空慢慢由蓝色变为红色。/r/n

word.name: red cedar
word.lx: The durable, aromatic wood of any of these plants, especially that of the red cedar, often used to make chests./r/n 雪松木这些植物的耐久的、带香味的木材，尤指红雪松的木材，常用于制作箱子/r/n

word.name: Red Cross
word.lx: Each worker contributed one dollar to the Red Cross./r/n 每个工人都向红十字会捐献了一美元。/r/n The Chinese Red Cross contributed a generous sum during the war./r/n 战争期间, 中国红十字会捐了一大笔钱。/r/n

word.name: red meat
word.mean: 红色肉类(指羊肉、牛肉等)
word.lx: A bird that eats insects, fruit, and seeds; stopped eating red meat on advice from her doctor./r/n 习惯吃昆虫、水果和种子的鸟；她听医生的劝告停止吃红色肉类/r/n

word.name: redden
word.lx: The reddening sky threw into relief a line of trees on the horizon./r/n 通红的天空使地平线上的一行清晰可见。/r/n She reddened at the sight./r/n 她看到那光景而脸红。/r/n

word.name: redecorate
word.lx: We can redecorate the room at little expense, if we use this old paint./r/n 我们要是用这种旧漆重新装饰这房间, 就不用花多少钱了./r/n We must redecorate the staircase./r/n 我们得把楼梯重新装饰一下./r/n

word.name: redeem
word.lx: He was trying to redeem himself for his earlier failure./r/n 他试图挽回他早些时候的失败。/r/n She redeemed her reputation with a powerful speech to the party convention./r/n 她由于向党代表大会做了有力的演说而挽回了自己的声誉。/r/n

word.name: redemption
word.mean: n. 补救(恢复,偿还,补救,弥补)
word.lx: The boy is beyond redemption./r/n 这个男孩子不可救药了。/r/n He had finished the redemption of his promises./r/n 他已经履行完他的诺言了。/r/n

word.name: redesign
word.lx: From something he let fall, I believe they are planning to redesign the machine./r/n 从他透露的话里看，我想他们是打算重新设计这台机器。/r/n

word.name: red-hot
word.lx: The reporter had a red-hot story./r/n 那个记者掌握著最新消息。/r/n

word.name: redirect
word.mean:
a. 再直接的
v. 重新传入,重新寄送

word.name: redo
word.lx: I want to redo the apartment to go with my new furniture./r/n 我刚买了新家具，想重新装潢房子。/r/n Redo a living area in yellow./r/n 把房子起居部分重新装修成黄色/r/n

word.name: redolent
word.mean: a. 有...香味的,令人想起...的
word.lx: He is redolent of evil./r/n 他浑身充满了邪气。/r/n

word.name: redound
word.lx: Her hard work redounds to her credit/to the honour of the school./r/n 她工作努力从而提高了自己的声誉[为学校增添了荣誉]./r/n This course of action will redound to our advantage./r/n 这种做法对我们很有好处./r/n

word.name: redress
word.mean:
n. 赔偿,救济,矫正
v. 纠正,匡正,革除
word.lx: You must seek redress in the law courts for the damage to your car./r/n 你的车子受到了损坏，你应当通过法律途径要求赔偿。/r/n He did all that he could do to redress these wrongs./r/n 他尽可能地补偿这些错误。/r/n

word.name: reduce
word.lx: He is reduced almost to a skeleton./r/n 他瘦得几乎变成了一个骨头架子。/r/n They were reduced to begging or starving./r/n 他们穷得不行乞便挨饿。/r/n

word.name: reductionism
word.mean:
还原论
a procedure or theory that reduces complex data and phenomena to simple terms

word.name: redundancy
word.lx: The takeover cause250 redundancy./r/n 接管移交造成250人的裁员。/r/n A cyclic code with minimum redundancy used to check errors in a set of characters./r/n 一种用于检查一组字符的错误、并且具有最小冗余度的循环码。/r/n

word.name: redundant
word.lx: In the sentence She lives alone by herself", the word" alone" is redundant./r/n 在“她独自一人单独生活中”这个句子中，＂单独”是多余的。/r/n

word.name: reed
word.lx: There are some reeds in the pond./r/n 池塘里有些芦苇。/r/n A16-foot reed stop on an organ./r/n 风琴的十六音步簧/r/n

word.name: reef
word.lx: The ship was wrecked on a reef./r/n 这船触礁失事了。/r/n The ship struck a hidden reef and went dawn with all hands./r/n 船只撞上暗礁与全体船员一起沉没。/r/n

word.name: reek
word.mean:
n. 恶臭
v. 放出恶臭,有...气味
word.lx: Do you smell the reek of stale tobacco?/r/n 你闻到发霉烟草的臭味了吗？/r/n That reek is from the fox./r/n 那股恶臭是狐狸发出的。/r/n

word.name: reel
word.mean:
n. 卷筒,线轴
v. 卷,绕
vi. 眩晕,蹒跚
vt. 卷
word.lx: He reeled back into the room./r/n 他摇摇摆摆地走回房间。/r/n His mind was reeling with all that he had seen and heard./r/n 他的所见所闻使他内心大为震动。/r/n

word.name: reelection
word.lx: Mayor Jones comes up far reelection this fall./r/n 琼斯市长今年秋天将再度参加竞选。/r/n The president is going to stand for reelection./r/n 这位总统准备参加竞选连任。/r/n

word.name: reenter
word.lx: I reentered the room by another door./r/n 我从另外一个门再次进入该房间。/r/n

word.name: reevaluate
word.mean:
v. 重新估计
vt. 重新评价

word.name: reexamine
word.mean: vt. 再调查,再审查,再考,复试

word.name: refer
word.mean: v. 把…提交,谈及,谘询,参考
word.lx: This regulation refers only to children./r/n 这些规定仅适用于儿童。/r/n For further particulars, please refer to Chapter Ten./r/n 详情请看第10章。/r/n

word.name: referee
word.mean:
n. 仲裁人,调解人,裁判员
v. 仲裁,裁判
word.lx: The referee awarded a free kick./r/n 裁判员判定罚一个任意球。/r/n The referee counted him out in the first round./r/n 裁判判定他在第一回合被击败。/r/n

word.name: reference
word.lx: There is no further reference to him in her diary./r/n 她的日记中没有进一步提到他。/r/n You should make a reference to a dictionary./r/n 你应该参考字典。/r/n

word.name: referendum
word.mean: n. 公民投票,普通投票,请示书
word.lx: The question was decided by referendum./r/n 这问题是由全民投票决定的。/r/n

word.name: referral
word.mean:
1. 提及;参考
2. 推荐;介绍;指点
3. 被推荐人;(经介绍)转诊病人

word.name: refill
word.lx: Allow me to refill your cup./r/n 请允许我给您再斟上一杯。/r/n Set me refill your cup./r/n 我来给你再斟上一杯。/r/n

word.name: refine
word.lx: The oil will be refined./r/n 这些石油将被精炼。/r/n After30 years, the mature author was able to refine on the work of his youth./r/n 过去30年，这位作家已经成熟，他可以将年轻时候写的作品修改得更完美了。/r/n

word.name: refinement
word.lx: Her mother is a woman with great refinement./r/n 她母亲是一个非常文雅的女人。/r/n The new car has many added refinements such as air-conditioning and anti- blocking brakes./r/n 这辆新车有许多精巧的附加装置，如空调和防抱死装置。/r/n

word.name: refinery
word.lx: He was dismissed from the oil refinery./r/n 他被那家炼油厂解雇了。/r/n The oil is carried to the oil refinery by pipelines./r/n 石油通过输油管输送到炼油厂。/r/n

word.name: reflect
word.lx: The results reflect the greatest credit upon all concerned./r/n 这些成绩带给所有有关人员最大的荣誉。/r/n The sunlight was reflected in the water./r/n 日光由水面反射出来。/r/n

word.name: reflection
word.lx: On further reflection she saw her mistake./r/n 进一步细想后，她明白了自己的错误。/r/n The cat felt curious when she saw her own reflection in the mirror./r/n 小猫看到自己在镜子中的倒影，感到很好奇。/r/n

word.name: reflective
word.mean: a. 反射的,反映的,熟虑的
word.lx: Not reflective; unthinking./r/n 不加思虑的；不思考的/r/n

word.name: reflexion
word.mean: n. 反射(反射波,折射,考虑,想法,指责)

word.name: reform
word.mean:
n. 改革,改正,感化
v. 改革,改过自新,改善
word.lx: You have had every chance to reform./r/n 你是一直有改过自新的机会的。/r/n Many reforms must be made to the education system./r/n 教育体制要作许多改革。/r/n

word.name: reformer
word.mean: n. 改革家,改革运动者

word.name: refract
word.lx: Light is refracted when passed through a prism./r/n 光线经过棱镜时产生折射现象./r/n

word.name: refraction
word.lx: Having one direction along which double refraction of light does not take place. Used of a crystal./r/n 单轴晶体的有一个方向的，沿此方向不发生光的双折射。用于晶体/r/n

word.name: refractory
word.mean: a. 不听话的,执拗的,难治疗的
word.lx: The state or quality of being stubborn or refractory./r/n 顽固，倔强顽固、固执或倔强的状态或性质/r/n

word.name: refresh
word.mean: v. 使...生气蓬勃,提起精神,恢复精神
word.lx: I refreshed myself with a cup of coffee./r/n 我喝了一杯咖啡给自己提提神。/r/n Let me refresh your memory with some fact./r/n 我来提几件事帮你恢复记忆吧。/r/n

word.name: refreshing
word.mean: a. 使清爽的,有精神的,爽快的
word.lx: There is nothing as refreshing as lemon tea./r/n 什麽都不如柠檬茶那样提神./r/n After a refreshing nap, Mr Adams was again his own man./r/n 亚当斯先生睡了个好午觉，又恢复了精神。/r/n

word.name: refrigerate
word.mean:
v. 冷藏,使冷
vt. 冷冻,冷藏

word.name: refrigerator
word.lx: Mary put a lot of food in the refrigerator./r/n 玛利把许多吃的放在冰箱里了。/r/n The boys made away with the contents of the refrigerator./r/n 男孩子们把冰箱中的食物吃得精光。/r/n

word.name: refuge
word.mean:
n. 避难(处),庇护(所)
v. 庇护,避难(所)
word.lx: A small cave was the only refuge from the cold./r/n 小洞穴是唯一的避寒处。/r/n It is a classic sanctuary in which the rationalist fancy may take refuge./r/n 这是一所古雅的圣殿，理性主义者可以躲在其中。/r/n

word.name: refugee
word.lx: The government has set two refugee camps./r/n 政府已经建了两个难民营。/r/n There are many refugees from that country./r/n 有许多来自那个国家的难民。/r/n

word.name: refurbish
word.lx: The flat will be refurbished for the new tenants./r/n 这套房间将重新粉刷以接纳新房客./r/n

word.name: refusal
word.lx: He made a refusal of her invitation./r/n 他拒绝了她的邀请。/r/n We interpreted his silence as a refusal./r/n 我们认为他的沉默是拒绝的表示。/r/n

word.name: refuse
word.mean:
n. 废物,垃圾
vi. 不愿,拒绝
vt. 拒绝
word.lx: He asked me to marry him but I refused./r/n 他向我求婚，但我拒绝了。/r/n We were refused permission to enter./r/n 我们被拒之门外。/r/n

word.name: refutation
word.lx: A person engaged in or inclined to controversy, argument, or refutation./r/n 辩论者；争辩者从事或喜欢争辩、辩论或驳斥的人/r/n

word.name: refute
word.lx: I was able to refute his argument./r/n 我能驳倒他的论点。/r/n As for the Flat Earth theory, I believe I could refute it./r/n 至于地平学说，我相信我能驳斥它。/r/n

word.name: regain
word.lx: He regained his health after the operation./r/n 手术后他恢复了健康。/r/n When will the patient regain his consciousness?/r/n 这个病人什么时候恢复知觉？/r/n

word.name: regal
word.mean: a. 帝王的,适于帝王的
word.lx: The regal lady had made a deep impression on him./r/n 那位雍容华贵的妇人给他留下了深刻的印象。/r/n Royal or imperial; regal./r/n 贵族或皇室的；帝王的/r/n

word.name: regale
word.mean:
vt. 盛情招待
n. 款待
word.lx: She regaled us with an account of her school-days./r/n 她讲她上学时的往事把我们逗得不亦乐乎./r/n

word.name: regard
word.mean:
n. 关心,注意,尊敬
v. 视为,注意,和...有关
word.lx: She is generally regarded as one of the best writers in the country./r/n 人们普遍认为她是该国最优秀的作家之一。/r/n She regarded him thoughtfully./r/n 她若有所思地看着他。/r/n

word.name: regarding
word.lx: I know nothing regarding the future./r/n 我对未来一无所知。/r/n She said nothing regarding your request./r/n 她对你的要求只字不提。/r/n

word.name: regardless
word.lx: All our proposals were rejected, regardless of their merits./r/n 我们所有的建议都遭到拒绝，不管这些建议的价值如何。/r/n They decorated the house regardless of cost./r/n 他们不惜工本装修这栋房子。/r/n

word.name: regardless of
word.lx: They decorated the house regardless of cost./r/n 他们不惜工本装修这栋房子。/r/n She is determined to do regardless of all consequences./r/n 她不顾一切后果，决心这样做。/r/n

word.name: regards
word.lx: Should you happen to see him, please give him my regards./r/n 如果你碰巧见到他，请代我向他致意。/r/n Should you see him, please give him my regards./r/n 如果你见到他，请代我向他致意。/r/n

word.name: regency
word.mean: n. 摄政统治,摄政期间

word.name: regenerate
word.mean:
vt. 再生(回收,革新)
a. 再生的(更新的,革新的)
word.lx: The party soon regenerated under her leadership./r/n 该党在她的领导下很快焕然一新./r/n Their aim is to regenerate British industry./r/n 他们的目的是复兴英国的工业./r/n

word.name: regenerative
word.mean: a. 再生的,更生的,更新的

word.name: regent
word.mean:
n. 摄政者,摄政,评议员
a. 摄政的
word.lx: The regent carried out an advanced system in his country./r/n 摄政者在他的国家推行了一套先进的制度。/r/n His address be248 regent street, right?/r/n 他的住址是摄政街284号，对吗？/r/n

word.name: reggae
word.mean: n. 瑞格舞（西印度群岛的一种舞蹈及舞曲）

word.name: regime
word.mean:
n. 政体,制度
v. 严格抵制管辖
word.lx: Things will change under the new regime./r/n 在新政权下，事情将会发生变化。/r/n The people have been kept down for years by a brutal regime./r/n 人民多年遭受野蛮制度压迫./r/n

word.name: regimental
word.lx: The regimental mascot is a goat./r/n 这个团的吉祥物是山羊./r/n The regimental band triumphantly piped the soldiers in./r/n 团部的乐队用风笛奏起凯歌，迎入士兵。/r/n

word.name: register
word.mean:
v. 记录,登记,注册,挂号
n. 暂存器,记录,登记簿
word.lx: The car was registered in my name./r/n 汽车是用我的名字登记注册的。/r/n Each class has a register of 50 students./r/n 每班有50名学员注册。/r/n

word.name: registered
word.mean:
a. 注册的,登记过的,记名的
vbl. 注册
word.lx: The car was registered in my name./r/n 汽车是用我的名字登记注册的。/r/n Now so many football clubs are registered with the football association./r/n 当今有那么多的足球俱乐部在足协登记注册。/r/n

word.name: registrar
word.mean: n. 记录者,登记者,登记官员
word.lx: You can obtain the application from the registrar./r/n 你可以向注册人员索取申请书。/r/n

word.name: registry
word.mean: n. 记入,登记,登记名册

word.name: regret
word.mean:
n. 遗憾,后悔,抱歉
v. 为...感到遗憾,后悔,惋惜
word.lx: We informed her with regret of our decision./r/n 我们遗憾地把我们的决定通知她。/r/n She immediately regretted her decision./r/n 她做出决定后立即感到后悔。/r/n

word.name: regretful
word.mean: a. 惋惜的,遗憾的,哀惜的
word.lx: His decision is made us feeling regretful./r/n 他的决定令人感到遗憾。/r/n

word.name: regretfully
word.lx: I very regretfully tell you, and your examination is failed./r/n 我很遗憾地告诉你，你考试不及格。/r/n

word.name: regrettable
word.mean: a. 可叹的,可惜的,抱歉的

word.name: regular
word.mean: a. 有规律的,有规则的,整齐的,正规的
word.lx: A cube is a regular solid./r/n 立方体是正多面体。/r/n He has very regular features./r/n 他五官端正。/r/n

word.name: regularity
word.lx: Regularity ought to be observed, as regularity is very conducive to health./r/n 生活应遵守规律，因为规律对健康有益。/r/n They meet with great regularity./r/n 他们定期会面。/r/n

word.name: regularly
word.lx: I regularly get letters from people who have read my books./r/n 我经常收到读过我的书的读者的来信。/r/n Take the medicine regularly three times a day./r/n 定时吃药，每天三次。/r/n

word.name: regulate
word.mean: v. 有系统的管理,规定,调节
word.lx: Accidents sometimes happen even in the best regulated families./r/n 即便是在管理最好的家庭，事故有时也会发生的。/r/n Your watch is always slow; it needs to be regulated./r/n 你的手表总是慢，需要校准一下。/r/n

word.name: regulator
word.mean: n. 调整者,取缔的人,调整器

word.name: regulatory
word.mean: a. 取缔的,统制的,调整的
word.lx: Complaint is referred to several regulatory body./r/n 投诉提交给好几个管理机构。/r/n

word.name: rehabilitate
word.mean:
v. 恢复原状,使复权,使恢复
恢复名誉
word.lx: Punishment intended to rehabilitate or improve./r/n 处罚为复原或提高而进行的惩罚/r/n

word.name: rehabilitation
word.lx: The study, theory, and practice of prison management and criminal rehabilitation./r/n 刑狱学一种对刑罚典狱和监狱管理的研究、实践和理论/r/n

word.name: rehash
word.lx: His answer is just a rehash version of my lecture./r/n 他的回答只不过是把我的讲义重复了一遍。/r/n

word.name: rehearsal
word.mean:
n. 排练,彩排
v. (使)排练,背诵
word.lx: The whole cast broke off for coffee in the middle of rehearsal./r/n 全体演员在排练休息时喝咖啡。/r/n Carlin has been so out of it at rehearsal that week./r/n 卡琳那个星期彩排的时候一直醉得不省人事。/r/n

word.name: rehearse
word.mean: v. 预演,排演,预先演习
word.lx: The actors were rehearsing the play./r/n 演员们一直在排练这出戏。/r/n

word.name: reign
word.mean:
n. 执政,主权,王朝
v. 当政,统治,占优势
word.lx: He reigned over the country for forty years./r/n 他统治了这个国家四十年。/r/n Silence reigned everywhere./r/n 万籁俱寂。/r/n

word.name: reimburse
word.lx: All expenses will be reimbursed (to you)./r/n 一切费用都能（给你）报销./r/n We will reimburse the customer for any loss or damage./r/n 我们愿赔偿顾客受到的一切损失和损害./r/n

word.name: rein
word.mean:
n. 缰绳,统驭,支配
v. 驾驭,以缰绳控制,统制
word.lx: This horse reins well./r/n 这匹马易于驾驭。/r/n He pulled at the reins./r/n 他使劲拉住缰绳。/r/n

word.name: reincarnation
word.mean: n. 再赋与肉体,化身,再生

word.name: reindeer
word.lx: Reindeer have branched antlers./r/n 驯鹿有带叉的角。/r/n Any of several large reindeer native to northern North America./r/n 北美驯鹿原产于北美洲北部的一种巨大的驯鹿/r/n

word.name: reinforce
word.mean:
n. 加固物
v. 增援,加强
vt. 加强,增援
word.lx: Our defences must be reinforced against attack./r/n 我们必须加强防御设施以抵御进攻。/r/n This evidence reinforces my view that he is a spy./r/n 这个证据证实了我认为他是间谍的这一看法。/r/n

word.name: reinstate
word.mean:
v. 恢复(原职)
vt. 使恢复原有的职位
word.lx: His supporters failed in their attempt to reinstate the President in the White House./r/n 他的支持者试图使总统重新入主白宫的努力失败了。/r/n

word.name: reintegrate
word.mean: v. 再使完整,恢复,重建

word.name: reiterate
word.mean: v. 反覆地说,反覆地做
word.lx: The captain reiterated the command to us./r/n 上尉对我们重申了那项命令。/r/n The teacher reiterates that rule./r/n 老师重申了那条规则。/r/n

word.name: reject
word.mean:
n. 被拒之人,不合格品,不及格者
v. 拒绝,驳回,丢弃
word.lx: The supermarket rejected all spotted apples./r/n 超级市场丢弃了所有的烂苹果。/r/n The factory sells some of its better rejects cheaply, but it throws most of the rejects away./r/n 这家公司廉价出售略好一些的次品，但将大多数次品丢弃。/r/n

word.name: rejection
word.mean: n. 拒绝,被弃,被抛弃的实例
word.lx: Her proposal met with continual rejections./r/n 她的建议一再遭到拒绝。/r/n The rejection of their pay claim was given a less than rhapsodic reception by the miners./r/n 矿工要求提高工资遭到拒绝而甚为恼火./r/n

word.name: rejoice
word.lx: We rejoiced at the good news./r/n 我们为这个好消息而高兴。/r/n They all rejoiced to hear the happy news./r/n 他们都很乐于听到这个令人高兴的消息。/r/n

word.name: rejoicing
word.mean:
n. 欣喜,高兴,欢欣之事
vbl. 使...欢喜,高兴,庆祝
word.lx: Yes, " I said, rejoicing with him./r/n "是的。"我真替他高兴。/r/n

word.name: rejoin
word.mean:
vt. 使再结合, 再加入, 再回答
vi. 重新聚集, 回答, 答辩

word.name: rejuvenate
word.mean: v. 使...年轻,使...恢复精神

word.name: rekindle
word.lx: Nothing could rekindle her extinct passion./r/n 她激情已逝, 无从心回意转./r/n

word.name: relapse
word.mean:
n. 复旧,故态复萌,再发
v. 故态复萌,再陷邪道,再度堕落

word.name: relate
word.mean: v. 讲,叙述,使联系,有关系
word.lx: Children need to learn to relate to other children./r/n 孩子们应该学会与其他孩子友好相处。/r/n These two events were related to each other./r/n 这两个事件相互有联系。/r/n

word.name: related
word.mean:
a. 有关系的,有关联的
v. 讲,有关系
vbl. 讲,有关系
word.lx: A variable so related to another that for each value assumed by one there is a value determined for the other./r/n 应变量，函数一个与他量有关联的变量，这一量中的任何一值都能在他量中找到对应的固定值/r/n We are nearly related./r/n 我们是至亲。/r/n

word.name: relation
word.mean: n. 关系,家人,亲戚,叙述,陈述
word.lx: Their relationship has lasted many years./r/n 他们的感情已经有很多年了。/r/n He is a near relation of mine./r/n 他是我的一个近亲。/r/n

word.name: relationship
word.lx: Their relationship has lasted many years./r/n 他们的感情已经有很多年了。/r/n The relationship between them is being improved./r/n 他们之间的关系正在改善。/r/n

word.name: relative
word.mean:
a. 相对的,比较的
n. 亲戚,亲属
word.lx: The teacher asked me some questions relative to my paper./r/n 老师问了我一些和我的论文有关的问题。/r/n They are now living in relative comfort./r/n 他们现在过着比较舒适的生活。/r/n

word.name: relax
word.lx: His muscles relaxed./r/n 他的肌肉松弛了。/r/n The music will help to relax you./r/n 音乐会使你感到轻松。/r/n

word.name: relaxation
word.lx: Would you like to have some relaxation after swimming?/r/n 游完泳后你愿意放松一下吗？/r/n Fishing is his favorite relaxation./r/n 他最喜爱的消遣是钓鱼。/r/n

word.name: relaxing
word.lx: I find stamp collecting relaxing and it takes my mind off my work./r/n 我觉得集邮是一种休息，因为它可以使我的注意力从工中移去。/r/n His muscles relaxed./r/n 他的肌肉松弛了。/r/n

word.name: relay
word.mean:
vt. 中继(用继电器控制,接替)
n. 继电器(转播,备用品,替班人)

word.name: release
word.mean:
n. 释放,让渡,发行
v. 释放,让与,准予发表
word.lx: He was released from prison after serving his sentence./r/n 他刑满获释。/r/n The new film will be released next month./r/n 这部新的电影下个月发行。/r/n

word.name: relegate
word.mean: v. 命令撤离,降低地位,贬谪
word.lx: Will Spurs be relegated to the third division?/r/n 斯珀尔斯队会降为丙级队吗?/r/n Mr. Taylor relegate his project to his son after he have ret./r/n 泰勒先生退休后把他的事业移转给儿子。/r/n

word.name: relent
word.mean: v. 变宽厚,变温和,动怜悯之心
word.lx: At first she threatened to dismiss us all, but later she relented./r/n 起初她威胁要解雇我们所有的人，但是后来她态度软化了。/r/n The police will not relent in their fight against crime./r/n 警方在跟犯罪分子的斗争中决不手软。/r/n

word.name: relentless
word.mean: a. 无情的,冷酷的,残酷的
word.lx: He was relentless in demanding repayment of the debt./r/n 他冷酷无情地要求偿还那笔债。/r/n

word.name: relentlessly
word.mean: ad. 无情地, 残酷地
word.lx: He drives the team relentlessly./r/n 他无情地鞭策全队苦练。/r/n The sun glared down relentlessly./r/n 太阳毫不留情地发出强烈的光。/r/n

word.name: reliability
