word.lx: He was quick to take up the gauntlet thrown down by the opposition./r/n 他立即接受了对方提出的挑战。/r/n You know that Bill was thrown out of college for failing his exams./r/n 你知道吗, 比尔因考试不及格而被大学开除了。/r/n

word.name: thrush
word.mean: n. 画眉,鹅口疮,蹄叉腐烂
word.lx: The thrush is a kind of small singing bird./r/n 画眉是一种小鸣禽。/r/n My little son has a thrush./r/n 我的小儿子得了鹅口疮。/r/n

word.name: thrust
word.mean:
n. 推力,刺,力推
v. 插入,推挤,刺
word.lx: We thrust our way through the crowd./r/n 我们用力挤过人群。/r/n The enemy made a thrust against our troop./r/n 敌人向我军发动了袭击。/r/n

word.name: thrusting
word.mean:
n. (猛)推, 插, 挤
a. 有强大推进力的
word.lx: The act or process of pushing or thrusting out./r/n 推，掷推出或掷出的行为或过程/r/n We thrust our way through the crowd./r/n 我们用力挤过人群。/r/n

word.name: thud
word.lx: The sound of such a blow; a thud./r/n 重击声响亮有力的重击声；砰的一声/r/n It fell with a dead thud./r/n 它砰的一声倒了下来。/r/n

word.name: thug
word.lx: He is done over by a gang of thug after a football match./r/n 他在足球比赛结束以後受到一帮暴徒的殴打。/r/n He is badly beat up by a gang of thug./r/n 他被一帮暴徒打得死去活来。/r/n

word.name: thumb
word.mean:
n. 拇指
v. 示意要求搭车,迅速翻阅
word.lx: When the play opened, the local press gave it the thumbs down./r/n 这出戏公演时，当地报纸对它评价不佳。/r/n He thumbed through the address book looking for the number./r/n 他翻阅地址簿，寻找号码。/r/n

word.name: thumbnail
word.mean:
n. 大拇指的指甲,极小之物,小图片
a. 极小的,极短的
豆腐干"(文章)"

word.name: thump
word.mean:
n. 重打,其声音
v. 重打,砰地撞到,用拳头打
word.lx: The old man thumpes noisily along the passage./r/n 那老人沿着过道步履沉重地走着。/r/n He sat down with a thump./r/n 他砰的一声坐下。/r/n

word.name: thumping
word.lx: He was thumping the keys of the piano./r/n 他重重地敲击钢琴琴键。/r/n My heart was thumping (with excitement)./r/n 我（激动得）心砰砰跳./r/n

word.name: thunder
word.mean:
n. 雷电,雷声
v. 打雷,大声喊出
word.lx: My little dog always hides under the bed when it thunders./r/n 我的小狗一听到打雷就藏到床底下。/r/n We could hear the thunder of distant guns./r/n 我们可以听到远处炮声隆隆。/r/n

word.name: thunderbolt
word.lx: The news of his death was a real thunderbolt./r/n 他去世的消息真是晴天霹雳。/r/n The unexpected defeat came as a thunderbolt./r/n 这意外的失败犹如晴天霹雳。/r/n

word.name: thunderous
word.lx: The stillness was rent by thunderous applause./r/n 雷鸣般的掌声打破了寂静。/r/n His words were greeted with long and thunderous applause./r/n 他的话引起长时间雷鸣般的掌声。/r/n

word.name: thunderstorm
word.lx: A thunderstorm forced him to take refuge at a hut./r/n 一场雷雨迫使他躲在草屋里。/r/n You slept right through the thunderstorm./r/n 你一直睡著, 这场雷雨都没把你吵醒./r/n

word.name: thunderstruck
word.mean: a. 吓坏了的,遭雷击的

word.name: Thursday
word.lx: We have meetings every Thursday afternoon./r/n 我们每个星期四下午开会。/r/n The meeting is scheduled for Thursday./r/n 会议定于星期四举行。/r/n

word.name: thus
word.mean:
ad. 如此,这样,因此,从而
conj. 因此,于是
word.lx: It has been thus and will continue to be so./r/n 事情一直是这样，并将继续这样下去。/r/n He is the eldest son and thus heir to the title./r/n 他是长子，因此是头衔的继承人。/r/n

word.name: thwart
word.mean:
a. 横～
v. 反对,阻碍
ad. 横过
word.lx: Our plan for a football match was thwarted by the heavy rain./r/n 我们的足球比赛计划因大雨而受阻。/r/n So as to thwart, obstruct, or oppose; perversely./r/n 以便对抗，阻碍，或反对地；任性地/r/n

word.name: thyroid
word.mean:
a. 盾状的
n. 甲状腺

word.name: thyself
word.mean:
你的；你们的。
(yourself的古体或诗体)

word.name: Tibet
word.lx: Before the democratic reform in Tibet, the people there were laid heavy burden on./r/n 在民主改革以前，西藏人民肩负着沉重的负担。/r/n A Buddhist monk of Tibet or Mongolia./r/n 喇嘛中国西藏或蒙古的喇嘛教僧侣/r/n

word.name: tick
word.mean:
n. 被套(赊欠,滴答声,片刻,无线电信号)
vt 赊销(滴答响,记以小点)
word.lx: There was a nice red tick in the margin./r/n 边上打了一个漂亮的红勾。/r/n The clock ticks very loudly./r/n 这只钟发出很响的滴答声。/r/n

word.name: ticking
word.lx: The clock ticks very loudly./r/n 这只钟发出很响的滴答声。/r/n There it was, ticking away, louder than ever./r/n 它就在那里，滴答地走着，比以前更大声。/r/n

word.name: tickle
word.mean:
n. 胳肢
v. 胳肢,发痒,使快乐
word.lx: The comedian tickled the crowd with his jokes./r/n 那个喜剧演员讲的笑话把人们都逗笑了。/r/n Babies like to be tickled and hugged./r/n 婴儿喜欢轻轻呵痒和紧紧拥抱。/r/n

word.name: tide
word.mean:
n. 潮,趋势,潮流
v. 渡过,随潮漂流,克服
word.lx: Time and tide wait for no man./r/n 岁月不等人。/r/n The tide is falling./r/n 海水在回落。/r/n

word.name: tidy
word.mean:
n. 椅子的背罩
a. 整齐的,精简的
v. 弄整齐,收拾
word.lx: He has a tidy mind./r/n 他的思维有条理。/r/n She keeps her house very tidy./r/n 她保持她的住所整整齐齐。/r/n

word.name: tie
word.mean:
n. 结,束缚,不分胜负,领带, 领结,鞋带
v. 系,打结,约束
word.lx: The girl tied the ends of the thread./r/n 这女孩把线的两端结起来。/r/n They want to loosen their ties with Britain./r/n 他们想要削弱同英国的关系。/r/n

word.name: tiger
word.lx: The number of tigers has reduced abruptly in the last fifty years./r/n 在过去的五十年里，老虎的数目锐减。/r/n We saw the tiger pouncing on the goat./r/n 我们看见老虎向那只山羊扑过去。/r/n

word.name: tight
word.mean:
a. 紧的
ad. 紧紧地
word.lx: She held her baby tight in her arms./r/n 她紧紧地搂着她的孩子。/r/n This drawer is too tight for me to open it./r/n 这抽屉太紧了，我打不开。/r/n

word.name: tighten
word.lx: This screw needs tightening./r/n 这螺丝钉需要再拧紧些。/r/n Controls in the city have gradually tightened./r/n 对这个城市的控制逐渐加强。/r/n

word.name: tile
word.mean:
n. 砖瓦
v. 铺以瓦,铺以瓷砖
word.lx: We have put tiles on the wall behind the bath./r/n 我们在浴缸后的墙上贴了瓷砖。/r/n Please place them in tile right order./r/n 请将它们按顺序排好。/r/n

word.name: till
word.mean:
conj. 直到(...为止)
n. (账台中)放钱的抽屉
prep. 直到
pron. 直到...为止,直到
vt. 耕种
word.lx: People do not know the value of health till they lose it./r/n 直到失去健康，人们才知道健康的可贵。/r/n We must stick to our task till it is finished./r/n 我们必须继续工作, 直至做好为止。/r/n

word.name: timber
word.lx: Timber" the man shouted as the tree was about to fall./r/n 树快要倒下时，那个人喊道“避开！”。/r/n

word.name: time
word.mean:
n. 时间,期限,次数,乘
v. 计时,定时,乘
n.[计算机] DOS命令 : 显示并允许改变系统时间
word.lx: Time and tide wait for no man./r/n 岁月不等人。/r/n Only time will tell if you are right./r/n 只有时间才能证明你是否正确。/r/n

word.name: timely
word.lx: Thanks to your timely intervention./r/n 多亏你及时调停。/r/n What we expected is nothing less than a timely payment./r/n 及时付款正是我们所盼望的。/r/n

word.name: timer
word.mean: n. 计时员(记时器,跑表,定时器,延时调节器)

word.name: times
word.lx: My friend Tom is a reporter for the New York Times./r/n 我朋友汤姆是《纽约时报》的记者。/r/n The microscope magnified the object 100 times./r/n 这台显微镜将物体放大了100倍。/r/n

word.name: timid
word.lx: I wanted to take him fishing but I was too timid to ask him./r/n 我曾想带他去钓鱼，但我不好意思对他开口。/r/n Full of apprehensiveness; timid./r/n 畏怯的充满恐惧的；胆怯的/r/n

word.name: timidity
word.lx: The quality or state of being diffident; timidity or shyness./r/n 缺乏自信；胆怯缺乏自信的性质或状态；胆小的或羞怯的/r/n

word.name: timing
word.mean: n. 时间的掌握(安排,配合)
word.lx: What beautiful timing!/r/n 时间正合适!/r/n I disagree with you view that the schedule it unimportant. I think that timing is very much to the point./r/n 我不同意你认为时间安排是不重要的观点，我认为时间安排很有关系。/r/n

word.name: tin
word.lx: Is that box made of tin or steel?/r/n 这个箱子是白铁皮做的还是钢做的？/r/n Food is tinned to preserve it./r/n 把食品装罐加以保存。/r/n

word.name: tinge
word.mean:
n.淡色, 些微气味（常与with连用）
vt.微染
word.lx: Her hair is tinged with Grey./r/n 她的头发有些花白。/r/n There was a tinge of sadness in her voice./r/n 她的声音中有几分伤感。/r/n

word.name: tip
word.mean:
n. 顶,尖端,小费
v. 装顶端,倾斜,给小费
word.lx: This manual is full of useful tips./r/n 这本小册子里有很多实用的小建议。/r/n The arrows had been tipped with poison./r/n 这些箭的箭头上都蘸上了毒药。/r/n

word.name: tiptoe
word.mean:
n. 脚尖,翘望
v. 用脚尖走
ad. 用脚尖
word.lx: He stood on tiptoe and tried to see over the wall./r/n 他踮起脚尖，试图看到墙那边。/r/n She tiptoed across to the bed where the child was lying asleep./r/n 孩子睡了，她掂着脚走到床前。/r/n

word.name: tire
word.mean:
n. 轮胎
v. 使疲倦,厌烦
word.lx: This work is tiring; it tires me out./r/n 这工作很累人，可把我累坏了。/r/n After working for fifteen hours I began to tire./r/n 工作了十五个小时之后，我开始感到累了。/r/n

word.name: tiresome
word.mean: a. 令人厌倦的,讨厌的
word.lx: His speech is really tiresome./r/n 他的演讲实在令人厌倦。/r/n Causing physical or mental fatigue; tedious or tiresome./r/n 乏味的使体力或智力疲倦的；乏味的或令人厌倦的/r/n

word.name: tissue
word.mean:
n. (动、植物的)组织,薄的纱织品
n. 餐巾纸,手巾纸
word.lx: The tissues have been destroyed and a scar has formed./r/n 那些组织受到破坏，形成一道疤痕。/r/n She gave us a box of tissues./r/n 她递给我们一盒纸巾。/r/n

word.name: to
word.mean:
prep. (表示方向)到,向
prep. (表示间接关系)给
word.lx: The town came to life after sunrise./r/n 日出之后，这个市镇变得充满生气。/r/n This road leads to London./r/n 这条路通向伦敦。/r/n

word.name: tobacco
word.lx: This is a mixture of the best tobacco./r/n 这是由最好的烟叶配制成的。/r/n Tobacco and alcoholic drinks are taxed heavily in their country./r/n 烟酒在他们的国家都被课以重税。/r/n

word.name: today
word.lx: English is spoken all over the world today./r/n 英语现在通用于全世界。/r/n Today is Thursday./r/n 今天是星期四。/r/n

word.name: toddle
word.mean:
v. 东倒西歪地走,溜哒,散步
n. 东倒西歪的走路,刚学走步的小孩
word.lx: Her two-year-old son toddled into the room./r/n 她的两岁的儿子摇摇摆摆地走进屋里./r/n

word.name: toddler
word.lx: The toddler tried to walk but kept falling down./r/n 那小孩学著走路但老是跌跤./r/n A toddler who was a menace in a shop full of crystal./r/n 对放满水晶制品的商店构成威胁的蹒跚学步的孩子/r/n

word.name: toe
word.mean:
n. 脚趾,足尖
vt. 趾触,趾踢
word.lx: Each foot has five toes./r/n 每只脚有五个脚趾头。/r/n He stepped on my toes./r/n 他踩着了我的脚趾头。/r/n

word.name: together
word.lx: They traveled together./r/n 他们一起旅游。/r/n All my troubles seem to come together./r/n 我的各种问题似乎同时出现了/r/n

word.name: toil
word.mean:
n.辛苦, 苦工, 网, 罗网, 圈套
v.苦干, 跋涉, 费力地做

word.name: token
word.lx: He gave me a necklace as a token of his affection../r/n 他给了我一根项链作为爱情的象征。/r/n We sent the poor girl a birthday present in token of friendship./r/n 我们送给那个可怜的小女孩一份生日礼物作为友谊的表示。/r/n

word.name: told
word.lx: A little old woman with a wrinkled face as brown as a berry told us fortunes for ten pence./r/n 一位身材矮小、满脸皱纹、皮肤黑黑的老妇人给我们算命，收了10便士。/r/n The ten-mile tike told on Bill./r/n 10英里路的远足使比尔疲惫不堪。/r/n

word.name: tolerable
word.lx: The heat was tolerable at night but suffocating during the day./r/n 这种炎热的天气在夜晚尚能忍受，但白天就令人感到呼吸困难。/r/n We had a very tolerable lunch./r/n 我们吃了顿很不错的午餐。/r/n

word.name: tolerance
word.mean:
n. 宽容,容忍
n.公差

word.name: tolerate
word.mean:
v. 忍受,容忍,容许,宽恕
vt. 容忍,忍受,容许
word.lx: The body cannot tolerate such large amounts of radiation./r/n 身体经不住那麽大剂量的放射线。/r/n She almost can tolerate any kind of torrid days./r/n 她几乎能忍受各种酷热的天气。/r/n

word.name: toll
word.mean:
n. 通行费,代价,钟声
v. 徵收通行税,呜钟
word.lx: The church bell tolled the hour./r/n 教堂的鸣钟报时。/r/n Years of hardship and neglect had taken their toll./r/n 多年的劳累和疏于保养损害了他们的健康。/r/n

word.name: tomato
word.lx: Most tomatoes are red when ripe, but some kinds are yellow./r/n 大多数西红柿成熟时是红色的，但有些品种是黄色的。/r/n Would you like some tomato paste?/r/n 你要西红柿酱吗？/r/n

word.name: tomb
word.lx: Those dead soldiers were buried in the tombs./r/n 那些死去的战士被埋葬在坟墓里。/r/n A tombstone stands in front of her tomb./r/n 她墓前立着一块墓碑。/r/n

word.name: tombstone
word.lx: A tombstone stands in front of her tomb./r/n 她墓前立着一块墓碑。/r/n He asked the mason to make him a tombstone./r/n 他要求这个石匠给他做一块墓碑。/r/n

word.name: tomorrow
word.lx: Never put off till tomorrow what you can do today./r/n 今日事今日毕。/r/n Tomorrow I will be very busy./r/n 明天我将很忙。/r/n

word.name: ton
word.lx: How many tons does this elephant weigh?/r/n 这头大象重多少吨？/r/n The maximum load for this lorry is one ton./r/n 这辆卡车最大载重量是一吨。/r/n

word.name: tone
word.mean:
n. 音调,语气,品质
v. 调和,以特殊腔调说,配合
word.lx: Her friendly opening speech set the tone for the whole conference./r/n 她友好的开幕词确定了整个会议的基调。/r/n That violin has a beautiful tone./r/n 那支小提琴的音色很美。/r/n

word.name: toneless
word.lx: I tried to be open--minded about the rock concert, but the music was at best loud and at worst toneless./r/n 对这场摇滚音乐会我要尽量思想开放些，但是其乐声充其量响度很高，更糟糕的是很不悦耳。/r/n

word.name: tongue
word.lx: English is her mother tongue./r/n 英语是她的母语。/r/n The doctor looked at her tongue./r/n 医生诊看了她的舌头。/r/n

word.name: tonic
word.mean:
n. 补药,(音乐)主调音或基音
a. 滋补的,使精神振作的
word.lx: Sea air has a tonic quality./r/n 海洋的空气有益于增进健康。/r/n Praise can be a fine tonic./r/n 赞美有时真让人感到振奋。/r/n

word.name: tonnage
word.mean: n. 吨位(登记吨位,军舰排水量,每吨货的运费)
word.lx: The tonnage of the ship is 25./r/n 这条船的登记吨位为25吨。/r/n

word.name: tool
word.lx: Words are the tools of his trade./r/n 言语是他那一行必不可少的工具。/r/n The artist tooled a pattern onto the cover of the book with a hot needle./r/n 那位艺术家用烧热的针在书的封面上烫出图案。/r/n

word.name: toolbox
word.lx: The hammer is missing from my toolbox./r/n 我的工具箱里少了一把锤子。/r/n

word.name: toothpaste
word.lx: She bought a tube of toothpaste./r/n 她买了一管牙膏。/r/n Which brand of toothpaste do you prefer?/r/n 你爱用什麽牌子的牙膏?/r/n

word.name: top
word.mean:
n. 顶端,极点,最高地位;陀螺
a. 最高的,顶上的
v. 高耸,加以顶端,超越
word.lx: The mountain tops are covered with snow./r/n 白雪覆盖着山顶。/r/n I live on the top floor./r/n 我住在顶层。/r/n

word.name: topology
word.lx: The topology of the network may be ring, star or bus./r/n 网络的拓扑结构可以是环形的、星形的或总线形的。/r/n

word.name: torment
word.mean:
n. 苦痛,拷问
v. 使苦恼,拷问
word.lx: That child is a torment to his parents./r/n 这孩子对他的父母是一种折磨。/r/n What a little torment that child is!/r/n 这孩子真烦人!/r/n

word.name: tornado
word.lx: The entire village was obliterated by the tornado./r/n 整个村庄被龙卷风摧毁了./r/n The tornado cut a swath through the town./r/n 龙卷风袭击该镇，留下破坏的痕迹。/r/n

word.name: torpedo
word.mean:
n. 水雷,地雷
v. 用鱼雷破坏
word.lx: We all accused the union of torpedoing the negotiation./r/n 我们都谴责工会破坏谈判。/r/n The ship was attacked by torpedo./r/n 那条船遭到鱼雷的攻击。/r/n

word.name: torrent
word.lx: She attacked him with a torrent of abuse./r/n 她用连珠炮似的谩骂来攻击他。/r/n A torrent of water poured down the mountain./r/n 洪水从山上奔流而下。/r/n

word.name: torture
word.mean:
n. 拷问,苦闷
v. 拷问,曲解
word.lx: She suffered the tortures of toothaches./r/n 她因牙痛而痛苦。/r/n He tortured his prisoners./r/n 他拷打犯人。/r/n

word.name: toss
word.mean:
n. 投掷,震荡
v. 投掷,摇荡,辗转
word.lx: Our team won the toss so we play first./r/n 我们的队扔硬币赢了， 因此由我们队先开球。/r/n The children tossed the ball to each other./r/n 孩子们互相把球扔来扔去。/r/n

word.name: total
word.mean:
a. 全体的,总的,全然的
v. 总计,共计
word.lx: Add this numbers together and give me the total./r/n 把这些数字加起来，告诉我总数是多少。/r/n We have debts totaling 5000 dollars./r/n 我们的债务总计为五千美元。/r/n

word.name: totally
word.lx: The children seem to be totally incapable of working quietly by themselves./r/n 这些孩子似乎完全不能安静地自己做功课。/r/n All this is totally unnecessary./r/n 所有这些完全都是多余的。/r/n

word.name: touching
word.mean:
n. 触摸
a. 动人的,悲惨的
vbl. 触摸,接触
word.lx: My fingers are beginning to prick after touching that paste./r/n 我的手指接触那软膏之後就疼起来了./r/n A lovely melody, tender and touching, floated down to us./r/n 一曲优美的亲切动人的乐曲传到了我们耳边。/r/n

word.name: touchy
word.mean: a. 易怒的,难以取悦的,过敏的

word.name: tough
word.mean: a. 强硬的,艰苦的,棘手的,严厉的
word.lx: We won the contract but only through a lot of tough negotiating./r/n 我们赢得了合同，但是却经过了多次不屈不挠的谈判才达到目的。/r/n The company faces tough competition./r/n 这家公司面临着艰难的竞争。/r/n

word.name: tour
word.mean:
n. 旅游,观光旅行,任期
v. 旅行,周游
word.lx: We went on a guided tour round the castle./r/n 我们随着导游参观了城堡。/r/n We are touring Italy for our holidays this year./r/n 今年我们假期要去意大利旅行。/r/n

word.name: tourist
word.mean:
a. 旅游的
n. 旅游者,观光者
word.lx: London is full of tourists in the summer./r/n 夏季伦敦有很多游客。/r/n We bought a tourist handbook before going travelling./r/n 出去旅游前，我们先买了一本旅游手册。/r/n

word.name: tournament
word.lx: He will take part in a chess tournament next week./r/n 下星期，他将要参加一场国际象棋比赛。/r/n I won the tennis tournament./r/n 我赢了那场网球比赛。/r/n

word.name: tout
word.mean: v. 招来顾客,死乞白赖地劝诱,刺探...情报
word.lx: I told him tout court that his services were not required./r/n 我简单地告诉他不需要他的帮助。/r/n A ticket tout offered me a two pound ticket for ten pounds./r/n 票贩子索价十镑向我兜售原价两镑的票子。/r/n

word.name: toward
word.mean: prep. 对于,关于,接近,将近,向,朝

word.name: towards
word.mean:
ad. 向,朝
prep. 朝,向
word.lx: He was walking towards town when I met him./r/n 我遇到他时，他正往镇上走去。/r/n He felt very friendly towards them./r/n 他对他们非常友好。/r/n

word.name: towel
word.mean:
n. 毛巾
v. 用毛巾擦
vt. 用毛巾擦或擦干
word.lx: After her swim she dried herself with a towel./r/n 游泳后，她用毛巾擦干身子。/r/n We installed a stainless steel towel rail on the wall./r/n 我们在墙上装了一个不锈钢的挂毛巾的横杆。/r/n

word.name: tower
word.mean:
n. 塔,高楼,堡垒
v. 高耸,超越
word.lx: The bell tower is the emblem of this city./r/n 这座钟楼是这个城市的象征。/r/n Shakespeare towers above all other Elizabethan dramatists./r/n 莎士比亚远超过伊丽莎白时代所有的剧作家。/r/n

word.name: toxic
word.lx: The factory had been sending out toxic fumes./r/n 这家工厂一直在排放有毒的废气。/r/n The quality or condition of being toxic or destructive to the liver./r/n 肝中毒对肝有毒的或毁灭性的性质或状况/r/n

word.name: toy
word.mean:
n. 玩具,小玩意儿
a. 供玩耍的
v. 玩弄,戏弄,以...自娱
word.lx: My daughter has many toys./r/n 我女儿有很多玩具。/r/n While she was talking to me, she toyed with a pencil./r/n 她一边和我说话，一边摆弄着一支铅笔。/r/n

word.name: tracking
word.lx: Tracking wild animals requires great stealth./r/n 跟踪野生动物必须悄然无声。/r/n Another aspect of our work is tracking down wild and native potato./r/n 我们工作的另一方面是追寻野生长土生的土豆。/r/n

word.name: tract
word.mean: n. 广阔的地面,土地,地方
word.lx: He took many photos of the wide tracts of desert in North Africa./r/n 他拍了许多关于北非的广大沙漠的照片。/r/n A line established by sighting in surveying a tract of land./r/n 横断线在测量一块土地时通过目视确定的线/r/n

word.name: traction
word.lx: Serving to pull or draw; exerting traction./r/n 牵引的用来拉或拽的；产生牵引力的/r/n The act of pulling loads; traction./r/n 拖拽拖动装载物的行为；牵引/r/n

word.name: tractor
word.lx: He drove the tractor to his farm./r/n 他开拖拉机去农场了。/r/n There is a tractor in this farmyard./r/n 在这个农家庭院里停着一台拖拉机。/r/n

word.name: trade
word.mean:
n. 贸易,商业,交易
v. 贸易,交易,交换
word.lx: China does a lot of trade with many countries./r/n 中国和许多国家进行多方面贸易。/r/n He usually trades at the nearby supermarket./r/n 他通常在附近的超市购物。/r/n

word.name: trademark
word.lx: Have you noticed the trademark on the bottle?/r/n 你注意到瓶子上的商标了吗？/r/n Appearing briefly in his own films was a trademark of Alfred Hitchcock./r/n 在自己的影片里短暂露面是阿尔弗雷德·希区柯克的特点。/r/n

word.name: trader
word.lx: This trader persuaded me into buying his goods./r/n 这个商人说服我买了他的货物。/r/n The trader is always showing dishonesty./r/n 这个商人经常表现得不诚实。/r/n

word.name: traffic
word.mean:
a. 交通的
n. 交通
vi. 交易,买卖
word.lx: There was a lot of traffic on the roads./r/n 这些道路上车辆行人很多。/r/n Traffic reaches a peak between 8 and 9 in the morning./r/n 早晨八九点钟是交通的高峰时刻./r/n

word.name: tragedy
word.lx: It was a tragedy that she died so young./r/n 她这么年轻就去世，真是太不幸了。/r/n Tragedy is in store for that poor girl from the beginning./r/n 从一开始, 那个女孩的悲剧就是不可避免的。/r/n

word.name: tragic
word.lx: The famous politician died in a tragic accident./r/n 那位著名的政治家死于一场悲惨的意外事故。/r/n He went to pieces when they told him the tragic news./r/n 人们告诉他那悲惨的消息後，他已六神无主了。/r/n

word.name: trainee
word.mean: n. 练习生,新兵,训练中的动物

word.name: trait
word.mean: n. 特征,特点,特性,品质

word.name: traitor
word.lx: He was surprised to discover that his best friend had turned traitor./r/n 他惊讶地发现他最好的朋友竟成了叛徒。/r/n The angry crowd shouted,Knock the traitor on the head. He is not fit to live."/r/n 愤怒的群众嚷道，“杀掉这个卖国贼，他该死。/r/n"

word.name: tram
word.lx: The device is in tram./r/n 这一装置调准了/r/n

word.name: tramp
word.mean:
n. 重步声,流浪者
v. 践踏,重步行走
word.lx: We went for a tramp over the hill./r/n 我们徒步翻过了山头/r/n We missed the bus and met some tramps./r/n 我们错过了公共汽车，因此不得不步行。/r/n

word.name: tranquil
word.lx: Both my husband and I love the tranquil life in the country./r/n 我丈夫和我都喜欢乡村的宁静生活。/r/n A calm or tranquil state of mind; self-possession./r/n 冷静，沉着头脑镇定或沉着的状态；自我克制/r/n

word.name: tranquility
word.lx: We all like the tranquility of the country life./r/n 我们都喜欢乡村生活的宁静。/r/n

word.name: transact
word.lx: This sort of business can only be transacted in private./r/n 这种事情只能私下处理。/r/n My passport has been transacted./r/n 我的护照已经办完了。/r/n

word.name: transaction
word.lx: The transaction between them was dismissed./r/n 他们之间的交易告吹了。/r/n What do you want to do after you have concluded this transaction?/r/n 这笔生意成交之后你想做什么？/r/n

word.name: transcend
word.lx: She far transcends the others in beauty and intelligence./r/n 她才貌出众./r/n

word.name: transcribe
word.lx: She jotted down a few notes, and later transcribed them into an exercise book./r/n 她草草做了些笔记, 然後誊写在练习本上./r/n She jot down a few note, and later transcribe them into an exercise book./r/n 她草草做了些笔记，然后誊写在练习本上。/r/n

word.name: transfer
word.mean:
n. 迁移,移动,换车
v. 转移,调转,调任
word.lx: He was soon transferred to another post./r/n 他很快被调职。/r/n He intends to transfer the property to his son./r/n 他打算把财产转让给儿子。/r/n

word.name: transform
word.lx: Success and wealth transformed his character./r/n 成功和财富改变了他的性格。/r/n The magician transformed the frog into a princess./r/n 魔术师把青蛙变成了公主。/r/n

word.name: transformation
word.lx: The transformation of that project has been finished./r/n 那个项目的改造已经完成。/r/n His character seems to have undergone a complete transformation since his marriage./r/n 他结婚之后性格判若两人。/r/n

word.name: transfusion
word.mean: n. 倾注(灌输,渗透,转移,输)
word.lx: One who draws blood for analysis or transfusion./r/n 放血医师为化验或输血而抽血的人/r/n The injured man has lost a lot of blood and has to be given a transfusion./r/n 那个受伤的男子失血过多，必须进行输血。/r/n

word.name: transgress
word.mean: vt. 越过(违反,越界,违法)
word.lx: His behavior transgressed the moral rules of the social conduct./r/n 他的行为违背了社会行为的道德准则。/r/n

word.name: transient
word.lx: Life is transient./r/n 人生如朝露。/r/n Her feeling of depression was transient./r/n 她那抑郁的心情一会儿就过去了。/r/n

word.name: transistor
word.lx: The old man took her transistor everywhere with him./r/n 这个老人随时都带着他的半导体收音机。/r/n A transistor radio./r/n 晶体管收音机/r/n

word.name: transit
word.mean:
n. 经过,运输
v. 横越
word.lx: The goods were lost in transit./r/n 这些货物在运输中丢失了。/r/n You must allow for five per cent wastage in transit./r/n 在运输中要允许有百分之五的损耗量./r/n

word.name: transition
word.lx: We hope there will be a peaceful transition to the new system./r/n 我们希望能够和平过渡到新的制度。/r/n A transition or change, as to a spiritual existence at death./r/n 过渡过渡或变化，如人死后向精神存在的过渡/r/n

word.name: transitional
word.lx: A transitional point or time, as between two astrological signs./r/n 过渡过渡点或过渡时间，尤指占星术的两个天宫之间的/r/n

word.name: translate
word.mean:
翻译，解释
（尤指人，地点，条件）改变， 转移，调动
word.lx: The meaning of your visit was translated to me as a sign of your affection./r/n 你的拜访对我来说是一种光荣。/r/n Can you translate the sentence into English?/r/n 你能把这句话翻译成英语吗？/r/n

word.name: translation
word.lx: It is the translation of theories into practice./r/n 这是理论到实践的转变。/r/n I think her translation of the article is much better than his./r/n 我认为她对这篇文章的翻译要比他强的多。/r/n

word.name: translucent
word.lx: She wears a translucent silk gown./r/n 她穿着半透明丝质长袍。/r/n The lavatory windows are made of translucent glass./r/n 厕所窗户是用半透明玻璃做的。/r/n

word.name: transmission
word.lx: We now interrupt our normal transmissions to bring you a special news flash./r/n 我们现中断正常节目，播送一条特别新闻。/r/n A means of one-way transmission./r/n 单向传输的一种手段。/r/n

word.name: transmit
word.lx: This infection is transmitted by mosquitoes./r/n 这种传染病是由蚊子传染的。/r/n The tension soon transmitted itself to all the members of the crowd./r/n 这种紧张情绪很快感染了人群中所有的人。/r/n

word.name: transmitter
word.mean: n. 转送的,传达人,让渡者
word.lx: A transmitter of disease; a transmitter of tall tales./r/n 疾病传播者；一个散布无稽之谈的人/r/n The sending of a signal, picture, or other information from a transmitter./r/n 播送从一发射机发送信号、图像或其它信息/r/n

word.name: transparency
word.lx: The transparency and luster of a gem./r/n 水色宝石的透明度及光洁度/r/n A machine for projecting the images of opaque objects or transparencies on a screen./r/n 透反射两用幻灯机用于将不透明或透明物体的影象投影到屏幕上的机器/r/n

word.name: transparent
word.lx: Plain glass is transparent./r/n 普通的白玻璃是透明的。/r/n The meaning of this passage seems quite transparent./r/n 这一段的意思看来是相当清楚的。/r/n

word.name: transplant
word.lx: He transplanted the seedlings into peaty soil./r/n 他把幼苗移栽到含泥炭的土壤里。/r/n She had a bone-marrow transplant./r/n 她接受了骨髓移植手术。/r/n

word.name: transport
word.mean:
n.运输、运输工具；(常用复数）强烈的情绪、狂喜或狂怒
v.运输；流放；为强烈的情绪所激动
word.lx: The transport of goods by air is very expensive./r/n 空运货物费用十分昂贵。/r/n Wheat is transported from the farms to the mills./r/n 把小麦从农场运到面粉厂。/r/n

word.name: transportation
word.mean: n. 运输,运输系统,运输工具
word.lx: The railroad gives free transportation for a certain amount of baggage./r/n 铁路对一定数量行李免费运送。/r/n The Panama Canal has played a very important role in transportation./r/n 巴拿马运河在运输上起到了非常重要的作用。/r/n

word.name: transpose
word.mean: v. 调换,颠倒顺序,移项

word.name: transverse
word.mean:
n. 横断物
a. 横的

word.name: trap
word.mean:
n. 圈套,陷阱
v. 设圈套,设陷阱
word.lx: The police set a trap to catch the thief./r/n 警察设下了捉拿窃贼的圈套。/r/n By clever questioning they trapped him into making a confession./r/n 他们用巧妙的提问诱使他招认了。/r/n

word.name: trash
word.mean:
n. 废物,垃圾
vt. 捣毁
word.lx: Sue was troubled to see trash everywhere./r/n 苏看到到处是垃圾很苦恼。/r/n Many things pollute water, such as tires, trash, and plastic bags./r/n 很多东西使水污染，例如轮胎、垃圾和塑胶袋。/r/n

word.name: trauma
word.lx: A trauma center; a trauma team./r/n 外伤治疗中心；外伤治疗小组/r/n A bodily injury, irritation, or trauma./r/n 身体的损伤，发炎或损伤/r/n

word.name: travel
word.lx: Nothing can travel faster than light./r/n 光比任何东西都传播得快。/r/n He has traveled widely./r/n 他到过很多地方。/r/n

word.name: traveler
word.mean: n. 旅行者(移式起重机,导丝钩,临时记帐单)
word.lx: She was too timid to talk with other travelers./r/n 她很害羞，不敢和其他旅行者交谈。/r/n The traveler wrapped himself with a blanket./r/n 旅行者用毯子把自己裹上。/r/n

word.name: traveller
word.lx: The traveller carries about a camera./r/n 旅行者随身带着一只照相机。/r/n The traveller had to fight his way out through the tropical forest with an axe./r/n 旅行者不得不用斧头在热带森林里砍出一条路来。/r/n

word.name: traverse
word.mean:
n. 横贯,横木
v. 横过,铭刻
word.lx: They traversed the valley on foot./r/n 他们徒步走过这座山谷。/r/n Searching lights traversed the sky./r/n 探照灯扫过天空。/r/n

word.name: tray
word.lx: He put the toast on the breakfast tray./r/n 他把烤面包片放到早餐托盘里。/r/n She set a tray down on the table./r/n 她把托盘放在桌子上了./r/n

word.name: tread
word.mean:
n. 踏,梯级
v. 踏,行走
word.lx: Every day the children tread the same path through the woods./r/n 每天孩子们走林中的同一条路。/r/n We heard his heavy tread on the staircase./r/n 我们听到了他走在楼梯上沉重的脚步声。/r/n

word.name: treasure
word.mean:
n. 宝物,财富
v. 珍爱,重视,储藏
word.lx: This museum has many art treasures./r/n 这家博物馆收藏了许多艺术珍品。/r/n Such a lesson should be treasured in our memories./r/n 这样的宝贵教训应该铭记在心。/r/n

word.name: treasurer
word.lx: The company decided to appoint a new treasurer./r/n 公司决定任命一位新司库。/r/n We want to put you up for club treasurer./r/n 我们想请你担任俱乐部的司库./r/n

word.name: treat
word.mean:
n. 宴飨,款待
v. 视为,对待,处理,治疗
word.lx: This meal is my treat, so put your money away./r/n 这顿饭我请客，你把钱收起来吧。/r/n This boy is being treated for a heart condition./r/n 这个男孩正在接受心脏病治疗。/r/n

word.name: treatise
word.lx: The treatise he wrote is excellent./r/n 他写的论文很优秀。/r/n Our professor asked him to write a treatise on the subject./r/n 我们的教授要求他就这个课题写篇论文。/r/n

word.name: treatment
word.lx: I tried every treatment the doctor suggested./r/n 我试遍了医生建议的每一种疗法。/r/n You should follow your treatment with plenty of rest in bed./r/n 你应该在治疗之後好好卧床休息./r/n

word.name: treaty
word.lx: The Government has signed a treaty with Moscow./r/n 政府已与莫斯科签了一项条约。/r/n The house was sold by private treaty./r/n 这所房子以私人协议的方式售出。/r/n

word.name: treble
word.mean:
n. 最高音部
a. 三倍的,最高部的
v. 使...增为三倍
word.lx: Profits in our company have trebled in the last two years./r/n 我们公司的利润在这两年中增加了三倍。/r/n He sings treble./r/n 他唱最高音部。/r/n

word.name: tree
word.lx: We plant trees and flowers in spring./r/n 我们在春天种花种树。/r/n In the storm I took shelter under the tree./r/n 暴风雨时，我正在树下躲避。/r/n

word.name: trek
word.mean:
vt. 艰苦跋涉(行军)
n. 艰苦跋涉

word.name: trench
word.mean:
n. 沟,沟渠
v. (挖)沟,(挖)战壕
word.lx: Grandfather was in the trenches during the First War./r/n 在第一次世界大战中，我祖父驻守在法国北部前线。/r/n I forgot to dig a trench around the tent./r/n 我忘了在帐篷四周挖一条沟。/r/n

word.name: trend
word.mean:
n. 趋势,倾向,方位
v. 倾向
word.lx: The prices of houses are trending upwards./r/n 房价趋于上涨。/r/n The youth like to follow the latest trends in fashion./r/n 年轻人喜好追求最新的流行款式。/r/n

word.name: trespass
word.mean:
n. 罪过,侵入,侵害
v. 侵夺,犯罪,侵入
word.lx: Are you familiar with the laws relating to trespass?/r/n 你熟悉关于侵入私人领地的法律吗？/r/n One who is guilty of a trespass or sin; a sinner./r/n 罪人犯有过失和罪过的人；罪人/r/n

word.name: triad
word.lx: A group or set of three; a triad./r/n 三个一组三个人或物组成的小组，三个一套/r/n

word.name: trial
word.mean:
a. 尝试性的
n. 尝试,努力,试验,试用,讯问,审讯
n.讨厌的事，人
word.lx: That child is a trial to his parents./r/n 那个孩子是他的父母的一块心病。/r/n The murder trial lasted six weeks./r/n 法庭对这一谋杀案的审理为时六周。/r/n

word.name: triangle
word.lx: The angles of a triangle total 180./r/n 三角形的三角之和等于180°。/r/n He outlined the triangle in red./r/n 他用红笔画出三角形./r/n

word.name: tribal
word.lx: Tribal lore and custom have been passed down orally./r/n 部落的知识和风俗口耳相传保存下来./r/n Tribal dancers were wearing grotesque masks./r/n 部落中跳舞的人戴着古怪的面具。/r/n

word.name: tribe
word.lx: That Indian man is a member of the neighbouring tribe./r/n 那个印第安人是临近部落的成员。/r/n I have heard the cannibal tribe in stories./r/n 我在故事里听说过食人部落。/r/n

word.name: tribunal
word.lx: The tribunal has authority to settle certain types of dispute./r/n 裁判所有权解决某些纠纷。/r/n The tribunal will convene tomorrow./r/n 法庭将于明日开庭。/r/n

word.name: tributary
word.mean:
a. 纳贡的,从属的,补助的
n. 纳贡者,属国,支流
word.lx: There was one street apart from a tributary road near the end of the village./r/n 除了村子尽头的岔道外，还有一条大路。/r/n A tributary colony./r/n 进贡的殖民地/r/n

word.name: tribute
word.mean: n. 贡品,颂词,称赞,(表示敬意的)礼物
word.lx: Many Greek cities had to send yearly tribute to Athens./r/n 许多希腊城市不得不每年向雅典进贡。/r/n The musician gave full tribute to his former teacher./r/n 这位音乐家盛赞了他过去的老师。/r/n

word.name: trick
word.mean:
n. 诡计,欺诈
v. 戏弄,欺骗
n. 恶作剧
word.lx: These children loved playing tricks on their teacher./r/n 孩子们喜欢捉弄老师。/r/n He played some clever magic tricks./r/n 他表演了一些巧妙的魔术。/r/n

word.name: trickle
word.mean:
n. 滴,细流
v. 滴流,细细地流
word.lx: The stream is reduced to a mere trickle in summer./r/n 夏天那条小河的水量减少，成了涓涓溪流。/r/n She trickles oil into the mixture./r/n 她把油一点点地注入混合物中。/r/n

word.name: tricky
word.lx: The interviewer cornered the politician with a particularly tricky question./r/n 采访者用一个极其巧妙的问题难住了那个政客./r/n She showed great tact in dealing with a tricky situation./r/n 她处理棘手的局面表现得十分老练./r/n

word.name: trifle
word.mean:
n. 琐事,少量
v. 浪费,闲聊
word.lx: He told her not to pester him with trifles./r/n 他告诉她别拿些琐事来烦他。/r/n We trifled too long at the fair./r/n 我们在集市上逛得太久了。/r/n

word.name: trigger
word.mean:
n. 触发器,板机,制滑机
v. 触发(事件)
word.lx: A pulse to gate the output of a core memory sense amplifier into a trigger in a register./r/n 将磁心存储器读出放大器的输出选通到寄存器的触发器中的一种脉冲。/r/n I pulled the trigger and the gun went off./r/n 我一扣扳机, 枪就响了./r/n

word.name: trim
word.mean:
n. 整齐,装饰,修剪
a. 整齐的
v. 整理,修剪
word.lx: My daughter has a trim figure./r/n 我女儿身材匀称。/r/n We have to trim our cost if we want to increase our profit./r/n 我们如果想增加利润，就必须削减开支。/r/n

word.name: trip
word.mean:
n. 旅行,摔倒,差错
v. 跌倒,使...犯错,倾斜
word.lx: He tripped on a tree root./r/n 他被一株树根绊倒了。/r/n They planned to make a wedding trip to Paris./r/n 他们计划到巴黎旅行度蜜月。/r/n

word.name: triple
word.mean:
n. 三倍之数,三个一组
a. 三倍的
word.lx: He is a triple murderer./r/n 他谋杀了三个人。/r/n The plan has a triple purpose./r/n 该计划有三个目的。/r/n

word.name: triplet
word.mean:
三元组中的一个
(pl)三元组
word.lx: His wife gave birth to triplets./r/n 他妻子生了三胞胎./r/n

word.name: triumph
word.mean:
n. 凯旋,欢欣
v. 得胜,成功
word.lx: Justice triumphs in the end./r/n 正义终将得胜。/r/n He gave a cry of triumph./r/n 他得意地叫了起来。/r/n

word.name: triumphant
word.mean: a. 得胜的,得意扬扬的
word.lx: The victorious general made a triumphant return./r/n 这位打了胜仗的将军凯旋而归。/r/n Marked by great joy or jubilation; triumphant./r/n 狂喜的以极度高兴或欢呼为特征的；得意洋洋的的/r/n

word.name: trolley
word.lx: Cars and trolleys filled the streets./r/n 汽车和电车塞满了整条街。/r/n These suitcases are too heavy to carry; we need a trolley./r/n 这些衣箱太沉了，我们需要一辆小手推车。/r/n

word.name: troop
word.mean:
n. 群,组,多数
v. 群集,结队,成群而行
word.lx: We trooped into the meeting./r/n 我们一起走进会场。/r/n There is a troop of monkeys in the woods./r/n 林子中有一群猴子。/r/n

word.name: tropic
word.mean:
n. 回归线,热带
a. 热带的,向性的
word.lx: His hometown is located in the north to the tropic of cancer./r/n 他的家乡在北回归线的北面。/r/n Does cowslip grow in tropic countries?/r/n 西洋樱草生长于热带国家吗？/r/n

word.name: tropical
word.lx: These tropical flowers have bright colors./r/n 这些热带花卉颜色很艳丽。/r/n Is Singapore a tropical country?/r/n 新加坡是热带国家吗？/r/n

word.name: trot
word.mean:
n. 快步
v. 快步走,小跑步走
word.lx: The old man set off at a quick trot./r/n 老人快步走开了。/r/n The horse trotted down the road./r/n 马在路上小跑着。/r/n

word.name: troublesome
word.mean: a. 令人烦恼的,讨厌的
word.lx: This naughty boy is really troublesome./r/n 这个淘气的男孩子真是惹人烦。/r/n My cough is rather troublesome today./r/n 我今天咳嗽得很难受。/r/n

word.name: troupe
word.mean:
n. 一团,一班
v. 巡回演出
word.lx: The troupe is now on the road./r/n 剧团正在巡回演出。/r/n Charlie Chaplin went to the United States for the just time in1910 as a part of a troupe./r/n 查尔斯·卓别麟1910年作为一个演员随一个戏班第一次到了美国。/r/n

word.name: trousers
word.lx: He was dressed in a pair of black trousers./r/n 他穿着一条黑色裤子。/r/n Their dog bit a hole in my trousers./r/n 他们的狗把我的裤子咬了个窟窿。/r/n

word.name: trout
word.lx: I caught six trout in fifteen minutes./r/n 我在十五分钟内钓到了六条鳟鱼。/r/n The fishermen knew that trout were out of season at that time./r/n 渔民们知道，那时不是捕鳟鱼的季节。/r/n

word.name: truant
word.mean:
n. 懒惰鬼,旷课者
a. 偷懒的,旷课的,游荡的
v. 偷懒,旷课
word.lx: These three students played truant again./r/n 这三个学生又逃学了。/r/n The boy was enticed into playing truant./r/n 这个男孩被引诱逃学。/r/n

word.name: truce
word.lx: The two sides called a truce to avoid further bloodshed./r/n 双方宣布停战以避免再有伤亡。/r/n He was in favour of the declaration of a truce./r/n 他赞成宣布停战./r/n

word.name: truck
word.lx: They trucked the goods over immediately./r/n 他们用卡车立刻把这批货物运送过去。/r/n They transported the goods by truck./r/n 他们用卡车运货。/r/n

word.name: true
word.mean: a. 真的,真实的,正确的
word.lx: She was always true to her word./r/n 她总是信守诺言的。/r/n She gave the true account of what had happened./r/n 她如实地讲述了发生的事情。/r/n

word.name: truncate
word.mean:
v. 切去头端,缩短,截棱成平面
a. 切去了头,缩短了的,截形的

word.name: trunk
word.mean: n. 树干,躯干,(汽车后部)行李箱,象鼻
word.lx: He cut off the branches from the trunk./r/n 他把树干上的小分枝都剪掉。/r/n The morning glory climbs the trunk with its tendril./r/n 牵牛花用卷须攀着树干。/r/n

word.name: truth
word.lx: There is no truth in what he says./r/n 他说的没有一句实话。/r/n We shall find out the truth early or late./r/n 我们迟早会查明事实真相。/r/n

word.name: truthful
word.mean: a. 符合实际的(真的,诚实的)
word.lx: The news he told me is truthful./r/n 他告诉我的消息是真实的。/r/n He is a truthful child./r/n 他是个从不说谎的孩子。/r/n

word.name: try
word.mean:
n. 尝试,试验
v. 试,尝试
word.lx: Would you like to try this jacket on for size, sir?/r/n 先生，你要不要试穿一下这件夹克衫，看看尺寸是否合适？/r/n After a few tries they decided to give up./r/n 试了几次后，他们决定放弃。/r/n

word.name: trying
word.mean:
vbl. 试验,尝试
adj. 难受的, 费劲的, 令人厌烦的
word.lx: Though things went against Mary, she went on trying./r/n 虽然事情进行得不如意, 玛丽还是继续尝试。/r/n We are trying to make a few economies./r/n 我们正想办法节省一些。/r/n

word.name: tube
word.mean: n. 地铁,电子管,显像管,管,软管;电视
word.lx: Our television tube has broken./r/n 我们的电视机显像管坏了。/r/n I go to work on the tube./r/n 我经常乘地铁去上班。/r/n

word.name: Tuesday
word.lx: Next Tuesday is his birthday./r/n 下周二是他的生日。/r/n Would next Tuesday be too late?/r/n 下星期二会不会太迟了?/r/n

word.name: tug
word.mean:
n. 用力拉,拖船
v. 用力拉
word.lx: Tom felt a tug at his sleeve./r/n 汤姆觉得有人拉了拉他的衣袖。/r/n She tried to tug my hand away./r/n 她试图把我的手拉开。/r/n

word.name: tulip
word.lx: Tulip grows large brightly-colored cup-shaped flower in spring./r/n 郁金香在春天开出颜色鲜亮的杯状的花朵。/r/n An onion bulb; a tulip bulb./r/n 洋葱球；郁金香球根/r/n

word.name: tumble
word.mean:
n. 跌倒,翻斤斗
v. 翻倒,滚动
word.lx: The little girl stared at the little cats tumbling over each other in their basket./r/n 小女孩凝视着在篮子里互相翻来滚去的小猫。/r/n She tumbled down the stairs./r/n 她滚下了楼梯。/r/n

word.name: tumult
word.lx: He could hear a great tumult in the street./r/n 他听到街上很响的嘈杂声。/r/n Presently the tumult died down./r/n 一会儿工夫骚动平息了下来。/r/n

word.name: tuna
word.lx: I like to eat tinned tuna fish./r/n 我喜欢吃金枪鱼罐头。/r/n

word.name: tune
word.mean:
n. 歌曲,旋律,心情
v. 调节,和谐
word.lx: He played a tune on the violin./r/n 他用小提琴演奏了一首曲子。/r/n She calls the tune in their house./r/n 他们家中她说了算。/r/n

word.name: tuning
word.lx: The orchestra were tuning up as we entered the hall./r/n 我们进入大厅时, 管弦乐队正在调音./r/n Miss Ida took her car to the garage to have the engine tuned up./r/n 艾达小姐把车子开到修车厂去调整发动机。/r/n

word.name: tunnel
word.mean:
n. 隧道,地下道
v. 挖隧道
word.lx: Moles make underground tunnels./r/n 鼹鼠常打地洞。/r/n Suddenly the train roared into a tunnel and everything was black./r/n 突然火车轰隆隆地驶入一个隧道，四周的一切都漆黑一团。/r/n

word.name: turbine
word.lx: A disadvantage of the turbine is that it is not reversible./r/n 涡轮机的一个缺点就是它不可以反转。/r/n The gas turbine feeds on the fuel it pumps./r/n 燃气轮机以它所抽入的燃料为能源。/r/n

word.name: turbulent
word.lx: She tried to calm her turbulent thoughts./r/n 她试图平息一下紊乱的思绪。/r/n The sea is too turbulent for sailing./r/n 海浪太大，不宜航行。/r/n

word.name: turf
word.mean:
n. 草地,跑马场
v. 覆草皮
word.lx: He was busy leveling the ground and laying turves./r/n 他正忙于平整土地铺草皮。/r/n She laid the bouquet on the newly turfed grave./r/n 她把这束花放置在新铺上草皮的坟墓上。/r/n

word.name: turkey
word.lx: People often drink white wine with turkey./r/n 人们经常边吃火鸡肉边喝白葡萄酒。/r/n A native or inhabitant of Turkey./r/n 土耳其人土耳其的原住民或居民/r/n

word.name: Turkish
word.mean:
n. 土耳其语
a. 土耳其的,土耳其人的,土耳其语的
word.lx: A Turkish tobacco pipe with a long stem and a red clay bowl./r/n 土耳其长烟管一种有长杆和红色的黏土做的烟斗的土耳其的烟管/r/n A medieval ruler of a Mongol, Tartar, or Turkish tribe./r/n 可汗蒙古族、鞑靼人或土耳其人在中世纪时的统治者/r/n

word.name: turn
word.mean:
n. 转弯
v. 旋转
n. 行为,举止,（依次轮流的）顺序
word.lx: The earth turns round the sun./r/n 地球绕日运行。/r/n Caterpillars turned into butterflies./r/n 毛虫会变成蝴蝶。/r/n

word.name: turner
word.lx: He seems a lathe turner./r/n 他似乎是个旋工。/r/n

word.name: turning
word.lx: You take the wrong turning./r/n 你拐错弯了。/r/n Take the second turning on the left./r/n 在第二个转弯处向左转。/r/n

word.name: turnip
word.lx: Would you like some turnip?/r/n 吃点芜菁吗？/r/n Human life and turnip remain cheap and plentiful./r/n 人命与萝卜依然是多而且便宜。/r/n

word.name: turnkey
word.lx: A turnkey computer system; a turnkey housing project; a turnkey factory./r/n 一切齐全即可使用的计算机系统；一切齐全即可投入使用的房屋；一切齐全即可投产的工厂/r/n

word.name: turnover
word.mean:
n. 翻覆,翻折,半圆卷饼,营业额,成交量
a. 翻折的领子
word.lx: Why does your company have such a rapid turnover of staff?/r/n 贵公司人员变动为什麽这麽快?/r/n The firm has an annual turnover of 75 million./r/n 这家公司的年营业额为7500万英镑./r/n

word.name: turns
word.lx: The factory turns out 900 cars a week./r/n 该厂每周生产900辆汽车./r/n The factory turns out more than a hundred cars a week./r/n 这家工厂每周生产品100多辆汽车。/r/n

word.name: turquoise
word.lx: Corduroy dresses sizes8-16 in white, yellow, red, turquoise, black per100$1,845./r/n 条绒上衣尺码8至16号为白，黄，红，青绿及黑色，每100件价格为1，845美元。/r/n

word.name: turtle
word.lx: They caught a large turtle on the shore./r/n 他们在海滩上捉到一只大海龟。/r/n An old shellfish or turtle with a growth of algae on its back./r/n 绿毛龟一种背上有绿色水藻的老的水生贝壳类动物或海龟/r/n

word.name: tutor
word.lx: He tutored the child in physics./r/n 他给这小孩辅导物理。/r/n For extra money, she tutors on weekends./r/n 为了多挣些钱，她在周末当家庭教师。/r/n

word.name: twelfth
word.mean:
a. 第十二的,十二分之一的
n. 第十二,十二日,第十二音
word.lx: He received a twelfth of the money./r/n 他得到了这笔钱中的十二分之一。/r/n The former champion went down to a hammer-blow in the twelfth round./r/n 这位前冠军在第十二回合中受到一拳重击而败北了。/r/n

word.name: twelve
word.lx: Twelve months constitute one year./r/n 十二个月构成一年。/r/n I go out for lunch at twelve./r/n 我十二点出去吃午饭。/r/n

word.name: twenty
word.lx: He was a famous artist in the twenties./r/n 他在二十年代是一个著名的艺术家。/r/n Twenty shillings were equal to one pound before 1971./r/n 1971年前，二十先令等于一英镑。/r/n

word.name: twilight
word.mean:
n. 黄昏,微光,略知
v. 使微明
word.lx: She often sits in the garden at twilight./r/n 黄昏时分她常常坐在花园里。/r/n Twilight merged into total darkness./r/n 暮色四合, 渐而一片漆黑./r/n

word.name: twin
word.mean:
a. 孪生的
n. 双胞胎之一
word.lx: She gave birth to twins./r/n 她生了一对双胞胎。/r/n They have twin daughters./r/n 他们有一双孪生女儿。/r/n

word.name: twinkle
word.mean:
n. 闪烁,闪耀,瞬息
v. 闪烁,使...闪耀
word.lx: He stared up at the stars twinkling in the sky above him./r/n 他抬眼凝视着头顶上方星光闪烁的天空。/r/n He disappeared in a twinkling of an eye./r/n 转眼间他就无影无踪了。/r/n

word.name: twirl
word.mean:
vt. 快速转动(扭转)
n. 扭转(复制的钥匙,旋转的东西)
word.lx: I watched the dancers twirling (across the floor)./r/n 我注视著跳舞的人（在舞池中）旋转./r/n She did a twirl in front of the mirror./r/n 她对著镜子转了一圈./r/n

word.name: twist
word.mean:
n. 一扭,扭曲
v. 拧,扭曲
word.lx: The accident happened at the twist in the road./r/n 这场事故发生在道路的拐弯处。/r/n She twisted the long scarf round her head./r/n 她把那条长围巾围在头上。/r/n

word.name: two
word.lx: I have been away from Paris for two weeks./r/n 我离开巴黎已经两星期了。/r/n We shall have meetings on two consecutive days, Monday and Tuesday./r/n 周一周二连续两天我们都将开会。/r/n

word.name: type
word.mean:
n. 类型,品种,样式,模范
v. 打字
n. 铅字,字体
word.lx: There are two types of rocks in this area./r/n 这个地区有两种类型的岩石。/r/n Could you type this letter for me?/r/n 你能为我打这封信吗？/r/n

word.name: typeface
word.lx: In printing, a complete range of design variants of a particular typeface./r/n 在印刷技术中，一整套不同设计的特殊字样。/r/n

word.name: typewriter
word.lx: I did the letter on my electric typewriter./r/n 我是用电动打字机打这封信的。/r/n She inserted a new sheet of paper into the typewriter./r/n 她把一张白纸插入打字机里。/r/n

word.name: typhoid
word.mean:
a. 伤寒性的
n. 伤寒
word.lx: He developed typhoid fever./r/n 他染上了伤寒。/r/n Typhoid is an example of a notifiable disease./r/n 伤寒是必须报告卫生当局的病例./r/n

word.name: typhoon
word.lx: There was a threat of typhoon./r/n 有刮台风的征兆。/r/n The area is flooded, as frequently happens during the typhoon./r/n 这个地区淹了水，这是台风时经常发生的。/r/n

word.name: typical
word.mean: a. 典型的,有代表性的
word.lx: She is a typical Taurus/Taurean/has a typical Taurean personality./r/n 她有典型的金牛座性格./r/n They reacted to the appalling weather with typical British stoicism./r/n 他们忍受著恶劣天气的煎熬, 表现了英国人典型的坚忍不拔的精神./r/n

word.name: typically
word.mean: ad. 代表性地, 作为特色地
word.lx: He is typically American./r/n 他是典型的美国人。/r/n Typically, he would come in late and then say that he had to go early./r/n 他一向是来得很晚，然后又总说他得早走。/r/n

word.name: typist
word.lx: A good typist can finish typing the long article in a short while./r/n 一位好打字员可在短短时间内完成这一长长的文章。/r/n The typist is away on holiday this week./r/n 打字员本周休假./r/n

word.name: tyrannical
word.mean: a. 暴虐的,压制的,残暴的
word.lx: She works for a tyrannical new boss./r/n 她在一个专横的新上司手下工作。/r/n He has a tyrannical reign on his empire./r/n 他是个残暴的皇帝。/r/n

word.name: tyranny
word.lx: The world has experienced many tyrannies./r/n 这个世界已经经历过许多个专政政权。/r/n People will remember the tyrannies of his reign./r/n 人们不会忘记他统治时期的暴行。/r/n

word.name: tyrant
word.lx: The emperor was a tyrant./r/n 那皇帝是个暴君。/r/n This ruler is a pitiless tyrant./r/n 这个统治者是一个冷酷的暴君。/r/n

word.name: tyre
word.lx: There is no tread on the tyre - you should put on a new one./r/n 这条轮胎已经磨平了，你应该换一条新的。/r/n The tyre is too hard reduce the pressure a bit./r/n 这轮胎太硬，要减少一点压力。/r/n

word.name: UFO
word.lx: No, it can not be a ufo./r/n 不，不可能是个不明飞行物。/r/n Have any of you actually seen a UFO?/r/n 你们中间是不是有人确实看到过飞碟？/r/n

word.name: ugly
word.lx: His house looks terrible with those pieces of ugly furniture./r/n 那些难看的家具使得他的家看上去一团糟糕。/r/n What an ugly mutt!/r/n 多难看的杂种狗哇!/r/n

word.name: ulcer
word.lx: The old man has a stomach ulcer./r/n 那个老人得了胃溃疡。/r/n My mouth has an ulcer./r/n 我的口腔出现了溃疡。/r/n

word.name: ultimate
word.mean:
n. 终极,根本
a. 终极的,根本的,极限的,最后的
word.lx: The sun is the ultimate source of energy./r/n 太阳是能量的最基本来源。/r/n Our ultimate objective is the removal of all nuclear weapons./r/n 我们的最终目标是消除所有核武器。/r/n

word.name: ultimately
word.lx: Ultimately, the success of the product depends on the good marketing./r/n 最终，产品的成功还是取决于高明的销售手段。/r/n Every value they created ultimately redounded to his boss./r/n 他们创造的价值最后全进了他们老板的腰包。/r/n

word.name: ultrasound
word.lx: Diagnostic imaging in which ultrasound is used to visualize an internal body structure or a developing fetus./r/n 超声波扫描术利用超声波来显示耳体结构或胚胎发育情况的诊断用的成像法/r/n

word.name: umbrella
word.lx: The wind blew my umbrella inside out./r/n 风把我的伞吹得翻过去了。/r/n You should take an umbrella just as a precaution./r/n 你该带把伞，有备无患。/r/n

word.name: unable
word.mean:
a. 不能的,不会的
v. 不能,不会
word.lx: I am unable to cycle to school because my bicycle is broken./r/n 我不能骑车上学，因为我的自行车坏了。/r/n We are as yet unable to say when the train will arrive./r/n 我们还说不上火车什么时候到达。/r/n

word.name: unaffected
word.mean: a. 不矫揉造作的,自然的,不装饰的
word.lx: She felt her works are meaningful when she saw the unaffected delight of the children./r/n 当她看到孩子们自然流露出的喜悦时，她感到自己的工作很有意义。/r/n These rights are unaffected by the new laws./r/n 这些权利不受新法规的影响。/r/n

word.name: unanimous
word.mean: a. 全体一致的,一致同意的
word.lx: The committee were unanimous that the application should be turned down./r/n 委员会一致同意拒绝这项申请。/r/n Politicians from all parties were completely unanimous in condemning his action./r/n 所有党派的政治家们都一致谴责他的行为。/r/n

word.name: unattached
word.mean: a. 未订婚的,未结婚的
word.lx: Not in love or married; unattached./r/n 未婚的没有谈恋爱或未结婚的；未婚的/r/n An unattached body cell, such as a blood or lymph cell./r/n 活细胞孤立的身体细胞，例如血球细胞、淋巴细胞/r/n

word.name: unattended
word.mean: a. 无随员的,无侍从的,无伴的
word.lx: Telephone shrilled unattended in deserted office./r/n 在空无一人的办公室里电话铃突然地发出刺耳的尖叫声。/r/n An unattended fire./r/n 没有注意的火灾/r/n

word.name: unavoidable
word.lx: The blame is unavoidable./r/n 责备是不可避免的。/r/n Something, such as corrective discipline or punishment, that is unpleasant but necessary or unavoidable./r/n （喻）药某种令人不快的但却必需的或不可避免的东西，例如矫正性惩罚/r/n

word.name: unaware
word.mean: a. 没有发觉的,不知道的
word.lx: He drove into the ditch completely unaware./r/n 他不知不觉地把车开进了沟里。/r/n They attacked him unaware when he was reading./r/n 他们趁他看书不注意时袭击了他。/r/n

word.name: unbind
word.lx: The unbound sheets of paper were piled up on the table./r/n 还没有装订成册的论文稿件堆放在桌子上。/r/n

word.name: uncertainty
word.mean:
n. 不确定,不可靠,半信半疑
(学术)不可信度；偏差
word.lx: The uncertainty is unbearable!/r/n 事情定不下来真让人难以忍受！/r/n They lived in the uncertainty on the dole./r/n 他们依靠救济金的生活不安定。/r/n

word.name: unclassified
word.lx: Pertaining to a signal or area which contains either encrypted classified or unclassified information./r/n 用于修饰或说明包含加密的保密或不保密信息的信号或区域。/r/n

word.name: uncle
word.lx: My uncle is a professor in this university./r/n 我的伯父是这所大学的一名教授。/r/n Your uncle is very sick./r/n 你的叔叔病得很厉害。/r/n

word.name: uncomfortable
word.mean: a. 不舒服的,不自在的
word.lx: I am very uncomfortable lying on this hard, cold floor./r/n 我躺在又硬又冷的地上很不舒服。/r/n Your intent gaze made her uncomfortable./r/n 你的注目凝视使她感到不自在。/r/n

word.name: uncommon
word.mean:
a. 不寻常的,不凡的,罕有的
ad. 非常地
word.lx: There was an uncommon likeness between the two boys./r/n 这两个男孩长得像极了。/r/n Hurricanes are uncommon in England./r/n 飓风在英国非常罕见。/r/n

word.name: unconscious
word.lx: He was unconscious of his mistake./r/n 他没意识到自己犯了错误。/r/n This wounded soldier was unconscious from his loss of blood./r/n 这名伤员由于失血过多而昏迷不醒。/r/n

word.name: unconsciousness
word.mean: n. 无意识,意识不清,人事不省
word.lx: Her words were inward and indistinct when she was in a state of half unconsciousness./r/n ＂她处于半昏迷状态时，她说话的声音低沉，模糊不清。＂/r/n

word.name: uncover
word.lx: Please uncover the pot./r/n 请揭开锅盖。/r/n Everyone uncovered when the signal sounded./r/n 信号响时，人人脱帽致敬。/r/n

word.name: under
word.lx: She sat very still under the tree./r/n 她在树底下静静地坐着。/r/n If you take a deep breath you can stay under for more than a minute./r/n 只要深吸一口气就能在水里待上一分多钟。/r/n

word.name: undercharge
word.lx: He undercharged me 1 for the book/for the book by 1./r/n 我买这本书他少收了我一英镑./r/n

word.name: undergo
word.lx: She underwent a thorough examination at the hospital./r/n 她在医院里接受了全面检查。/r/n I hope that I shall never again have to undergo such unpleasant experience./r/n 我希望我永远不会再遭遇到这种不愉快的经历。/r/n

word.name: undergraduate
word.mean:
n. 大学生
a. 大学部的

word.name: underground
word.mean:
n. 地下,地铁,地道,秘密活动
a. 地下的,秘密的
ad. 在地下,秘密地
word.lx: There is an underground car park near the supermarket./r/n 这个超市附近有一个地下停车场。/r/n The spy never told his family about his underground activities./r/n 这位间谍从未把他的秘密活动告诉家里人。/r/n

word.name: underlie
word.mean: v. 位于...之下,成为...的基础
word.lx: A deep faith underlies her work among refugees./r/n 她在难民中工作是因为她有很深的信念./r/n

word.name: underline
word.lx: Strikes by prison officers underline the need for reform in our gaols./r/n 监狱工作人员罢工一事，突出地表明我们的监狱制度需要改革。/r/n Those words are underlined in the English book./r/n 那本英语书中有些单词下画着线进行强调。/r/n

word.name: underlying
word.lx: Upward pressure from underlying magma domes the surface./r/n 地下岩浆的向上推力使地面成圆顶形。/r/n The mass of rock underlying a mineral deposit in a mine./r/n 矿藏底石位于一个矿中金属矿藏之下的大量石头/r/n

word.name: undermine
word.mean: v. 渐渐破坏,挖掘地基

word.name: underneath
word.mean:
ad. 在下面
n. 下部,底部
prep. 在...下面
word.lx: The coin rolled underneath the piano./r/n 硬币滚到钢琴的下面了。/r/n The underneath part felt damp./r/n 底层很潮湿。/r/n

word.name: underscore
word.mean:
v. 划线于...下
v.强调

word.name: understanding
word.mean:
n. 谅解,理解
vbl. 了解

word.name: undertake
word.lx: We could undertake the work for the time being./r/n 我们可暂时担当这项工作。/r/n He undertook to finish the job by Friday./r/n 他答应星期五之前完成这项工作。/r/n

word.name: undertaking
word.lx: He is too timid to venture upon a new undertaking./r/n 他太胆小，不敢从事新的事业。/r/n An undertaking, especially one of some scope, complication, and risk./r/n 事业一项事业，尤其指一项雄心勃勃、复杂、且具危险性的事业/r/n

word.name: underwear
word.lx: She likes to wear expensive blue underwear./r/n 她喜欢穿昂贵的兰色内衣。/r/n Fabric knitted of this thread, used especially for hosiery and underwear./r/n 里耳线织物用这种线织成的织物，尤指袜类及内衣/r/n

word.name: underwrite
word.mean: v. 签名于下,承诺支付,经营保险业
word.lx: The shares were underwritten by the Bank of England./r/n 这些股票由英格兰银行包销./r/n The government underwrotethe initial costs of the operation./r/n 政府为该项活动提供了开办时所需的费用./r/n

word.name: underwriter
word.mean: n. 保险业者,承诺支付者
word.lx: One that insures, especially an insurance underwriter./r/n 保险人提供保险者，特别是保险商/r/n

word.name: undesirable
word.mean: a. 不受欢迎的,不良的
word.lx: Military intervention is highly undesirable./r/n 军事干涉极不相宜./r/n The drug has no undesirable side-effects./r/n 这种药没有什麽不良的副作用./r/n

word.name: undue
word.lx: He showed undue concern over her./r/n 他对她表现出过份的关心。/r/n It would be wise not to give undue importance to his criticism./r/n 不过份看重他的批评是明智的。/r/n

word.name: unemployed
word.lx: The amount of unemployed capital is very large./r/n 未被利用的资金数量很大。/r/n There are many unemployed workers in the city./r/n 这个城市里有很多失业工人。/r/n

word.name: unemployment
word.lx: In this period, unemployment reaches record levels./r/n 这段时间的失业人数又达到了创纪录水平。/r/n Unemployment has gone up again./r/n 失业人数又上升了./r/n

word.name: unequivocal
word.mean: a. 不含糊的,不模棱两可,明白的

word.name: uneven
word.mean: a. 不平顺的,不均匀的,奇数的
word.lx: My hair has been badly cut and the ends are uneven./r/n 我的头发剪得很糟，发端参差不齐。/r/n The car bumped on the uneven surface of the gravel road./r/n 汽车在高低不平的砾石路面上颠簸着。/r/n

word.name: unexpected
word.lx: The unexpected guest disordered his plans./r/n 这位不速之客打乱了他的计划。/r/n What an unexpected pleasure!/r/n 这真是个意外的惊喜！/r/n

word.name: unexpectedly
word.lx: I had just put the dinner on when Jim walked in unexpectedly./r/n 我刚把饭做好，吉姆出人意外地走了进来。/r/n I finished work unexpectedly early./r/n 我的工作意外地提早做完。/r/n

word.name: unfair
word.lx: If some athletes use drugs, it is unfair for the others./r/n 如果有的运动员使用兴奋剂，其他运动员就要吃亏。/r/n She sued her employer for unfair dismissal./r/n 她控告雇主无理解雇工人。/r/n

word.name: unfavorable
word.lx: This situation is unfavorable for us./r/n 这样的局面对我们来说是不利的。/r/n I got an unfavorable score./r/n 我得到一个不理想的成绩。/r/n

word.name: unfold
word.lx: The eagle unfolded its wings./r/n 雄鹰展开双翅。/r/n She gradually unfolded her plan to him./r/n 她渐渐向他透露了自己的计划。/r/n

word.name: unfortunate
word.mean: a. 不幸的,令人遗憾的
word.lx: He came at an unfortunate time./r/n 他来得不是时候。/r/n I was unfortunate to lose my keys./r/n 我很倒霉，丢了钥匙。/r/n

word.name: ungainly
word.lx: A large or ungainly automobile./r/n 大汽车巨大的或笨拙的汽车/r/n An ungainly gesture./r/n 不雅的姿势。/r/n

word.name: unhappy
word.mean: a. 不快乐的,不幸的,不适当的
word.lx: We are unhappy about the way the doctor treated us./r/n 我们对医生这样对待我们感到不满。/r/n He told me about his unhappy childhood./r/n 他对我讲了他不幸福的童年。/r/n

word.name: unhealthy
word.lx: Their slavish devotion to the leader is unhealthy./r/n 他们对领导的盲目崇拜是不健康的。/r/n Having a sickly or unhealthy pallor indicative of nausea or jealousy, for example./r/n 脸色难看的脸色呈病态或不健康的苍白色，可能由恶心或妒忌引起/r/n

word.name: unidentified
word.lx: An unidentified man shot the President./r/n 一个身份不明的人开枪射杀了总统。/r/n

word.name: uniform
word.mean:
a. 一致的,统一的
n. 制服
word.lx: The rows of houses were uniform in appearance./r/n 这一排排的房屋外表都是一样的。/r/n The students are wearing school uniforms./r/n 学生们穿着校服。/r/n

word.name: uniformly
word.mean: ad. 一律地(均匀地,无变化地)

word.name: unilateral
word.mean: a. 单方面,单边的,片面的

word.name: unintelligible
word.mean: a. 无法了解的,难解的,莫明其妙的
word.lx: Philosophy: unintelligible answers to insoluble problems./r/n 哲学：是对难以解释的问题作出的难以理解的答案。/r/n Lacking meaning; unintelligible./r/n 不明白的；难以理解的/r/n

word.name: union
word.lx: Do you belong to a union?/r/n 你属于某个工会吗？/r/n We all accused the union of torpedoing the negotiation./r/n 我们都谴责工会破坏谈判。/r/n

word.name: unit
word.lx: The family is the smallest social unit./r/n 家庭是社会最小的单位。/r/n We were a unit on the question./r/n 在这个问题上，我们的意见是一致的。/r/n

word.name: United
word.mean:
a. 联合的
v. 联合,统一
vbl. 统一
word.lx: The United Kingdom consists of Great Britain and Northern Ireland./r/n 联合王国由大不列颠和北爱尔兰组成。/r/n Closely joined; grown together; united./r/n 密切联合的；生长在一起的；联合的/r/n

word.name: unity
word.lx: The figure on the left spoils the unity of the painting./r/n 左边的人物有损于画面的效果。/r/n National unity is essential in time of war./r/n 举国团结在战时是非常重要的。/r/n

word.name: universal
word.mean: a. 普遍的,通用的,宇宙的
word.lx: Television provides universal entertainment./r/n 电视提供大众化的娱乐。/r/n When was universal suffrage introduced in your country?/r/n 贵国是什么时候实行普选权的？/r/n

word.name: universally
word.lx: The rules do not apply universally./r/n 这些规则并非放诸四海而皆准./r/n It is universally acknowledged that.../r/n 普遍认为.../r/n

word.name: universe
word.lx: The Earth is only one of the numerous planets in the universe./r/n 地球只是宇宙中众多星球中的一个。/r/n We begin to plumb the mysteries of the universe./r/n 我们开始探索宇宙的奥秘。/r/n

word.name: university
word.lx: There are many foreign professors in this university./r/n 这所大学有许多外国教授。/r/n I enrolled at the University of Vienna./r/n 我报名就读于维也纳大学。/r/n

word.name: Unix
word.mean: 一种多任务多用户操作系统

word.name: unknown
word.lx: The director cast her in a leading part when she was a young unknown of 16./r/n 当她还是一个十六岁的无名少女时，导演选中她演主角。/r/n He was an unknown painter one year ago./r/n 一年前，他还是一个不为人知的画家。/r/n

word.name: unlike
word.mean:
a. 不同的,不相似的
prep. 不像,和...不同
word.lx: Unlike my sister, I am a terrible cook./r/n 和我妹妹不同，我是一个糟糕的厨师。/r/n Unlike his brother, he has a good sense of humor./r/n 和他兄弟不同，他有种幽默感。/r/n

word.name: unlikely
word.mean: a. 不大可能发生的,未必的,多半不可能的
word.lx: These tactics are unlikely to be helpful to you./r/n 这种方法对你未必有用。/r/n He is very ill and unlikely to recover./r/n 他病得非常厉害，不大可能恢复健康了。/r/n

word.name: unload
word.mean: v. 卸货,摆脱...之负担,倾销
word.lx: Dockers started unloading the ship./r/n 码头工人开始卸货。/r/n Lorries may only park here when loading or unloading./r/n 卡车非装卸货物时不得在此停车。/r/n

word.name: unlock
word.lx: I unlocked the door and went into the room./r/n 我打开房门，然后走进屋里。/r/n Scientists have unlocked the secret of the atom./r/n 科学家已经揭开了原子的秘密。/r/n

word.name: unnecessarily
word.mean: ad. 不必要地(多余地,徒然)

word.name: unprecedented
word.lx: Some economists showed their anxiety on unprecedented level of unemployment./r/n 一些经济学家对失业率达到前所未有的程度表示忧虑。/r/n We are seeing unemployment on an unprecedented scale./r/n 我们现在正经历规模空前的失业现象。/r/n

word.name: unpredictable
word.lx: He is moody and unpredictable./r/n 他喜怒无常而又捉摸不定。/r/n Irregular in course or behavior; unpredictable./r/n 不规律的在过程上或行为上无规律的；不可预测的/r/n

word.name: unproductive
word.lx: Not fertile; unproductive or barren./r/n 不肥沃的不肥沃的；不生产的或贫瘠的/r/n

word.name: unquestionable
word.mean: a. 无疑问的,确实的,无可挑剔的
word.lx: His honesty is unquestionable./r/n 他很诚实, 这是毫无疑问的./r/n An unquestionable antique./r/n 毫无疑问的文物/r/n

word.name: unravel
word.lx: My knitting has unravelled./r/n 我编织的东西散开了./r/n

word.name: unrest
word.mean: n. 不安的状态,动荡的局面
word.lx: The increasing unemployment caused social unrest./r/n 不断增加的失业引起了社会骚乱。/r/n The social unrest has its origins in economic problems./r/n 社会动荡是经济问题引起的。/r/n

word.name: unsatisfactory
word.lx: His answer is unsatisfactory./r/n 他的答案不能令人满意。/r/n Reception of TV programmes is unsatisfactory here./r/n 这里电视节目的接收情况不佳。/r/n

word.name: unsigned
word.lx: I suppose that to a large extent I am the unsigned manuscript of the high school teacher./r/n 我认为自己在很大程度上就是那位中学老师的未署名的手稿。/r/n

word.name: unsound
word.mean: a. 腐烂变质的,谬误的

word.name: unstable
word.lx: Liable to capsize; unstable./r/n 易于翻转的；不稳定的/r/n If it were gentle, only the more unstable rods fell./r/n 若地震是微弱的，仅那些比较不稳定的杆子倒下。/r/n

word.name: untie
word.lx: I tried to untie the string but failed./r/n 我试图解开绳子，但没有成功。/r/n Untie me from the chair./r/n 把我从椅子上解开。/r/n

word.name: untold
word.mean: a. 数不清的(没有说到的)
word.lx: Her secret remains untold by now./r/n 她的秘密至今仍未透露。/r/n The report has yet untold facts./r/n 这个报告还有未叙述的事实。/r/n

word.name: untoward
word.mean: a. 麻烦的,困难的,不幸的
word.lx: An untoward incident./r/n 一起麻烦的事件/r/n Indeed, anything untoward was now kept from James./r/n 的确，现在一切不顺心的事都小心瞒着詹姆士。/r/n

word.name: unusable
word.lx: There are several sectors unusable in this disk./r/n 这张磁盘有几个扇区坏了。/r/n The act of obtaining usable substances from unusable sources./r/n 废物利用从无用的东西中获取有用物质的行为/r/n

word.name: unused
word.mean: a. 不用的,不使用的,从未用过的
word.lx: These children are unused to city life./r/n 这些孩子不习惯城市生活。/r/n She keeps an unused stamp of monkey./r/n 她保存着一枚未曾用过的猴邮票。/r/n

word.name: unusual
word.lx: Snow is an unusual sight in this warm place./r/n 下雪在这个温暖的地方是一种罕见的景象。/r/n An unusual conjunction of circumstances led to the incident./r/n 各种情况的偶然巧合导致了这件事的发生。/r/n

word.name: unwanted
word.lx: The disturbance caused in a circuit by an unwanted transfer of energy from another circuit./r/n 从另一线路传送来的不必要的能量在线路中引起的干扰。/r/n Give our leavings (ie unwanted food) to the dog./r/n 把我们吃剩的东西喂狗吧./r/n

word.name: unwelcome
word.mean:
a. 不受欢迎的
n. 冷淡
word.lx: Most Chinese think he will be therefrom unwelcome./r/n 大多数中国人认为他将从此不受欢迎。/r/n We perceived that we were unwelcome and left./r/n 我们发觉自己不受欢迎，因此便离开了。/r/n

word.name: unwilling
word.lx: He is unwilling to help me./r/n 他不愿意帮我。/r/n You are plainly unwilling to co-operate./r/n 你显然不愿合作./r/n

word.name: unworkable
word.mean: a. 难运转的,不能实行的
word.lx: In my submission these proposals are completely unworkable./r/n 在我看来，这些建议完全不可行。/r/n Proposition afraid unworkable try submit al terminative/r/n 所提方案恐不可行，请另提其他方案。/r/n

word.name: up
word.mean:
a. 向上的
prep.&ad. 向上
word.lx: I got up early this morning./r/n 今天早晨我起床很早。/r/n He went up to her to ask her for a dance./r/n 他走到她跟前，请她跳个舞。/r/n

word.name: update
word.mean: v. 更新,补充最新资料
word.lx: The data should be updated once a week./r/n 这些数据应该每星期更新一次。/r/n The feedback from the computer enables us to update the program./r/n 计算机的反馈能使我们更新程序./r/n

word.name: upgrade
word.mean:
vt. 提高(上升,浓集,加强)
n. 提高(上升,浓集,加强)
word.lx: The consulate was upgraded to embassy status./r/n 该领事馆已升格为大使馆./r/n She was upgraded to (the post of) sales director./r/n 她已提升为销售部主任./r/n

word.name: upon
word.lx: Once upon a time, there lived a princess who was very beautiful./r/n 从前, 有一位非常美丽的公主。/r/n Her wavy hair fell in loose wisps and loops upon her shoulders./r/n 她那一头波浪般的长发一簇簇一圈圈地散垂在肩上。/r/n

word.name: upper
word.mean: a. 上部的,较高的,上面的
word.lx: My hometown is in the upper reaches of the river./r/n 我的家乡在这条河的上游地区。/r/n Passengers may smoke only on the upper deck of the bus./r/n 乘客只可以在公共汽车的上层吸烟。/r/n

word.name: upright
word.mean: a. 正直的,诚实的,合乎正道的
word.lx: Several columns among the ruins still stood upright./r/n 在废墟中依然挺立着几根柱子。/r/n Morally upright; honest./r/n 正直的，诚实的/r/n

word.name: uproar
word.lx: There was uproar over the tax increase./r/n 增税引起了一片怨声。/r/n His motion threw the meeting into an uproar./r/n 他的建议在会上引起了一片吵嚷。/r/n

word.name: upside
word.lx: The painting is upside down./r/n 图画颠倒了。/r/n The house was turned upside down by the burglars./r/n 屋子里被夜贼弄得乱七八糟。/r/n

word.name: upstairs
word.mean:
a. 楼上的
ad. 在楼上,往楼上
n. 楼上
word.lx: The boy ran upstairs quickly./r/n 男孩很快地跑上楼。/r/n We crept upstairs so as not to wake the baby./r/n 为了不吵醒婴儿，我们蹑手蹑脚地上了楼梯。/r/n

word.name: upstream
word.lx: The falls upstream are full of salmon./r/n 该瀑布上流有许多大麻哈鱼./r/n We paddled (the canoe) slowly upstream./r/n 我们慢慢地划著（独木舟）逆流而上./r/n

word.name: upward
word.mean:
a. 向上的,上升的
ad. 向上,上升
word.lx: The production of their factory goes steadily upward./r/n 他们工厂的生产稳步上升。/r/n Upward pressure from underlying magma domes the surface./r/n 地下岩浆的向上推力使地面成圆顶形。/r/n

word.name: upwards
word.lx: In convection, hot currents flow upwards./r/n 在对流中热气流向上运动./r/n The rear door hinges/is hinged at the top so that it opens upwards./r/n 後面的门是在顶部铰接上的, 以便可以向上开./r/n

word.name: uranium
word.lx: Radium and uranium are radioactive elements./r/n 镭和铀是放射性元素./r/n A green radioactive mineral that is a hydrous crystalline phosphate of uranium and copper./r/n 铜铀云母一种绿色的放射性矿物，为铀和铜的氢化结晶云母/r/n

word.name: urge
word.mean:
n. 冲动
v. 驱策,力劝,力陈
word.lx: He urged the horses on with a whip./r/n 他用鞭子策马前行。/r/n They urged on us the need for cooperation./r/n 他们向我们强调合作的必要性。/r/n

word.name: urgency
word.lx: Precedence, especially established by order of importance or urgency./r/n 领先，优先尤指按重要性或紧急程度的顺序建立的优先地位/r/n Rarely did she request help but this was a matter of urgency./r/n 她很少求助於人，这事却是十分紧急。/r/n

word.name: urgent
word.mean: a. 急迫的,紧要的,紧急的
word.lx: This work is not urgent; we can do it tomorrow./r/n 这件工作不急，我们可以明天再做。/r/n Demanding prompt action; urgent./r/n 紧急的要求迅速行动的；急切的/r/n

word.name: urgently
word.mean: ad. 迫切地, 急切地

word.name: urinary
word.lx: Inflammation of the urinary bladder./r/n 膀胱炎泌尿膀胱的发炎/r/n A bladder, especially the urinary bladder or the gallbladder./r/n 膀胱，泡，囊膀胱，尤指泌尿器官的膀胱或胆囊/r/n

word.name: us
word.lx: Did he see us?/r/n 他看见我们了吗?/r/n What others think exercises a great influence on most of us./r/n 别人怎样想对我们多半会产生很大影响。/r/n

word.name: USA
word.lx: This island is no longer a dependency of the USA./r/n 这个小岛不再是美国的属地。/r/n The secession of some southern states from the USA in the 1860s led to the civil war./r/n 由于南部某些州于十九世纪六十年代脱离美国而导致了南北战争。/r/n

word.name: usage
word.lx: The tractor had been damaged by rough usage./r/n 这辆拖拉机因使用不经心而损坏了。/r/n Languages develop continually through usage./r/n 语言在使用中不断发展。/r/n

word.name: use
word.mean:
n. 利用,使用,用途
v. 使用
vt. 使用,用
word.lx: Is this reference book of any use to me?/r/n 这本参考书对我有用处吗？/r/n The company now uses a computer to do all its account./r/n 这家公司现在使用电脑来计算所有的帐目。/r/n

word.name: useful
word.lx: She is a useful person to know./r/n 她是个应该结交的有用的人。/r/n This reference book is very useful to our study./r/n 这本参考书对我们的研究很有用。/r/n

word.name: usefulness
word.lx: Impairment of the usefulness or value of person or property; harm./r/n 损害，破坏对有用或有价值的人或财产的破坏；伤害/r/n When he retired he felt that he had outlived his usefulness./r/n 他退休后觉得自己年老无用了。/r/n

word.name: utility
word.mean: n. 公共设施,效用,公用程序,实用品,实用

word.name: utterance
word.mean: n. 说话,发表,说话的方式
word.lx: He gave utterance to his thoughts./r/n 他发表了自己的观点。/r/n She has a defective utterance./r/n 她发音有缺陷。/r/n

word.name: utterly
word.lx: She utterly despises him./r/n 她非常瞧不起他。/r/n We utterly failed to convince them./r/n 我们根本说服不了他们。/r/n

word.name: vacancy
word.lx: We still have vacancies for secretaries but other positions have been filled./r/n 我们的秘书名额尚有空缺，但其他职位都满了。/r/n Fill a job vacancy./r/n 填补工作的空缺/r/n

word.name: vacant
word.lx: If that room is vacant, we can practice there./r/n 如果那个房间空着，我们可以在那练习。/r/n He does not know what to do with his vacant time./r/n 他不知道空闲时间该干点什么。/r/n

word.name: vacation
word.mean:
n. 假期,休假
vi. 度假
word.lx: Where did you go for your vacation?/r/n 你去哪里度假了？/r/n School children are on vacation./r/n 小学生们正在放假。/r/n

word.name: vaccinate
word.lx: She was vaccinate against smallpox as a child./r/n 她小时候就接种了天花疫苗。/r/n

word.name: vaccination
word.lx: He had a vaccination against rabies./r/n 他做了疫苗注射以预防狂犬病。/r/n Induced by vaccination./r/n 因种痘引起的/r/n

word.name: vaccine
word.mean:
n. 疫苗
v. 疫苗的,牛痘的
word.lx: This vaccine will give you immunity for two years./r/n 接种这种疫苗可有两年免疫力。/r/n The search for a new vaccine took priority over all other medical research./r/n 在各种医药研究中, 应首先解决寻找新疫苗的问题./r/n

word.name: vain
word.mean: a. 徒然的,虚荣的,空虚的
word.lx: We tried in vain to make him change his mind./r/n 我们想使他改变主意，结果是白费心机。/r/n All our work was in vain./r/n 我们的工作全都白干了。/r/n

word.name: valid
word.mean: a. 有确实根据的,有效的,正当的
word.lx: A credit card is not a valid proof of identity./r/n 银行发的支票保付卡不是有效的身份证明文件。/r/n The marriage was held to be valid./r/n 这一婚姻关系是有效的。/r/n

word.name: validation
word.lx: A statement or an argument used in such a validation./r/n 证词，证言用于这种证实的陈述或辩论/r/n

word.name: valley
word.mean:
a. 流域,山谷,峡谷
n. 山谷,溪谷
word.lx: He has a large farm in the Mississippi Valley./r/n 他在密西西比河流域拥有一个大农场。/r/n Every spring the river floods the valley./r/n 每年春天河水把山谷淹没。/r/n

word.name: valuable
word.mean:
a. 贵重的,有价值的
n. (pl.)贵重物品
word.lx: Thank you for your valuable service./r/n 感谢你多年的宝贵服务。/r/n Valuable raw materials were salvaged (from the sunken freighter)./r/n （从沉船中）打捞起许多贵重的原料./r/n

word.name: valuation
word.mean: n. 评价,估价,价值判断
word.lx: She asked for a valuation of her house./r/n 她要求对她的房舍作一估价。/r/n An expert or official valuation, as for taxation./r/n 鉴定，估价如在税收方面专家或官方的估价/r/n

word.name: value
word.mean:
n. 价值,重要性,价格,(pl)价值观
vt. 评价,估价,重视
word.lx: He valued the house for me at 20000 pounds./r/n 那栋房子他替我估价两万英镑。/r/n This book will be of great value to him in his study./r/n 这本书将对他的研究有很大价值。/r/n

word.name: valve
word.mean: n. 阀门,电子管,真空管
word.lx: Have you turned off the water valve?/r/n 你关掉水阀了吗？/r/n We need an eye bolt to fit this valve./r/n 我们需要一个有眼螺栓来固定这个阀门。/r/n

word.name: van
word.lx: He brought three people to the party in his van./r/n 他用客货车载了三个人来参加聚会。/r/n Jim had ulterior motives in buying me a drink he wants to borrow my van./r/n 吉姆请我喝酒是另有所图--他想借用我的客货车./r/n

word.name: vanquish
word.lx: Our army has vanquished the enemy./r/n 我们的军队已经彻底击败了敌人。/r/n

word.name: vapor
word.lx: A cloud is a mass of vapor in the sky./r/n 云是天空中的水汽团。/r/n Water can be changed into vapor when heated./r/n 水被加热时，可以变成水蒸汽。/r/n

word.name: vapour
word.lx: Water can be changed into vapour when heated./r/n 水被加热时，可以变成水蒸汽。/r/n A cloud is a mass of vapour in the sky./r/n 云是天空中的水汽团。/r/n

word.name: variable
word.mean:
a. 可变的,易变的
n. 变量
word.lx: His mood is variable./r/n 他的情绪多变。/r/n Winds are mainly light and variable./r/n 风力较弱，风向多变。/r/n

word.name: variance
word.mean: n. 不一致,变化;[数]方差
word.lx: We are at variance about our lodger./r/n 我们在对待房客的问题上意见不一。/r/n This theory is at variance with the known facts./r/n 这种理论与已知事实不符。/r/n

word.name: variant
word.mean:
n. 变体
a. 不同的
word.lx: The story has many variants./r/n 这个故事有很多说法./r/n Moustache" is a variant spelling of "mustache."/r/n moustache是mustache不同的拼法。/r/n"

word.name: variation
word.mean: n. 变化,变动,变种,变异
word.lx: Prices have not shown much variation this year./r/n 今年物价没显出多大变化。/r/n The dial records showed a very slight variation in pressure./r/n 刻度盘显示出压力有极微小的变化。/r/n

word.name: variety
word.lx: My last job lacked variety; I was doing the same things all the time./r/n 我上次那份工作缺乏变化，我老是在做同样的事情。/r/n Variety is the spice of life./r/n 变化是生活的调味品。/r/n

word.name: various
word.lx: The products we sell are many and various./r/n 我们出售的产品是各式各样的。/r/n Various objects were on the table./r/n 桌子上摆着各种各样的物体。/r/n

word.name: varnish
word.mean:
n. 油漆,掩饰,光泽面
v. 粉饰,涂油漆于
word.lx: The table has been varnished./r/n 桌子上已经涂过清漆了。/r/n The hot plate may spoil the varnish on the table./r/n 这只热盘子会损坏桌面的光泽。/r/n

word.name: vary
word.mean: v. 变化,改变,不同,违反
word.lx: The size of the apples varied./r/n 那些苹果大小不同。/r/n She varied her dress as fashion changes./r/n 她的衣着随着潮流而变化。/r/n

word.name: vascular
word.lx: The innermost layer of the cortex that forms a sheath around the vascular tissue of roots and some stems./r/n 内皮层皮层的最内层，在根、茎的导管组织周围形成一道叶鞘（茎衣）/r/n

word.name: vase
word.lx: She put some roses into the vase./r/n 她把玫瑰花插入花瓶里。/r/n I arranged the flowers in the vase as soon as I came back home./r/n 一回到家里，我就把花在花瓶里插好。/r/n

word.name: vast
word.lx: The vast plains stretch for hundreds of miles./r/n 辽阔的平原绵延数百英里。/r/n We admired his intellectual providence to acquire vast stores of dry information./r/n 我们钦佩他收集大量原始资料的远见卓识。/r/n

word.name: VAT
word.mean: n. (=value added tax)增值税, 大桶
word.lx: The worker is dyeing cloth in a vat./r/n 工人正在一个大桶里染布。/r/n Does the price include VAT?/r/n 这价钱是否已包括增值税在内?/r/n

word.name: vault
word.mean:
n. 窖,地下室,撑竿跳
v. 做成圆拱形,撑竿跳跃
word.lx: In medieval times, poets often called the sky the vault of heaven"./r/n 在中世纪时期，诗人常把天空叫作“苍穹”。/r/n

word.name: VCR
word.mean:
abbr. Video Cassette Recorder 录像机
abbr. Variable Compression Ratio, 可变压缩比
word.lx: I would recommend that you buy a DVD player instead of a VCR./r/n 我建议你买一台DVD机而不是录像机。/r/n Otherwise the video can be connected through the VCR first and then out to the monitor./r/n 视频也可以先通过VCR连接，然后输出到监视器上。/r/n

word.name: vector
word.mean:
n. 向量,矢量,带菌者
v. 无线电诱导

word.name: vegetarian
word.mean:
n. 素食者
a. 素食的
word.lx: A vegetarian gets protein not from meat but from its analogues./r/n 素食者所摄取的蛋白质不是来自肉类而是来自近似肉类的食物./r/n I prefer vegetarian food./r/n 我喜欢吃素食。/r/n

word.name: vegetation
word.lx: The colorful vegetation of this tropical forest amazed the professor./r/n 这片热带森林色彩纷呈的植被使教授惊讶。/r/n The path leads to a hill bare of vegetation./r/n 这条小道通向一座没有草木的小山。/r/n

word.name: vehicle
word.mean:
n. 传播媒介,工具,手段,交通工具,车辆;
[语]喻体
word.lx: Is this your vehicle, sir?" asked the policeman./r/n “这是您的车吗，先生？” 警察问道。/r/n

word.name: veil
word.mean:
n. 面纱,面罩,假托
v. 戴面纱,隐藏
word.lx: He deceived them under the veil of charity./r/n 他借慈善事业为名欺骗了他们。/r/n He tried to veil his contempt at my ignorance./r/n 他试图掩饰对我的无知的蔑视。/r/n

word.name: vein
word.lx: I am not in the vein for work./r/n 我没有心情工作。/r/n There is a vein of melancholy in his character./r/n 他的性格中有少许忧郁的气质。/r/n

word.name: velocity
word.lx: Gazelles can move with astonishing velocity./r/n 羚羊跑起来速度惊人。/r/n The car was moving at such a velocity!/r/n 那辆汽车的速度简直太快了！/r/n

word.name: velvet
word.mean:
n. 天鹅绒
a. 天鹅绒的
word.lx: This velvet dress is very beautiful./r/n 这件天鹅绒礼服非常美丽。/r/n The queen assumed a velvet robe./r/n 王后穿了一件天鹅绒长袍/r/n

word.name: vendor
word.mean: n. 厂商,小贩,卖主,自动售货机
word.lx: The vendor signs a contract with the purchaser./r/n 卖方须与买方签订契约./r/n The list contain name of the vendor we do business with./r/n 这个名单上有与我们有业务往来的卖主的名字。/r/n

word.name: vengeance
word.lx: He took vengeance on the murderer./r/n 他向谋杀者报了仇。/r/n He cried to heaven for vengeance./r/n 他哭求老天为他雪耻。/r/n

word.name: vent
word.mean:
n. 排气口
v. 发泄

word.name: ventilate
word.lx: They are ventilating the sap of a coal mine./r/n 他们正在使煤矿坑道通风。/r/n My office is well ventilated./r/n 我的办公室通风良好。/r/n

word.name: venture
word.mean:
n. 冒险,风险
v. 敢尝试,冒险一试
word.lx: He chose a book at a venture from the shelves./r/n 他从书架上随便挑了一本书。/r/n Venture a small fish to catch a great one./r/n 【谚】欲钓大鱼，先舍小鱼。/r/n

word.name: verb
word.lx: You have omitted the verb in the sentence./r/n 你把这个句子中的动词丢了。/r/n The verb should be in the plural./r/n 这个动词应用复数形式。/r/n

word.name: verbal
word.mean: a. 动词的,口头的,用言辞的,用文字的
word.lx: I am making a verbal translation./r/n 我正在逐字的翻译。/r/n The teacher teaches us the verbal skills./r/n 老师告诉我们使用言辞的技巧。/r/n

word.name: verdict
word.lx: The jury announced their verdict./r/n 陪审团做出了裁决。/r/n They have had the verdict of the electors./r/n 他们已经知道了选举人的决定。/r/n

word.name: verge
word.lx: The little boy walked along the grass verge, trying not to step into the field./r/n 这个小男孩沿着草地的边上走，小心不踩到地里。/r/n She was on the verge of tears./r/n 她几乎要哭出来了。/r/n

word.name: verify
word.mean:
v. 查证,核实
n.[计算机] DOS命令 : 打开关闭在 DOS操作期间的写文件校验开关
word.lx: The computer verified whether the data was loaded correctly./r/n 计算机查实数据输入是否正确。/r/n The truth verified the allegations./r/n 事实证明了这些说法。/r/n

word.name: versatile
word.mean: a. 多才多艺的,多方面的，通用的，

word.name: verse
word.lx: This play was written in verse./r/n 这个剧本是用诗体写成的。/r/n There are four verses in each poem./r/n 每首诗有四个诗节。/r/n

word.name: versed
word.mean: a. 熟练的,精通的,造诣深的
word.lx: Adequately versed in a subject./r/n 精通的在某一学科上很精通的/r/n He is well versed in the science of optics./r/n 他精通光学。/r/n

word.name: version
word.lx: This shirt is a cheaper version of the one I saw in that shop./r/n 这件衬衫同我在那家商店里见到的几乎一样，但它是便宜货。/r/n The two newspapers gave different versions of what happened./r/n 两家报纸对发生的事说法不一。/r/n

word.name: versus
word.mean:
a. 对抗,相对比
prep.对。。。；与。。。相对

word.name: vertical
word.mean:
a. 垂直的
n. 垂直线
word.lx: The northern face of the mountain is almost vertical./r/n 这座山向北的一面几乎是垂直的。/r/n The vertical line meets the horizontal one here./r/n 垂直线与水平线在此相交./r/n

word.name: vessel
word.lx: There are some fishing vessels in the harbor./r/n 港湾里有许多渔船。/r/n We hove the vessel to./r/n 我们把船停住了./r/n

word.name: vest
word.mean:
n. 背心
v. 授权，给与
word.lx: The constitution vests the president with the power to declare war./r/n 宪法授予总统宣战权。/r/n He only wears a vest in the room./r/n 他在家里只穿了一件背心。/r/n

word.name: veteran
word.mean:
a. 老练的
n. 老兵,老手
word.lx: His grandfather was a veteran of the World War II./r/n 他的祖父是二战时的老兵。/r/n This washing machine is really a veteran./r/n 这台洗衣机真是老古董了。/r/n

word.name: veto
word.mean:
n. 否决权
v. 否决
vi. 否决,禁止
vt. 使用否决权
word.lx: Japan exercised her veto to block the resolution./r/n 日本使用了否决权反对该项决议。/r/n The president last week vetoed the tax cut./r/n 总统上个星期否决了减税法案。/r/n

word.name: vex
word.lx: His silly chatter would vex you./r/n 他那无聊的闲扯会使你烦恼。/r/n He was vexed at his failure./r/n 他因失败而糟心。/r/n

word.name: vexed
word.mean: a. 焦急的,生气的,为难的
word.lx: He was vexed at his failure./r/n 他因失败而糟心。/r/n She was vexed that I was late./r/n 她嗔怪我来晚了./r/n

word.name: via
word.lx: I can send him a note via the internal mail system./r/n 我可以通过内部通信系统给他发个通知。/r/n We shall go from London to Washington via New York./r/n 我们将从伦敦经过纽约到华盛顿。/r/n

word.name: viable
word.mean:
a. 能养活的,能生育的
a. markets without arbitrage opportunities are called viable.

word.name: vibrate
word.mean:
v. (使)振动,(使)摇摆
vt. 摇动,震动
word.lx: His voice vibrated with passion./r/n 他激动得声音发颤。/r/n The whole house vibrates whenever a heavy lorry passes./r/n 重型卡车一经过，整所房子都震动起来。/r/n

word.name: vice
word.mean:
n. 恶习,恶行,罪恶,缺陷,恶癖,老虎钳
vt. 钳住
prep. 代替,副,次
word.lx: Drunkenness is his sole vice./r/n 酗酒是他唯一的恶习。/r/n We should take into account the proposals of our parents and vice versa./r/n 我们应该考虑父母的建议, 反之亦然。/r/n

word.name: vicinity
word.lx: All the ships in the vicinity of the crash joined in the search for survivors./r/n 撞船事故发生地区的所有船只都参加了搜寻幸存者的工作。/r/n In this general vicinity; around here./r/n 在这一带在这里附近；在这周围/r/n

word.name: vicious
word.mean: a. 恶毒的,恶意的,凶残的,剧烈的,严重的
word.lx: He gave the dog a vicious blow with his stick./r/n 他用手杖恶狠狠地打了那条狗一顿。/r/n Your vicious dog is menacing my cat!/r/n 你那条恶狗对我家的猫太凶了！/r/n

word.name: victim
word.lx: He fell a victim to the dagger of the assassin./r/n 他死于刺客的匕首之下。/r/n We are collecting money for the famine victim./r/n 我们在为遭受饥荒的灾民募捐。/r/n

word.name: victor
word.lx: He is the victor of the game./r/n 他是这项运动的优胜者。/r/n Prepare diskettes for use on the Victor computer./r/n 为在胜利牌电脑上的应用准备了磁盘。/r/n

word.name: victorious
word.lx: It was a happy day when our football team was victorious./r/n 我们很高兴，我们的足球队获得了胜利。/r/n The victorious general made a triumphant return./r/n 这位打了胜仗的将军凯旋而归。/r/n

word.name: victory
word.lx: People in the city held a great party to celebrate their victory./r/n 本市的市民举行了盛大的晚会庆祝他们的胜利。/r/n We win the emphatic victory./r/n 我们赢得了那场有目共睹的胜利。/r/n

word.name: video
word.mean:
a. 录像的
n. 录像(机)
vt. 制作...的录像
word.lx: There is no video signal./r/n 没有视频信号。/r/n We have a video camera./r/n 我们有一架摄像机。/r/n

word.name: videotex
word.lx: An interactive videotex system in which information can be retrieved or transmitted over television cables or telephone lines./r/n 视传系统一种相互作用的视传系统，通过电视电缆或电话线接收或传播信息/r/n

word.name: view
word.mean:
n. 视野,风景,见解
v. 看,考虑
word.lx: His view of life is different from yours./r/n 他的人生观与你的不同。/r/n The valley was hidden from view in the mist./r/n 溪谷隐没在雾霭之中，看不见了。/r/n

word.name: viewpoint
word.lx: A person who has an academic viewpoint or a scholarly background./r/n 学术界人士有学术观点或学术背景的人/r/n I look at this problem from a different viewpoint./r/n 我从不同的观点来看这个问题。/r/n

word.name: vigilant
word.mean: a. 警醒的,警戒著的,警惕的
word.lx: The police said that the public should be vigilant./r/n 警方说公众应保持警惕。/r/n I am afraid under the vigilant eyes of the examiner./r/n 在检察员警惕的目光下，我害怕了。/r/n

word.name: vigor
word.lx: He was noted for his vigor./r/n 他以精力充沛而出名。/r/n The laws are still in vigor./r/n 这些法律仍然有效。/r/n

word.name: vigorous
word.mean: a. 精力充沛的,元气旺盛的,有力的
word.lx: These corn plants are very vigorous./r/n 这些玉米秧正茁壮生长。/r/n He never ceased to chase after his dream in his vigorous youth./r/n 在精力充沛的年轻时代他从未停止过追求自己的梦想。/r/n

word.name: vigour
word.lx: The laws are still in vigour./r/n 这些法律仍然有效。/r/n He was noted for his vigour./r/n 他以精力充沛而出名。/r/n

word.name: villa
word.lx: He lived in No.3 villa./r/n 他住在3号别墅。/r/n The villa is famous for its old style./r/n 这所别墅以古旧的风格而著名。/r/n

word.name: village
word.lx: He lived in a picturesque village./r/n 他住在一个风景如画的村庄里。/r/n The village was swept away when the dam burst./r/n 村庄在水坝决堤时被冲走了。/r/n

word.name: vindicate
word.lx: Subsequent events vindicatedhis suspicions./r/n 後来的事实表明他的怀疑有道理./r/n The report fully vindicated the unions./r/n 这份报告充分说明工会是正确的./r/n

word.name: vine
word.lx: He cut some grapes for me from the vine./r/n 他为我从藤上剪下了一些葡萄。/r/n The grapes withered on the vine./r/n 葡萄藤上的葡萄都干瘪了。/r/n

word.name: vinegar
word.lx: He put some vinegar in the noodles./r/n 他在面条里放了些醋。/r/n Vinegar contains acetic acid./r/n 醋中含有醋酸./r/n

word.name: vineyard
word.lx: The farmer has a vineyard on his farm./r/n 那个农场主在他的农场里有一个葡萄园。/r/n A vineyard or wine-producing region in France./r/n 克鲁法国的葡萄园或葡萄酒生产区/r/n

word.name: violence
word.lx: She slammed the door with violence./r/n 她砰的一声用力关上了门。/r/n The young man was charged with robbery with violence./r/n 这个年轻人被控暴力抢劫。/r/n

word.name: violent
word.lx: She was in violent temper./r/n 她暴跳如雷。/r/n Violent criminals like that are a danger to society./r/n 那种暴力罪犯对社会是一种危害。/r/n

word.name: violet
word.mean:
a. 紫色的
n. 紫罗兰
word.lx: She planted some violets in the garden./r/n 她在花园里种了一些紫罗兰。/r/n A moderate, light, or brilliant violet to moderate or deep reddish purple./r/n 淡紫红色轻淡、适度或明亮的紫罗兰色，适度或深红紫色/r/n

word.name: violin
word.lx: He can play violin well./r/n 他小提琴拉得很好。/r/n He played a tune on the violin./r/n 他用小提琴演奏了一首曲子。/r/n

word.name: viral
word.mean: a. 滤过性毒菌的,滤过性毒菌引起的

word.name: virgin
word.mean:
n. 处女
a. 纯洁的, 原始的
维尔京群岛
word.lx: She remained a virgin all her life./r/n 她终生未婚。/r/n This is the virgin voyage of the ship./r/n 这是这艘船的处女航。/r/n

word.name: virtual
word.lx: A virtual state of war exists between the two countries./r/n 这两国间实际上处于战争状态。/r/n Our deputy manager is the virtual head of the business./r/n 我们的副经理是公司的实际负责人。/r/n

word.name: virtually
word.mean:
a. 几乎,差不多
ad. 几乎,实际上
word.lx: Virtually all the members were in agreement with the proposal./r/n 几乎所有的成员都同意这项提议。/r/n It is virtually impossible to predict the future accurately./r/n 精确预言未来的事实际上是办不到的./r/n

word.name: virtue
word.lx: He said his plan had the virtue of being the easiest to implement./r/n 他说他的计划的优点是最简单易行。/r/n Virtue is fairer far than beauty./r/n 【谚】美德远胜于美貌。/r/n

word.name: virtuous
word.mean: a. 有品德的,善良的,贞洁的
word.lx: A person who is virtuous is also courteous./r/n 有德者必知礼。/r/n A virtuous woman./r/n 贞洁的女子/r/n

word.name: virulent
word.mean: a. 有毒的,有恶意的,充满敌意的
word.lx: A virulent form of cancer./r/n 癌症的一种致命形式/r/n

word.name: virus
word.lx: We should be watchful of computer viruses./r/n 我们应该警惕计算机病毒。/r/n Scientists have isolated the virus causing the epidemic./r/n 科学家们已分离出引起这种流行病的病毒。/r/n

word.name: visceral
word.lx: But there will always be a visceral aspect to choosing a President. The reason so many people remain dissatisfied with the current candidates is that they yearn to be swept off their feet by inspirational speeches and glamorous looks, strong leadership a

word.name: viscous
word.mean: a. 粘的,有粘性的,粘性的
word.lx: Sticky and viscous./r/n 粘性的；胶粘的/r/n The phenomenon whereby a viscous substance solidifies under pressure./r/n 膨胀凝固性一种粘性物质在压力下变成凝固的现象/r/n

word.name: visibility
word.lx: Fog restricted visibility./r/n 雾天能见度很低。/r/n Dense fog is covering roads in the north and visibility is very poor./r/n 浓雾笼罩了北部的公路, 能见度很低./r/n

word.name: visible
word.lx: The tower was visible from afar./r/n 从远处就能望到那座塔。/r/n The sea is visible from my hotel room window./r/n 从我旅馆房间的窗户可以望到大海。/r/n

word.name: visit
word.mean:
n. 拜访,访问
v. 拜访,访问,参观
word.lx: He makes several business visits to American every year./r/n 他每年都要为商务到美国去几次。/r/n Visiting time in this hospital is from 4 to 6./r/n 这家医院的探望时间是从4点到6点。/r/n

word.name: visitor
word.lx: Visitors to the castle are asked not to take photographs./r/n 来城堡参观者不得拍照。/r/n The visitor left a little before noon./r/n 来访者在中午前一会儿离开了。/r/n

word.name: visitors
