word.lx: Two visitors were brutally slain yesterday./r/n 昨天有两名游客惨遭杀害。/r/n Visitors to the exhibition came in an endless stream./r/n 参观展览会的人络绎不绝。/r/n

word.name: visual
word.lx: He has a good visual memory./r/n 他有良好的视觉记忆力。/r/n Her designs have a strong visual appeal./r/n 她的设计在视觉上很有感染力。/r/n

word.name: vitamin
word.lx: Oranges contain vitamin C./r/n 橙子含有维生素C。/r/n His mother told him to have a vitamin pill before leaving./r/n 他妈妈让他在走之前吃一颗维生素药丸。/r/n

word.name: vivid
word.mean: a. 生动的,栩栩如生的,鲜艳的
word.lx: This girl gave a vivid description of the event./r/n 那女孩对这件事作了一番生动的描述。/r/n The dark room was momentarily lit up by a vivid flash of lightning./r/n 那黑洞洞的房间顿时被强烈的闪电照亮了。/r/n

word.name: vividly
word.lx: The film vividly shows the stark realities of life for the poor and hungry./r/n 这部影片生动地揭示了贫穷和饥饿的人们赤裸裸的生活现实。/r/n The squad leader was a vividly drawn character./r/n 班长是个刻画得很生动的人物。/r/n

word.name: vocabulary
word.lx: He has an extensive vocabulary./r/n 他词汇很丰富。/r/n You can look up this word in the vocabulary./r/n 你可以在词汇表里查这个词。/r/n

word.name: vocal
word.lx: The tongue is one of the vocals./r/n 舌头是发声器官之一。/r/n I like instrumental music better than vocal music./r/n 我喜欢器乐胜于声乐。/r/n

word.name: vocation
word.lx: Nursing is a vocation as well as a profession./r/n 护理工作既是职业又是救死扶伤的责任。/r/n He has little vocation for teaching./r/n 他不是教书的材料。/r/n

word.name: vogue
word.lx: His novels were in vogue ten years ago./r/n 他的小说十年前风靡一时。/r/n Short hair came back into vogue./r/n 短发又开始流行起来了。/r/n

word.name: void
word.mean:
n. 空虚
a. 空的
word.lx: That part of the town is completely void of interest for visitors./r/n 城镇的那部分对游客完全没有吸引力。/r/n The check was marked void./r/n 这张支票已经盖章无效了。/r/n

word.name: volatile
word.mean: a. 反复无常的,挥发性的
word.lx: Petrol is volatile./r/n 汽油容易挥发。/r/n The volatile political situation in Singapore upset the people./r/n 动荡不定的新加坡政局使人民感到不安。/r/n

word.name: volatility
word.mean:
n. 挥发性,挥发度,轻快,（性格）反复无常
(often disapproving) (of a person or their moods) changing easily from one mood to another: a highly volatile personality

word.name: volcano
word.lx: An active volcano may erupt at any time./r/n 活火山随时可能喷发。/r/n The volcano had slumbered for years./r/n 这火山已经很多年不活动了。/r/n

word.name: volley
word.mean:
n. 齐发
vt 齐射
word.lx: He was hit by a volley of snowballs./r/n 他被一阵投来的雪球击中了。/r/n Police fired a volley over the heads of the crowd./r/n 警察朝人群上方射出一排子弹。/r/n

word.name: volleyball
word.lx: Volleyball is my favorite sport./r/n 排球是我最喜欢的运动。/r/n Their team really whipped ours at volleyball./r/n 他们的排球队彻底击败了我们队。/r/n

word.name: volume
word.mean:
n. 体积,容量,音量
n. 卷,册
word.lx: The television is too loud; turn the volume down./r/n 电视声音太响了，把音量调低点儿。/r/n The volume of this container is 20 cubic meters./r/n 这个集装箱的体积是20立方米。/r/n

word.name: voluntary
word.lx: Many social services are still provided by voluntary societies in our city./r/n 在我们的城市，许多社会服务仍然是有志愿团体提供的。/r/n He made a voluntary statement to the police./r/n 他自愿为警方作供。/r/n

word.name: volunteer
word.mean:
n. 志愿者
a. 志愿的
v. 志愿
word.lx: Can I have a volunteer to wash the dishes?/r/n 谁自愿来帮忙收拾一下这些盘子？/r/n He volunteered a statement to the police./r/n 他自动向警方供出情况。/r/n

word.name: vomit
word.lx: He vomited up all he had eaten./r/n 他把吃下的东西全吐了出来。/r/n The mixture of drinks made me vomit./r/n 我喝了混合饮料后吐了起来。/r/n

word.name: vote
word.mean:
n. 投票,表决
v. 投票,选举,投票拥护
word.lx: At the end of the meeting, a vote was taken on the motion./r/n 会议结束前对该项提议进行了表决。/r/n Parliament voted the bill through without a debate./r/n 国会未经辩论就投票通过了这项法案。/r/n

word.name: voter
word.lx: This policy will not appeal to the voters./r/n 这项政策不会受到选民的欢迎。/r/n A claim that a vote is invalid or that a voter is unqualified./r/n 选举无效的声明声称某一投票无效或某一投票人不合格/r/n

word.name: voting
word.mean:
a. 有投票权的
n. 投票
word.lx: Convicted criminals are debarred from voting in elections./r/n 已判刑的罪犯均被褫夺选举投票权./r/n Voting showed a 10% swing to the Opposition./r/n 投票结果表明有10%的人转而支持反对党./r/n

word.name: voucher
word.mean: n. 证人,保证人,证明者
word.lx: A company that vouchers employees when the payroll cannot be met./r/n 公司在发不出工资时给职员一定的凭证/r/n

word.name: vow
word.lx: All the men took a vow of loyalty to their leader./r/n 所有士兵都发誓效忠他们的指挥官。/r/n He vowed that he would prosecute them for fraud./r/n 他郑重宣布将起诉他们犯有欺诈罪。/r/n

word.name: vowel
word.lx: The vowels in the English alphabet are a,e,i,o,u, and, sometimes, y./r/n 英语的元音字母有a，e，i，o，u，有时也包括y。/r/n A checked vowel./r/n 闭音节元音/r/n

word.name: voyage
word.lx: They planned to voyage across the Pacific Ocean./r/n 他们计划做穿越太平洋的旅行。/r/n She went on a long sea voyage./r/n 她乘船在海上长途旅行。/r/n

word.name: vulnerability
word.mean:
n. 易受伤,易受责难,弱点
漏洞（计算机）

word.name: vulnerable
word.mean: a. 易受伤害的,有弱点的
word.lx: The potato is vulnerable to several pests./r/n 马铃薯易受几种害虫的侵害./r/n She is very young and vulnerable to temptation/fraud./r/n 她很年轻，易受诱惑／易受骗上当。/r/n

word.name: wag
word.lx: The news set tongues wagging./r/n 那则消息使人们议论纷纷。/r/n The dog wagged its tail./r/n 狗摇了摇尾巴。/r/n

word.name: wagon
word.lx: The enemy attacked our wagon train./r/n 敌人袭击了我们的运货马车队。/r/n A four-wheeled, open, box-shaped wagon or iron car run on tracks in a coal mine./r/n 矿车、煤车煤矿中在轨道上行驶的四轮、开口、盒状的运货车或铁制车厢/r/n

word.name: wail
word.mean:
n. 悲叹
v. 悲叹
word.lx: The wind wailed in the forest all night./r/n 风在林子里彻夜呼啸。/r/n The exhausted mother smiled at the wail of her newborn baby./r/n 听到新生儿的哭叫声，倦极了的母亲笑了。/r/n

word.name: waist
word.lx: She wears a ribbon belt round her waist./r/n 她在腰部束了一条缎带。/r/n If the skirt is too big, we can take in the waist./r/n 要是裙子太大了，我们可以把腰部收紧一些。/r/n

word.name: waiter
word.lx: He called the waiter to bring the menu./r/n 他叫侍者拿菜单来。/r/n The waiter brought us a dish of orange segments./r/n 服务员给我们端来一盘掰开的橘子瓣。/r/n

word.name: waiting
word.mean:
n. 等候
a. 候补
vbl. 等候
word.lx: Passengers thronged the station waiting for their trains./r/n 乘客们拥挤在火车站上等候乘车。/r/n With expectant faces, children are waiting for the drama to start./r/n 孩子们眼巴巴地等候话剧开始。/r/n

word.name: waitress
word.lx: She is a waitress in a restaurant./r/n 她是饭店的女服务员。/r/n At breakfast time, the waitress still is not up./r/n 到开早饭的时候，女服务员还没起床。/r/n

word.name: wake
word.lx: I usually wake up early./r/n 我通常醒得很早。/r/n The argument woke old rivalries./r/n 争论又激起了旧怨。/r/n

word.name: waken
word.lx: I was wakened by the telephone./r/n 我被电话铃吵醒了。/r/n Nature seems to be wakened from a deep sleep./r/n 大自然好像从沉睡中被唤醒。/r/n

word.name: walk
word.mean:
n. 散步,步行
v. 走路
word.lx: He was walking up and down the station platform./r/n 他在火车站的月台上走来走去。/r/n The station is a short walk from my house/r/n 车站到我家只有几步路的路程。/r/n

word.name: walker
word.lx: A person traveling on foot; a walker./r/n 行人，步行的人走着旅行的人；步行者/r/n Meet my brother Walker./r/n 见见我的兄弟沃克吧。/r/n

word.name: wall
word.lx: The castle walls are very thick./r/n 城堡的墙很厚。/r/n The mountain rose up in a steep wall of rock./r/n 这座山高而陡，形成一道岩石屏障。/r/n

word.name: wallpaper
word.lx: The wallpaper in our bedroom has a pattern of orchids./r/n 我们卧室的壁纸是兰花图案的。/r/n We agonized for hours about which wallpaper to buy./r/n 对买哪种壁纸, 我们伤了几小时的脑筋./r/n

word.name: walnut
word.lx: This box is made of walnut./r/n 这个箱子是胡桃木做的。/r/n A seed borne within a fruit having a hard shell, as in the peanut, almond, or walnut./r/n 坚果种子生长在有硬壳的果实之内的种子，如花生、杏或核桃/r/n

word.name: WAN
word.lx: The child looked pale and wan./r/n 这孩子看上去脸色不好，一副有病的样子。/r/n A wan expression./r/n 惨淡的表情/r/n

word.name: wand
word.lx: The magician is waving a magic wand./r/n 魔术师在挥舞魔杖。/r/n A rod, wand, or staff carried as an emblem of authority or office./r/n 权杖作为权力或职位的象征而携带的手杖、棒或短杖/r/n

word.name: wane
word.mean:
n. 衰微,亏缺,变弱
v. 变小,亏缺,呈下弦
word.lx: By now the power of the Roman Empire was on the wane./r/n 到这时，罗马帝国已日益衰败。/r/n The moon waxes and wanes every month./r/n 月亮每个月都有盈亏。/r/n

word.name: want
word.mean:
n. 缺乏,欲望,需要
v. 要,希望,必须
word.lx: He wants me to go with him./r/n 他希望我同他一起去。/r/n He is wanted by the police./r/n 警察正通缉他。/r/n

word.name: war
word.mean:
n. 战争
vi. 作战
word.lx: We have had two world wars in this century./r/n 本世纪我们已经经历了两次世界大战。/r/n The prospect of another war appalled us./r/n 想到有可能发生另一场战争，我们不寒而栗。/r/n

word.name: ward
word.mean:
n. 守卫,监护,病房
v. 守护,躲开
n. 由监护人或法院保护的人（尤指儿童）
word.lx: The patient lay quietly on his bed in the medical ward./r/n 病人安静地躺在内科病房的床上。/r/n The hospital has a medical ward and a surgical ward./r/n 这医院有内科病房和外科病房./r/n

word.name: ware
word.mean:
n. 制品,器具,货物
v. 留心,小心

word.name: warehouse
word.mean:
n. 仓库
v. 存入仓库
word.lx: They stored their goods in a warehouse./r/n 他们把货物储存在一个仓库里。/r/n If necessary, please warehouse the goods./r/n 如有必要，请将该货存入仓库。/r/n

word.name: warfare
word.lx: The naval warfare ended in our victory./r/n 这次海战以我们的胜利而告终。/r/n Prepared for use or action, especially in warfare./r/n 有战斗力的，备战的为使用或行动准备的，尤指在战争中/r/n

word.name: warm
word.mean:
a. 暖和的
v. (使)变暖
vt. (使)温暖
word.lx: He was pleased with their warm welcome./r/n 他们的热烈欢迎使他很高兴。/r/n The weather has warmed up./r/n 天气转暖了。/r/n

word.name: warmly
word.mean: ad. 亲切地,温暖地,热心地
word.lx: The suggestion was warmly welcomed./r/n 这项建议受到热烈欢迎。/r/n All the teachers and students are warmly welcome./r/n 热烈欢迎全体师生莅临指导。/r/n

word.name: warmth
word.mean: n. 暖和,温暖,热烈,热情,热心
word.lx: He was pleased by the warmth of his welcome./r/n 他因受到热烈欢迎而高兴。/r/n He was touched by the warmth of their welcome./r/n 他受到他们热情欢迎，十分感动。/r/n

word.name: warn
word.lx: He warned me against going there at night./r/n 他警告我晚上不要到那去。/r/n I warned them that there might be snakes in the woods./r/n 我提醒他们树林里可能有蛇。/r/n

word.name: warning
word.mean:
n. 警告,预告,通知
vbl. 警告,注意,通知
word.lx: They attacked without a warning./r/n 他们不宣而战。/r/n The sirens sounded an air-raid warning./r/n 汽笛响起了空袭警报。/r/n

word.name: warranted
word.lx: Her interference was not warranted./r/n 她干涉得毫无道理./r/n The tour price is not warranted by the use of two-star hotel./r/n 旅游者花这么多的钱被安排住在二星级饭店是不合理的。/r/n

word.name: warranty
word.lx: The machine is still under warranty./r/n 这台机器仍在保修期内/r/n The car is sold with a twelve- month warranty./r/n 汽车出售有12个月的担保。/r/n

word.name: warrior
word.lx: The Mongolians are a warrior race./r/n 蒙古民族是一个骁勇的民族。/r/n Characteristic of or befitting a warrior./r/n 勇敢的，好战的具有战士、勇士特征的或适宜于勇士的/r/n

word.name: warship
word.lx: The Queen is to launch a new warship today./r/n 今天女王要主持新军舰下水仪式./r/n An ancient Greek or Roman galley or warship, having three tiers of oars on each side./r/n 三排桨古战舰古代希腊或罗马的一种两边各有三排桨的战舰或划艇/r/n

word.name: wary
word.mean: a. 小心的,机警的,周到的
word.lx: They kept a wary eye on the robber./r/n 他们密切注意那个强盗。/r/n She was wary of strangers./r/n 她对陌生人很警惕。/r/n

word.name: wash
word.mean:
n. 洗,洗濯;(美国西部)干河床
v. 洗,洗涤,洗清
word.lx: I must wash my hands before dinner./r/n 吃饭前，我必须洗手。/r/n She has a large wash this week./r/n 这星期她有大量衣服要洗。/r/n

word.name: wasp
word.lx: Wasps look similar to bees./r/n 黄蜂看上去很像蜜蜂。/r/n Her face was covered in wasp stings./r/n 她脸上满是黄蜂蜇过的伤痕./r/n

word.name: wastage
word.lx: You must allow for five per cent wastage in transit./r/n 在运输中要允许有百分之五的损耗量./r/n The retailer has to absorb the cost of wastage./r/n 零售商须承受耗损的费用./r/n

word.name: wasteful
word.lx: Recklessly wasteful; wildly extravagant./r/n 恣意挥霍的毫不在意地浪费的；极其奢侈的/r/n Wasteful people usually end up in debt./r/n 挥霍浪费者最后往往负债。/r/n

word.name: watch
word.mean:
n. 手表
v. 看,注视,照顾
word.lx: The soldiers were keeping close watch over the enemies./r/n 士兵们严密注意着敌人的行动。/r/n We sat there watching basketball./r/n 我们坐在那看篮球比赛。/r/n

word.name: watchful
word.lx: The guard should be watchful during the night./r/n 警卫在黑夜里也应该警醒。/r/n We should be watchful of computer viruses./r/n 我们应该警惕计算机病毒。/r/n

word.name: water
word.mean:
n. 水,雨水,海水
v. 浇水,供水,注水
word.lx: Water is changed into steam by heat and into ice by cold./r/n 水加热则成为蒸汽，冷却则成为冰。/r/n The smoke made my eyes water./r/n 烟使我的眼睛流泪。/r/n

word.name: waterfall
word.lx: They took many pictures of the waterfall yesterday./r/n 昨天他们拍了许多瀑布的照片。/r/n You can cross the river a short distance below (ie downstream from) the waterfall./r/n 在瀑布下游附近可以过河./r/n

word.name: waterfront
word.mean: n. 水边地码头区, 滨水地区
word.lx: A wall or embankment, as in a mine or along a waterfront, that acts as a protective barrier./r/n （坑内的）堵壁、堤岸、挡土墙在矿井里或沿着水边的墙或堤，用来当作当保护物的障碍物/r/n

word.name: waterproof
word.mean:
n. 防水材料
a. 防水的
v. 使...能防水
word.lx: These are waterproof fabrics./r/n 这些是防水面料。/r/n I bought a waterproof watch./r/n 我买了一块防水表。/r/n

word.name: watertight
word.mean: a. 不漏水的(无懈可击的)
word.lx: A watertight cylindrical vessel, open at the top and fitted with a handle; a bucket./r/n 桶一种不漏水的圆柱形容器，顶部敞开并安有把手；水桶/r/n Is this roof completely watertight?/r/n 这屋顶一点也不漏吗？/r/n

word.name: watery
word.lx: A waiter brought him a watery coffee./r/n 一个侍者给他端来一杯稀咖啡。/r/n Relating to, similar to, containing, or dissolved in water; watery./r/n 水的与水有关的，似水的，含水的或溶于水的；水的/r/n

word.name: watt
word.lx: The lamp needs a 100-watt bulb./r/n 那盏灯需要100瓦的灯泡。/r/n A unit of electric power equal to the product of one volt and one ampere, equivalent to one watt./r/n 伏安法功率单位，等于一伏特和一安培的乘积，等于一瓦特/r/n

word.name: wave
word.mean:
n. 波,波浪,波动
v. 波动,挥动,起伏
word.lx: She has a natural wave in her hair./r/n 她的头发自然卷曲。/r/n The flag waved in the wind./r/n 旗帜在风中飘扬。/r/n

word.name: waver
word.mean:
n. 动摇,踌躇
v. 摆动,摇曳,犹豫
word.lx: The disaster caused him to waver in his faith./r/n 这件灾难使他对信仰发生了动摇。/r/n While we were wavering, somebody else bought the house./r/n 就在我们犹豫不决的时候, 别人把那所房子买下了./r/n

word.name: waving
word.lx: The magician is waving a magic wand./r/n 魔术师在挥舞魔杖。/r/n Her disheveled coat was waving in the wind./r/n 她蓬散的衣服在风中飘荡。/r/n

word.name: wax
word.mean:
n. 蜡,蜡状物,震怒
v. 变大,增大,月亮满
word.lx: He lit up a wax candle./r/n 他点燃了一支蜡烛。/r/n He that have a head of wax must not walk in the sun./r/n 自家头是蜡做成，休想太阳底下行。/r/n

word.name: way
word.lx: The discussion wandered way off the point./r/n 这项讨论偏离了主题。/r/n We lost the way in the dark./r/n 我们在黑夜中迷路了。/r/n

word.name: we
word.lx: We have seen the film./r/n 我们已经看过这部电影。/r/n We are good friends./r/n 我们是好朋友。/r/n

word.name: weak
word.mean: a. 不充分的,淡薄的,弱的,虚弱的,无力的
word.lx: Your argument is too weak to convince me./r/n 你的论点太薄弱了，说服不了我。/r/n The small weak child became the scorn of the class./r/n 这个瘦小软弱的孩子成为全班嘲笑的对象。/r/n

word.name: weakness
word.lx: We all have our little weaknesses./r/n 我们都有些小缺点。/r/n There is still some weakness in the legs, but her general condition is good./r/n 她双腿仍有些软弱无力, 但总的情况尚好./r/n

word.name: wealthy
word.mean:
a. 富有的
n. 富人
word.lx: He was born in a wealthy family./r/n 他出生在一个富裕的家庭。/r/n This area is wealthy in fruits and flowers./r/n 这个地区盛产水果和鲜花。/r/n

word.name: weapon
word.lx: Whether a gun is a weapon of offence or a weapon of defense depends on which end of it you are at./r/n 枪是攻击武器还是防御武器，要看你的目的而定。/r/n The fisher used a spear as his weapon./r/n 渔夫用矛作为武器。/r/n

word.name: weapons
word.lx: The soldiers were well equipped with weapons and ammunition./r/n 士兵们装备好了武器和弹药./r/n The combat arm that specializes in the use of such weapons./r/n 炮兵部队专门使用这类武器的战斗部队/r/n

word.name: wear
word.mean:
n. 穿著,磨损,耐久性
v. 穿著,用旧,耗损
word.lx: She never wears green./r/n 她从不穿绿色的衣服。/r/n The inscription on the stone had worn away./r/n 刻在石头上的文字已磨损了。/r/n

word.name: weary
word.mean:
a. 疲倦的,厌烦的
v. 疲倦,厌烦,生厌
word.lx: I feel weary after such a long journey./r/n 经过这么长时间的旅行后，我觉得很累。/r/n He began to weary of the work./r/n 他开始对工作感到厌倦。/r/n

word.name: weave
word.mean:
n. 编法,织法,编织
v. 编织,组合,编排
word.lx: The driver was weaving his way through the traffic./r/n 司机在车辆和人流中曲折前进。/r/n I wove a garland of flowers./r/n 我编了一个花环。/r/n

word.name: weaver
word.lx: His sister is a weaver in this factory./r/n 他姐姐是这个工厂的一名纺织工。/r/n The two weavers were cheats out and out./r/n 那两个织工是彻头彻尾的骗子。/r/n

word.name: wed
word.lx: He is wedded to his own opinion and nothing can change him./r/n 他固执己见，什么也不能让他改变。/r/n She wedded a foreigner./r/n 她嫁给了一个外国人。/r/n

word.name: wedge
word.mean:
n. 楔子,楔形物
v. 楔住,嵌,挤进

word.name: weed
word.mean:
n. 杂草,菸草
v. 除草
word.lx: I spent the whole day weeding in the garden./r/n 我一整天都在锄园子里的草。/r/n There are so many weeds in his field!/r/n 他的田里有那么多野草！/r/n

word.name: week
word.lx: He is very busy this week./r/n 这星期他会很忙。/r/n The temperature has stayed hot this week./r/n 本周气温一直都很热。/r/n

word.name: weekend
word.lx: Have you any plan to spend the weekend?/r/n 这个周末有什么计划？/r/n What are your plans for the weekend?/r/n 你周末计划做什么？/r/n

word.name: weekly
word.mean:
n. 周刊,周报
a. 每周的,一周一次的,周刊的
ad. 每周,一周一次
word.lx: Twice weekly I go swimming./r/n 每星期我去游泳两次。/r/n There is an interesting article in this weekly./r/n 这期的周刊上有一篇有趣的文章。/r/n

word.name: weep
word.mean:
n. 悲叹,哀悼,为...伤心
v. 哭泣,流泪
vi. 流泪,哭泣
vt. 为...而哭
word.lx: She wept bitter tears over her lost youth./r/n 她为自己逝去的青春痛苦地流泪。/r/n His wound is weeping./r/n 他的伤口在出血。/r/n

word.name: weigh
word.lx: He weighed the ideas in his mind./r/n 他在脑中权衡着这些想法。/r/n I weigh less than I used to./r/n 我的体重比以前轻了。/r/n

word.name: weird
word.lx: I heard weird shrieks in the darkness./r/n 我在黑暗中听到奇怪的尖叫声。/r/n I found some of her poems a bit weird./r/n 我觉得她的诗有点怪。/r/n

word.name: welcome
word.lx: You are always welcome to our house./r/n 欢迎你随时到我们家。/r/n Welcome to China!/r/n 欢迎到中国来！/r/n

word.name: weld
word.mean:
n. 焊接,焊缝
v. 焊接
word.lx: Some metals weld better than others./r/n 有些金属容易焊，有的不容易焊。/r/n The car has had a new wing welded on./r/n 这辆汽车焊接了一个新的翼子板。/r/n

word.name: welfare
word.lx: The government decided to promote public welfare./r/n 政府决定发展公共福利。/r/n These are matters that bear on the welfare of the community./r/n 这些都是与社会福利有关的问题。/r/n

word.name: well
word.mean:
n. 井,源泉
a. 健康的,良好的,适宜的
ad. 很好地,适当地
word.lx: The police found the lost treasure in an abandoned well./r/n 警察在一口废弃的井里找到了丢失的财宝。/r/n Tears welled out of her eyes./r/n 她泪如泉涌。/r/n

word.name: west
word.mean:
a. 西方的
ad. 向(在)西方
n. 西,西方
word.lx: I live in the west of the city./r/n 我住在该城市的西部。/r/n The sun rises in the east and sets in the west./r/n 太阳从东方升起，在西方落下。/r/n

word.name: western
word.mean:
n. 西方人,西部片,西部小说
a. 西方的,西洋的,西部的
word.lx: America is a western country./r/n 美国是一个西方国家。/r/n Filming a Western on location in the Mexican desert./r/n 在墨西哥沙漠外景地拍摄一部西部片/r/n

word.name: westerner
word.lx: A native or inhabitant of an Occidental country; a westerner./r/n 西方人在西方国家居住的当地人或居住者/r/n

word.name: wet
word.mean:
a. 湿的
n. 潮气,雨
v. (使)弄湿
vt. 弄湿
word.lx: I went out in the rain and got wet through./r/n 我冒雨出去，结果被淋得湿透了。/r/n Come and walk on the dry road instead of going through the wet./r/n 来吧，捡干的路走，别走湿地。/r/n

word.name: whaling
word.lx: One that hunts or processes whales./r/n 捕鲸人捕猎或加工鲸鱼的人/r/n The poet whaled away at the critics./r/n 诗人对批评者们进行了猛烈的攻击/r/n

word.name: wharf
word.lx: The ship was allowed to unload cargo on the wharf./r/n 那艘船被允许在码头上卸货。/r/n A landing platform attached to a wharf and floating on the water./r/n 浮台固定在码头且浮在水面上的着陆平台/r/n

word.name: what
word.mean:
pron. 什么
int. 怎么,多么
word.lx: She is not what she was a few years ago./r/n 她已经不是几年前的她了。/r/n What, do you really want to go?/r/n 什么！你真的要去？/r/n

word.name: whatever
word.mean:
a. 不管怎样的
det. 不管什么,无论何事
pron.&conj. 无论什么
word.lx: Goats eat whatever they can find./r/n 山羊什么都吃。/r/n Whatever I say, he always disagrees./r/n 不管我说什么，他总是不同意。/r/n

word.name: whatsoever
word.mean:
ad. (用于否定句中以加强语气)任何
pron.&a. 无论什么
word.lx: Whatsoever nonsense the newspaper prints, some people always believe it./r/n 无论报纸上刊登什么荒谬的东西，总有人相信。/r/n Take whatsoever measures you consider best./r/n 采取任何你认为最好的措施。/r/n

word.name: wheat
word.lx: They are grinding wheat into flour./r/n 他们正在把小麦磨成面粉。/r/n Wheat is transported from the farms to the mills./r/n 把小麦从农场运到面粉厂。/r/n

word.name: wheel
word.mean:
n. 轮子,周期
v. 旋转,装以车轮,转动
word.lx: The sails of the windmill were wheeling round./r/n 风车的叶轮正在旋转。/r/n There are four wheels in a car./r/n 一辆汽车有四只轮子。/r/n

word.name: wheelchair
word.lx: His bad leg condemned him to a wheelchair./r/n 他的残腿使他离不开轮椅。/r/n He collapse the wheelchair and put it on the boat./r/n 他将轮椅摺叠起来放在船上。/r/n

word.name: when
word.mean:
conj. 当...时
pron.&ad. 什么时候
word.lx: When did that happen?/r/n 那件事是什么时候发生的？/r/n Turn off the switch when anything goes wrong with the machine./r/n 如果机器出故障，就把开关关掉。/r/n

word.name: where
word.mean:
ad. 在哪里
conj. 在...地方
pron.&int. 哪里
word.lx: Where did she get the news?/r/n 她从哪儿得到这个消息的？/r/n This is where he lives./r/n 这就是他居住的地方。/r/n

word.name: whereas
word.lx: Whereas we want a flat, they would rather live in a house./r/n 我们想住公寓房，而他们却想住一所房子。/r/n Wise men love truth, whereas fools shun it./r/n 【谚】智者热爱真理，愚者回避真理。/r/n

word.name: whereby
word.lx: Whereby shall we find fault with him?/r/n 我们凭什么指责他呢？/r/n He devised a plan whereby he might escape./r/n 他想出了一个可藉以逃脱的办法。/r/n

word.name: wherever
word.mean:
ad. 无论什么地方
conj. 无论在哪里
word.lx: Sit wherever you like./r/n 随便坐在哪里吧。/r/n Wherever it is possible, he tries to help./r/n 只要有可能，他总是设法帮忙。/r/n

word.name: which
word.mean:
a. 哪一个,哪一些
int. 哪个
pron. 哪一个
word.lx: He lost his way, which delayed him considerably./r/n 他迷了路，这使他耽搁了很久。/r/n Which book have you read?/r/n 哪一本书你读过了？/r/n

word.name: whichever
word.mean:
a. 无论哪个,无论哪些
pron. 无论哪个
word.lx: Whichever you buy, there is a six-month guarantee./r/n 不论买哪个都有六个月保质期。/r/n It takes three hours, whichever route you take./r/n 不论走那条路都要三个小时。/r/n

word.name: whilst
word.mean: conj. 当...时(可是,虽然,只要)

word.name: whip
word.mean:
n. 鞭,车夫
v. 鞭打,挥动,突然攫取
word.lx: Their team really whipped ours at volleyball./r/n 他们的排球队彻底击败了我们队。/r/n He cracked his whip and the horses began to trot./r/n 他噼噼啪啪地挥鞭策马狂跑。/r/n

word.name: whisker
word.lx: He has heavy whiskers./r/n 他长着很重的连鬓胡子。/r/n The candidate lost the election by a whisker./r/n 该候选人以微弱劣势失去了竞选/r/n

word.name: whisky
word.lx: This whisky is very good./r/n 这种威士忌非常好。/r/n Whisky is marked up by 150%./r/n 威士忌在成本价上增加150%./r/n

word.name: whisper
word.mean:
n. 耳语,密谈,飒飒的声音
v. 耳语,密谈,飒飒地响
word.lx: The children were whispering in the corner./r/n 孩子们正在角落里低声耳语。/r/n The wind was whispering in the roof./r/n 屋顶上风声飒飒。/r/n

word.name: whistle
word.mean:
n. 口哨,汽笛,啸啸声
v. 吹口哨,鸣汽笛,用口哨通知
word.lx: He gave a loud whistle of gladness./r/n 他吹了一声响亮的口号表示高兴。/r/n A bullet whistled past his head./r/n 一颗子弹从他头顶上呼啸而过。/r/n

word.name: white
word.mean:
a. 白色的
n. 白色,白种人
word.lx: Her face turned white at the news./r/n 听到这个消息，她的脸色变白了。/r/n She went as white as a sheet when she heard the news./r/n 她听到这个消息顿时脸色苍白。/r/n

word.name: who
word.mean:
prep. …的,谁,他,她,他们
pron. 谁
word.lx: This is the man who wanted to see you./r/n 这就是要见你的那个人。/r/n Who do you think you are?/r/n 你以为你是谁？/r/n

word.name: whoever
word.mean:
ad. 无论是谁,任何人
pron. 究竟是谁,谁,无论谁,不管谁
word.lx: Whoever can that be at the door?/r/n 在门口的究竟是谁呢？/r/n Whoever told you that was lying./r/n 谁对你说这话，谁就在说谎。/r/n

word.name: whole
word.mean:
a. 整个的
n. 全部
word.lx: The whole country was anxious for peace./r/n 全国上下都渴望和平。/r/n I just threw the whole caboodle in the back of the car./r/n 我把所有东西都扔到汽车後座上去了。/r/n

word.name: wholesale
word.mean:
n. 批发
a. 批发的,大规模的,草率的
ad. 大规模,照批发,草率地
word.lx: The wholesale prices of these shirts are 45 dollars./r/n 这些衬衫的批发价是45美元。/r/n He buys the materials wholesale./r/n 他成批地购买原材料。/r/n

word.name: wholesome
word.mean: a. 有益健康的,合乎卫生的,健全的

word.name: whom
word.lx: That is the man about whom we were speaking./r/n 他就是我们刚才谈论的那个人。/r/n Whom did they invite?/r/n 他们邀请谁了?/r/n

word.name: whoop
word.mean:
n. 大叫,呐喊,喘息声
v. 叫喊,喘息
word.lx: When the land was seen, the sailor let out a whoop of joy./r/n 当看见陆地时，那水手发出一声欢呼。/r/n The train whooped out through the suburbs./r/n 火车隆隆地驶出郊区。/r/n

word.name: whose
word.lx: Whose house is that?/r/n 那是谁的房子？/r/n Whose pen is this?/r/n 这是谁的钢笔？/r/n

word.name: why
word.mean:
ad. 为什么
conj. …的理由,为什么
int. 咳,哎呀
pron. 为何,为什么
word.lx: Why not let her do as she likes?/r/n 为什么不让她想怎么做就怎么做呢？/r/n The reasons why he did it are obscure./r/n 他做那事的理由还不清楚。/r/n

word.name: wide
word.mean:
a. 广泛的,宽阔的
ad. 广大地,全部地
word.lx: She stared at him with wide eyes./r/n 她睁大眼睛注视他。/r/n He is a man of wide interests./r/n 他兴趣广泛。/r/n

word.name: widely
word.mean:
a. 广泛的
ad. 广泛地
word.lx: This accident is widely known./r/n 这场事故众所周知。/r/n They differ widely in their opinions./r/n 他们的意见分歧很大。/r/n

word.name: widen
word.lx: He wants to widen his knowledge of the industry./r/n 他想扩充自己在这一行业的知识。/r/n The road is being widened./r/n 这条路正在拓宽。/r/n

word.name: widening
word.lx: A widening in a highway to allow vehicles to pass or park./r/n 避车道，停车道高速分路上可以错车或停的宽大空间/r/n A gap between revenue and spending; the widening gap between rich and poor./r/n 收入和消费之间的差距；富人与穷人之间很大的悬殊/r/n

word.name: widespread
word.mean: a. 分布(或散布)广的,普遍的
word.lx: The forests are widespread in our country./r/n 我们的国家森林分布很广。/r/n Widespread flooding is affecting large areas of Devon./r/n 洪水泛滥, 淹没了德文郡的广大地区./r/n

word.name: widow
word.lx: That widow is a kind person./r/n 那个寡妇是个善良的人。/r/n We had compassion for the poor widow./r/n 我们同情这个可怜的寡妇。/r/n

word.name: widower
word.lx: The widower did not remarry./r/n 那鳏夫未曾再娶./r/n Once old Joe had inured himself to the solitary life of a widower, he began to improve in health and spirit./r/n 一旦老乔适应了鳏夫的孤独生活，他的身体和精神状况便开始好转了。/r/n

word.name: width
word.lx: The garden is six meters in width./r/n 花园的宽度为六米。/r/n Tornadoes are violent whirlwinds which vary in their width from a few yards to 1300 feet./r/n 龙卷风是一种猛烈的旋风，其直径从几码到1300 英尺。/r/n

word.name: wield
word.lx: She wields a lot of influence./r/n 她是个很有影响力的人。/r/n Easily wielded or managed./r/n 易使用的，易管理的/r/n

word.name: wife
word.lx: She is a good wife and a devoted mother./r/n 她是一位贤妻良母。/r/n Did you know he was cheating on his wife?/r/n 你知道他欺骗他的妻子吗？/r/n

word.name: wildlife
word.lx: There was some marvellous wildlife photography in the documentary./r/n 这部记录片里有些绝妙的野生动物镜头。/r/n Our community is a leader in the conservation of wildlife./r/n 我们社区在野生动物保护方面走在前头。/r/n

word.name: will
word.mean:
n.意志, 决心, 愿望, 遗嘱
aux.将, 愿意, 必须
word.lx: I will do my best./r/n 我将会尽力而为。/r/n Free will makes us able to choose our way of life./r/n 自由的意志使我们可以选择自己的生活方式。/r/n

word.name: willing
word.lx: Are you willing to help?/r/n 你愿意帮忙吗？/r/n He is always a willing helper./r/n 他是一个乐于帮忙的人。/r/n

word.name: willingness
word.lx: He indicated his willingness with a nod of his head./r/n 他点头表示愿意。/r/n They tried to assure him of their willingness to work./r/n 他们尽力使他相信他们乐意工作./r/n

word.name: willow
word.lx: Willowes are common in this city./r/n 柳树在这个城市很常见。/r/n Bring up in town, the boy find it difficult to separate a poplar from a willow./r/n 那男孩是在城里长大的，所以觉得很难区别杨树和柳树。/r/n

word.name: win
word.lx: He soon won a reputation for himself./r/n 他很快就成名了。/r/n Her performance won her much critical acclaim./r/n 她的表演大获评论界赞颂。/r/n

word.name: wind
word.mean:
n. 风,气味,卷
v. 上发条,缠绕,蜿蜒
word.lx: The river winds to the sea./r/n 那条河蜿蜒地流入大海。/r/n The deer winded the stalkers./r/n 那只鹿嗅出了偷偷接近的猎人。/r/n

word.name: winding
word.mean:
n. 卷,弯曲,线圈
a. 蜿蜒的,卷绕的,弯曲的
vbl. 卷绕,上发条,蜿蜒
word.lx: I went home along a winding mountain path./r/n 我沿着弯曲的山路回家。/r/n You operate the mechanism by winding this handle./r/n 操纵这台机器要转动这个把手./r/n

word.name: windmill
word.lx: Windmills are a common sight in Holland./r/n 风车是荷兰常见的景色。/r/n The sails of the windmill were wheeling round./r/n 风车的叶轮正在旋转。/r/n

word.name: window
word.lx: He looked out of the window./r/n 他向窗外看去。/r/n I saw the vase in the window of an antique shop./r/n 我在一家古玩店的橱窗里看见了那个花瓶。/r/n

word.name: windows
word.mean: 微软公司生产的“视窗”操作系统
word.lx: She stared out of the windows, lost in daydreams./r/n 她凝视窗外，陷入白日梦中。/r/n The cold has frosted the windows./r/n 寒冷的天气使窗子上结满了霜。/r/n

word.name: windy
word.mean: a. 有风的, 多风的

word.name: wine
word.lx: He likes to drink red wine at supper./r/n 他喜欢在晚饭时喝红葡萄酒。/r/n Wine cups and dishes lay about in disorder in the room./r/n 屋里杯盘狼藉。/r/n

word.name: wink
word.mean:
n. 眨眼,使眼色,瞬间
v. 眨眼,使眼色,闪烁
word.lx: She winked at me./r/n 她向我眨眼。/r/n A lighthouse was winking in the far distance./r/n 一座灯塔正在远处闪烁。/r/n

word.name: winter
word.lx: Winter is the coldest season in a year./r/n 冬季是一年中最冷的季节。/r/n It became fashionable for the rich to winter in the sun./r/n 在阳光充足的地方过冬成了富人的时尚。/r/n

word.name: wipe
word.mean:
n. 擦拭,用力打
v. 擦,消除,拭去
word.lx: I wiped my shoes on the mat before I came in./r/n 我在进门前把鞋在垫子上擦了擦。/r/n She wiped her tears away./r/n 她擦掉了眼泪。/r/n

word.name: wire
word.mean:
n. 电线,电报,金属丝
v. 给…装电线,发电报
word.lx: The rope was not strong enough, so we used wire./r/n 这根绳子不够结实，所以我们用金属线。/r/n The two pieces of wood were wired together./r/n 这两块木头已用金属丝捆在一起了。/r/n

word.name: wireless
word.mean:
a. 无线的
n. 无线电
word.lx: The police talked to each other by wireless./r/n 警察用无线电通话。/r/n He sent me the news by wireless telegraph./r/n 他用无线电报把消息告诉我。/r/n

word.name: wiring
word.lx: He examined the wiring scheme carefully./r/n 他仔细检查线路图。/r/n All this electrical wiring will take a day to set up./r/n 所有这些电线架线要花一天时间安装好。/r/n

word.name: wisdom
word.lx: He is a man of great wisdom./r/n 他是一个才智超群的人。/r/n According to conventional wisdom, voters usually make their choice on the basis of domestic issues./r/n 按一般人在这些问题上的看法，选民常常着眼于国内问题来选择候选人。/r/n

word.name: wise
word.mean: a. 明智的,有学问的,有智慧的,聪明的
word.lx: She is wise in money matters./r/n 她善于理财。/r/n You are wise to remain silent./r/n 你保持沉默，这很明智。/r/n

word.name: wish
word.mean:
n. 希望,愿望,祝颂
v. 愿,想要,希望
word.lx: His wish to be an actor has come true./r/n 他想当演员的愿望实现了。/r/n I wish you a good journey./r/n 祝你一路平安。/r/n

word.name: witch
word.lx: The witch turned the princess into a swan./r/n 巫婆把公主变成了一只天鹅。/r/n The witch charmed the prince./r/n 女巫对王子施了魔法。/r/n

word.name: with
word.lx: You are either with me or against me./r/n 你不是支持我就是反对我。/r/n She is friendly with them./r/n 她对他们很友好。/r/n

word.name: withdraw
word.lx: He withdrew his horse from the race./r/n 他让他的马退出了比赛。/r/n The troops have been withdrawn from the danger area./r/n 部队已经撤出危险地带。/r/n

word.name: withdrawal
word.lx: He has made several withdrawals from his account recently./r/n 最近他已经好几次从银行提取现款。/r/n The committee decided to make a withdrawal of financial support for his scheme./r/n 委员会决定取消对他那项计划的资助。/r/n

word.name: withdrawn
word.mean:
v. 提取(取出,分离,撤退,拉晶)
a. 偏僻的
word.lx: She withdrew all her savings and left the country./r/n 她把全部存款取出後离开了那个国家./r/n The troops have been withdrawn from the danger area./r/n 部队已经撤出危险地带。/r/n

word.name: wither
word.lx: The cold withered the leaves./r/n 严寒使树叶凋落。/r/n The grapes withered on the vine./r/n 葡萄藤上的葡萄都干瘪了。/r/n

word.name: withhold
word.lx: I withheld payment until they had fulfilled the contract./r/n 他们履行合同后，我才付钱。/r/n How shall I withhold from tears when we part?/r/n 我们离别时我如何忍得住眼泪呢？/r/n

word.name: without
word.mean:
ad. 在外面
n. 外面,外部
prep. 无,没有
word.lx: The rumor was without foundation./r/n 那条谣言毫无根据。/r/n Without the sun, nothing would grow./r/n 没有太阳，就不会有生物。/r/n

word.name: witness
word.mean:
n. 目击者,证人
v. (为...)作证,目击
vt. 目击
word.lx: Police have appealed for witnesses to come forward./r/n 警方呼吁目击者挺身而出。/r/n Did anyone witness the traffic accident?/r/n 有谁目击了这场交通事故？/r/n

word.name: witty
word.mean: a. 富于机智的,诙谐的

word.name: wizard
word.mean:
n. 男巫,术士,鬼才
a. 男巫的,巫术的
word.lx: He is a wizard at playing the piano./r/n 他是个钢琴奇才。/r/n Having the qualities or attributes of a wizard./r/n 魔法的，术士的有巫师的特点或性质的/r/n

word.name: woe
word.mean: n. 悲哀,悲痛,苦痛,不幸,困难
word.lx: Woe betide anyone who arrives late!/r/n 谁迟到谁倒霉！/r/n He told her all his woes./r/n 他把自己的辛酸事都告诉她了。/r/n

word.name: wolf
word.lx: It is said that there are wolves in this forest./r/n 据说这片森林里有狼。/r/n He saw a hungry wolf on the prowl with his telescope./r/n 他通过望远镜看到了一头四处觅食的饿狼。/r/n

word.name: woman
word.lx: Woman is physically but not mentally weaker than man./r/n 女子在体力上而不是智力上比男子弱。/r/n She is a career woman rather than a housewife./r/n 她是职业妇女而不是家庭主妇。/r/n

word.name: wonder
word.mean:
n. 奇迹,惊奇,惊谔
v. 惊奇,想知道,怀疑
adj.奇妙的,非凡的
word.lx: They wondered at his learning./r/n 他们对他的学识感到惊奇。/r/n They stared at the strange sight in silent wonder./r/n 他们惊讶地默默凝视那奇景。/r/n

word.name: wood
word.lx: You should put some more wood in the fire./r/n 你应该再往火里添些木料。/r/n Pine is a soft wood and teak is a hard wood./r/n 松木是软木，柚木是硬木。/r/n

word.name: wooden
word.lx: The actress gave a rather wooden performance./r/n 那个女演员的表演相当呆板。/r/n Our wooden sofa seems not very comfortable./r/n 我们的木头沙发似乎不太舒服。/r/n

word.name: woodpecker
word.lx: Woodpeckers have long beaks./r/n 啄木鸟长着长嘴。/r/n All the woodpeckers have scansorial feet./r/n 所有的啄木鸟都有适於攀爬的脚。/r/n

word.name: woods
word.lx: The police searched all the woods within a six-mile radius./r/n 警察搜索了在周围六英里以内的树林各处。/r/n Their family often picnics in the woods./r/n 他们一家常在树林里野餐。/r/n

word.name: wool
word.lx: This wool suit is very expensive./r/n 这套毛料套装十分昂贵。/r/n The wool got in a fearful tangle./r/n 毛线乱成了一团。/r/n

word.name: woolen
word.mean:
n. 毛制品
a. 羊毛的,羊毛制的,毛织的
word.lx: We have to wear woolen clothes in the cold winter./r/n 寒冷的冬天，我们不得不穿毛织品。/r/n This woolen sweater may keep you warm in winter./r/n 这件羊毛衫在冬天可以保暖。/r/n

word.name: woollen
word.mean:
n. 毛织品
a. 羊毛制的
word.lx: A man was lying in the box on top of a pile of woollen goods./r/n 一个男人躺在箱子里的一堆毛织品上。/r/n The woollen cloth prickles (my skin)./r/n 穿毛料衣服（使我的皮肤）有被扎的感觉./r/n

word.name: word
word.mean:
n. 词,单词,消息,诺言
vt. 用词语表达
word.lx: My friend sent word that he was well./r/n 我朋友捎来口信说他很好。/r/n Tell me what happened in your own words./r/n 用你自己的话把发生的事情告诉我。/r/n

word.name: wording
word.lx: He cast his last remark in more formal wording./r/n 他用更正式的措词表达了最后一句话。/r/n I find it helpful to keep several dictionaries by me so as to compare their wording./r/n 我发现身边放几本词典很有益处，这样便于比较它们的措词。/r/n

word.name: wordy
word.mean: a. 文字的,口头的,多言的
word.lx: A wordy phrase or sentence that has little meaning./r/n 赘语无意义的施沓冗长的短语或句子/r/n

word.name: work
word.lx: It was hard work getting the children off to bed./r/n 哄孩子们去睡可不是容易的事。/r/n Your car radio works very well./r/n 你的汽车收音机性能很好。/r/n

word.name: workable
word.mean: a. 易加工的(可使用的,切实可行的)
word.lx: If we put our heads together we can probably thresh out a workable scheme./r/n 如果我们集思广益，也许能琢磨出一个切实可行的方案。/r/n Such a scheme is workable./r/n 这样的方案是行得通的。/r/n

word.name: workday
word.lx: Our ordinary workday is eight hours./r/n 我们正常的工作日是8小时。/r/n An eight-hour workday./r/n 八小时工作日/r/n

word.name: worker
word.lx: He is a skilled worker./r/n 他是个熟练工人。/r/n The worker is dyeing cloth in a vat./r/n 工人正在一个大桶里染布。/r/n

word.name: workers
word.lx: Laid-off workers fall into penury./r/n 下岗职工陷入贫困。/r/n All the female workers in this factory got a present on March 8./r/n 这家工厂的所有女职工在三八节都得到了一份礼物。/r/n

word.name: workmanship
word.lx: Look at the workmanship on the carved desk./r/n 看这雕花桌子的工艺多么精湛。/r/n They admired her workmanship./r/n 他们很钦佩她的手艺./r/n

word.name: works
word.mean:
结构物
厂
制造厂
word.lx: They are repairing the defense works./r/n 他们正在修防御工程。/r/n She works in a sugar refinery./r/n 她在一家制糖厂工作。/r/n

word.name: workstation
word.mean:
n. 工作站
工作站

word.name: world
word.lx: He is the richest man in the world./r/n 他是世界上最富有的人。/r/n The travel enlarged my world./r/n 这次旅行扩大了我的眼界。/r/n

word.name: worldwide
word.lx: That shall do it, thank you for call worldwide flowers. Bye./r/n 那好，谢谢你给我们打电话。再见。/r/n Hello. worldwide flowers. Ers. Green speaking./r/n 喂，这是世界花卉公司，我是格林太太。/r/n

word.name: worm
word.lx: You miserable worm!/r/n 你这个可怜虫！/r/n Many birds eat worms./r/n 很多鸟类都以虫子为食。/r/n

word.name: worship
word.mean:
n. 崇拜,礼拜
v. 崇拜,敬仰
vi. 做礼拜
vt. 崇拜
word.lx: She was blind to the silent worship in his eyes./r/n 她没有发觉他眼里流露出的无声的敬慕之情。/r/n The boy worshipped his father./r/n 这小孩崇拜他的父亲。/r/n

word.name: worth
word.mean:
n. 价值
prep.&a. 值...钱,值得...的
word.lx: The house is worth a lot of money./r/n 这栋房子值很多钱。/r/n Whatever is worth doing at all is worth doing well./r/n 任何值得做的事就值得做好。/r/n

word.name: worthless
word.lx: I feel that such gatherings are worthless./r/n 我认为这样的集会毫无价值。/r/n She was worthless as a violinist./r/n 她作为小提琴手一无所成。/r/n

word.name: worthy
word.mean: a. 有价值的,可尊敬的,值得的,配得上的
word.lx: She proved herself a worthy successor to the former champion./r/n 她证明了自己是前冠军的当之无愧的接替人。/r/n We esteem him to be worthy of trust./r/n 我们认为他值得信任。/r/n

word.name: would
word.mean:
conj. 将,愿意
will 的过去式
word.lx: Would you please lend me your pencil?/r/n 请把铅笔借给我用用好吗？/r/n They wanted to know when you would go to the park./r/n 他们想知道你们什么时候去公园。/r/n

word.name: wound
word.mean:
n. 创伤,伤害,苦痛
v. 伤害,损害,上发条
vbl. 缠绕,蜿蜒,上发条
word.lx: The wound is healing fast./r/n 伤口愈合得很快。/r/n The soldier received a serious wound on the chest./r/n 这名士兵胸部受了重伤。/r/n

word.name: wounded
word.mean:
a. 受伤的
n. 伤员
word.lx: The wounded boy could not forbear to cry out./r/n 受伤的男孩忍不住哭了。/r/n This wounded soldier was unconscious from his loss of blood./r/n 这名伤员由于失血过多而昏迷不醒。/r/n

word.name: wrapper
word.lx: Please put all your sweet wrappers in the dustbin./r/n 请把你们的糖纸都放进垃圾箱里去。/r/n The book has a red wrapper./r/n 这本书有红色的包装。/r/n

word.name: wrath
word.mean: n. 愤怒,激怒,猛烈的力量
word.lx: I fear his wrath more than anything./r/n 我最害怕他发怒。/r/n He was... stirred by righteous wrath? (John Galsworthy)./r/n "他被…激起极大的愤怒"（约翰·高尔斯渥西）/r/n"

word.name: wreath
word.lx: They put some wreathes on the ground./r/n 他们把一些花环放在地上。/r/n The Queen pain homage to the victims of two world wars by laying a wreath on the Cenotaph./r/n 女王向纪念碑了献花圈，以此向两次世界大战这中的牺牲者们表示敬意。/r/n

word.name: wreck
word.mean:
n. 失事,残骸,破坏,健康受损的人
vt. 破坏,造成...失事
word.lx: Have they found the wreck of the ship?/r/n 他们找到那艘船的残骸了吗？/r/n The ship was wrecked on the rock./r/n 船在岩石上撞毁了。/r/n

word.name: wrench
word.mean:
n. 扳钳,猛扭,痛苦
v. 猛扭,扭伤,曲解
word.lx: He closed the door so hard that he wrenched the handle off./r/n 他关门用力过猛，连门把手都拧了下来。/r/n Separation from her children was a terrible wrench./r/n 同她的孩子们分别是一项很大的痛苦。/r/n

word.name: wrestle
word.mean:
n. 摔角,角力,扭斗
v. 摔角,格斗
word.lx: She wrestled with her attacker./r/n 她和袭击她的人扭打。/r/n Can you wrestle?/r/n 你会摔交吗?/r/n

word.name: wretched
word.mean: a. 可怜的,不幸的,卑鄙的
word.lx: He felt wretched after illness./r/n 他病后感到苦恼。/r/n The hotel food was absolutely wretched./r/n 那家旅馆的饭菜极差。/r/n

word.name: wring
word.mean:
n. 扭绞
v. 拧,绞出,扭
word.lx: Give the wet clothes a wring./r/n 把那些湿衣服拧一下。/r/n He wrung his hands in sorrow./r/n 他悲伤地绞紧双手。/r/n

word.name: wrist
word.lx: She wears a ring round her wrist./r/n 她的手腕上戴着一只镯子。/r/n He cut his wrist so badly that jets of blood spurted out./r/n 他的手腕割伤得很厉害，血阵阵涌出。/r/n

word.name: writer
word.lx: He became a writer./r/n 他成了一名作家。/r/n The writer of the book lived in the eighteenth century./r/n 这本书的作者生活在十八世纪。/r/n

word.name: written
word.mean:
a. 书面的,写成文字的
vbl. 写,著述

word.name: wrongly
word.mean: ad. 错误地(不正确地,不恰当地,不公正地)
word.lx: His remarks were wrongly construed./r/n 他的话被错误地解释了。/r/n Let me not put myself wrongly to my world and set it against me./r/n 让我不要错误地把自己放在我的世界里而使它反对我。/r/n

word.name: wrought
word.mean:
vt. 工作
a. 可锻的
word.lx: A small, exquisitely wrought trinket./r/n 珠宝，首饰小巧精致的装饰物/r/n The mortality wrought by an epidemic./r/n 由一传染病引起的大批死亡/r/n

word.name: Xerox
word.mean:
v. 影印
施乐(财富500强公司之一，总部所在地美国,主要经营办公设备)
word.lx: Could you Xerox this letter please?/r/n 请你把这封信复印一份好吗？/r/n

word.name: X-ray
word.mean:
n. X射线(X光机,X光照片)
vt 用X射线检查

word.name: yacht
word.mean:
n. 游艇,快艇
vi. 驾快艇
word.lx: Huge waves drove the yacht onto the rocks./r/n 巨浪把游艇卷到岩石上。/r/n Will you crew for me on my yacht?/r/n 你愿意在我的快艇上当水手吗?/r/n

word.name: yard
word.lx: Cloth is sold by the yard./r/n 布是按码卖的。/r/n He parked his car in the yard./r/n 他把车停在院子里。/r/n

word.name: yarn
word.lx: We stayed up yarning until midnight./r/n 我们讲故事一直讲到半夜才睡。/r/n The beggar spun a long yarn about his misfortunes./r/n 那个乞丐编造了一大篇自己如何遭遇不幸的故事。/r/n

word.name: yawn
word.mean:
n. 呵欠
v. 打呵欠
word.lx: I gave a loud yawn, but he just kept on talking./r/n 我大声打了个呵欠，可他还是不停地讲下去。/r/n His long boring story made me yawn./r/n 他的冗长的故事听得我直打呵欠。/r/n

word.name: yearbook
word.lx: A periodical published yearly; a yearbook./r/n 年刊；年鉴每年出版一次的期刊；年刊/r/n

word.name: yearly
word.mean:
a. 每年的
ad. 每年,一年一次地
word.lx: The meeting is held yearly./r/n 会议每年举行一次。/r/n The yearly conference will be held next month./r/n 年会下个月举行。/r/n

word.name: yearn
word.lx: He yearned to return to his native land./r/n 他渴望回到故乡。/r/n He yearned for a sight of the old, familiar faces./r/n 他渴望一见那些熟悉的老面孔。/r/n

word.name: years
word.lx: The company doubled its size in nine years./r/n 9年来这家公司的规模扩大了一倍。/r/n It took years of hard work to speak good English./r/n 讲一口流利的英语需要多年的刻苦操练。/r/n

word.name: yeast
word.lx: Yeast must be used in producing wine./r/n 制酒时必须使用酵母菌。/r/n Made light and high by yeast or other leaven./r/n 发酵的用酵母或其它发酵剂使…轻而高/r/n

word.name: yellow
word.mean:
a. 黄色的
n. 黄色
word.lx: The leaves of the book had yellowed with age./r/n 书页因年久而变黄。/r/n The leaves turn yellow in autumn./r/n 秋天时叶子变黄。/r/n

word.name: yes
word.mean:
a. 是的
ad. 是,是的
v. 是
word.lx: Answer with a plain yes" if you agree with me./r/n 如果你同意我的意见，就明白地回答“是”。/r/n

word.name: yesterday
word.lx: He arrived yesterday./r/n 他昨天到达的。/r/n Yesterday was Friday./r/n 昨天是星期五。/r/n

word.name: yield
word.mean:
n. 生产量,投资收益
v. 生产,屈服,投降,弯下去，凹下去
word.lx: These trees gave a high yield of fruit this year./r/n 这些果树今年获得了大丰收。/r/n The soldiers had to yield./r/n 士兵们被迫投降。/r/n

word.name: yoke
word.mean:
n. 轭, 轭状物, 套, 束缚, 支配
v. 把...套上轭, 结合, 连接
word.lx: His army never came under the yoke of invaders./r/n 他的军队从来不向侵略者屈服。/r/n The farmer was yoking his oxen to a plough./r/n 农夫正在用轭把牛套到犁上。/r/n

word.name: you
word.lx: You must all listen carefully./r/n 你们都必须仔细听着。/r/n How late are you open?/r/n 你们营业到几点？/r/n

word.name: young
word.mean:
a. 年轻的
n. 青年人
word.lx: This young girl is my daughter./r/n 这个年轻的女孩是我的女儿。/r/n The young in our society need careand protection./r/n 我们社会的年轻人需要受到关怀和爱护./r/n

word.name: your
word.lx: Your hands are dirty./r/n 你的手很脏。/r/n These are your books./r/n 这些是你们的书。/r/n

word.name: yours
word.lx: This is our room, and yours is down the passage./r/n 这是我们的房间，你们的在走廊的那一头。/r/n His view of life is different from yours./r/n 他的人生观与你的不同。/r/n

word.name: yourself
word.lx: You and your sister said so yourselves./r/n 你和你姐姐都这么说。/r/n I believe that you can work out this problem by yourself./r/n 我相信你自己能做出这道题的。/r/n

word.name: yourselves
word.lx: You two have only yourselves to blame./r/n 你们俩只能怪自己。/r/n Taken care of yourselves./r/n 照顾你们自己。/r/n

word.name: youth
word.lx: In his youth, he had shown great promise./r/n 他在青少年时代就显得很有出息。/r/n The youth of the country are being ignored by politicians./r/n 这个国家的青年没有受到政治家的重视。/r/n

word.name: youthful
word.lx: No one can remain youthful forever./r/n 没有人能永保青春。/r/n

word.name: yuan
word.lx: Pay back the5,000 Yuan I loan you by today./r/n 我借给你的5，000元，今天还我吧。/r/n The buy rate of US dollar note be846 yuan per hundred dollar./r/n 美元的买入价是100美元付864元人民币。/r/n

word.name: zeal
word.lx: She shows great zeal for knowledge./r/n 她表现出强烈的求知欲。/r/n Zeal without knowledge is fire without light./r/n 【谚】热情而无知，犹如无光之火。/r/n

word.name: zealous
word.lx: The zealous demonstrators were ignored by the media./r/n 热情的示威游行者被新闻媒介忽视了。/r/n The doctors were zealous in their efforts to ensure the survival of premature babies./r/n 医生们在努力保证早产婴儿成活方面热情很高。/r/n

word.name: zebra
word.lx: Seemingly everyone likes the zebra./r/n 似乎每个人都喜欢斑马。/r/n Related to, resembling, or characteristic of a zebra./r/n 斑马的与斑马有关的、与斑马相似的或具有斑马特征的/r/n

word.name: zero
word.lx: It was five below zero last night./r/n 昨夜温度是零下五度。/r/n His hope was reduced to zero./r/n 他的希望化为乌有。/r/n

word.name: zest
word.mean: n. 风味,强烈的兴味,风味
word.lx: The element of risk gave (an) added zest to the adventure./r/n 这种冒险成分更给探险活动平添几分乐趣./r/n Her zest for life is as great as ever./r/n 她对生活的极大乐趣一如既往./r/n

word.name: zigzag
word.mean:
n. 曲折,Z字形
a. 曲折的,锯齿形的
ad. 曲折地,成锯齿形地
word.lx: There is a zigzag path in the garden./r/n 花园里有一条之字形的小道。/r/n The path zigzags up the hill./r/n 这条小道向山顶蜿蜒而上。/r/n

word.name: zinc
word.lx: You should first put a small piece of zinc plate into the cup./r/n 首先，要向杯子里放一小片锌板。/r/n Brass is an alloy of copper and zinc./r/n 黄铜是铜和锌的合金。/r/n

word.name: zip
word.lx: This dress fastens (up) (ie has buttons, a zip, etc) at the back./r/n 这件连衣裙是在背後系扣的./r/n These new trains really zip along./r/n 这些新列车行驶得可真快./r/n

word.name: zone
word.lx: They escaped from the war zone./r/n 他们逃出了交战区。/r/n The Norwegians live in a comparatively cold zone./r/n 挪威人生活在比较寒冷的地区。/r/n

word.name: zoo
word.lx: My children cried out with glee when I said I would take them to the zoo./r/n 当我说带孩子们去动物园时，他们高兴地喊叫起来。/r/n The birth of a baby penguin in the zoo was widely reported./r/n 动物园里小企鹅的出生受到了广泛的报道。/r/n

word.name: zoology
word.lx: The professorship of zoology is vacant and has been advertised./r/n 动物学教授的职位空缺，已登广告徵聘。/r/n The branch of zoology that deals with nematodes./r/n 线虫学研究线虫的动物学分支/r/n

word.name: zoom
word.mean:
n. 急速上升
v. 突然扩大,急速上升
